review_text: I received this yesterday and tried it. It is light and wasn’t too thick. It was surprisingly good.
product_name: That Big Screen Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: I love this pore refining solution correcting serum. It goes on smooth, and feels good to my skin. It does make my pores look smaller. Great product!!!!
review_title: Does exactly what it's suppose to do!!!
product_name: Pore Refining Solutions Correcting Serum

review_text: A great lighter alternative to the original CEO cream. This moisturizer is lightweight, absorbs quickly, and leaves a satin finish - not too dewy but not matte, just a subtle sheen. It definitely instantly brightens & smooths. I wore it this morning over a different brand’s Vitamin C serum and didn’t have any issues. I noticed it pilled juuuust a bit when I put on my sunscreen, but it may be that I didn’t let it dry down enough first. I did wear makeup today and I think this cream helped prep my skin for a super smooth makeup application. I can’t speak much to results yet, but I am pleasantly surprised by this one!⁣
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: This is a great cleanser! It’s a soft scented foaming face wash that gently removes my makeup & skin impurities from the day while not drying out my skin. (I have dry skin for reference) It doesn’t have a super strong fragrance, just a soft scent. I mostly use this as my second cleanser after a cleansing balm but you can use this alone and it will still deliver! It’s such a luxurious feeling product, highly recommend!
product_name: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Face Cleanser

review_text: I am using this sunscreen every single day for the past 3 weeks and half and it is a godsend!
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: The reason I got this is because of all my acne and blackheads/pores and it’s been doing amazing on my face, I use it twice a day, one in the morning and at night. My pores seem to opening up and pushing out the gross stuff inside so I just take it off with tweezers and it leaves me clean, my acne gets off in a few days and I hardly get much now! I’m really happy with this purchase:)
product_name: Mini Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

review_text: I received this product as a free sample to review it.I honestly love this product because it works great with my oily skin.  It is lightweight and works well under my cream, but at the same time very concentrated. I’ve been using it for about a month and it really improved the texture and radiance in my skin.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Hyaluronate Serum

review_text: Gifted by glow recipe I am a huge GR fan as it is and when i saw this I was so excited !! First of all my skin looks beyond smooth and when I use it with make up wwhoaaaa absolutely flawless love !! So pretty
product_name: Strawberry BHA Pore-Smooth Blur Drops

review_text: I’m so grateful to have an spf that isn’t heavy and greasy! Feels good on my face!
product_name: SHIKULIME Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30

review_text: So disappointed in this formula change. Why change the entire formula to increase the SPF?
product_name: Oil and Pore Control Mattifier Broad Spectrum SPF 45 PA++++

review_text: Good product, works well.
product_name: One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Orange Extract

review_text: I’ve been using this product for about two weeks now and I’m starting to see some positive change in my skin texture, which is nice! The product texture is velvety and feels really nice when applied, and the product doesn’t pill at all under my moisturizer, which I definitely appreciate!
product_name: The Concentrate Serum

review_text: I love using this under my eyes each morning and night! I get the worst under eye circles and dark circles and this is really Helping them look less noticeable and makes me look not as tired! This is a must if you have bad under eyes. Gifted by farmacy
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: I love how lightweight this sunscreen actually is. It applies so well on my bare face but also can easily go over your makeup without making your face greasy or sticky. This sunscreen doesn’t irritate my face and I have sensitive skin.
product_name: Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: One word—Orange. I mixed with serum, and then when it wore off, with moisturizer. Both times it turned my face very orange. I am returning.
product_name: THE FACE Illuminating Self-Tan Drops

review_text: Yes this serum is really work. I’ve never ever try any pore refining because I don’t trust it. However, I give it a try and its work. I’ve been using it for 1 weeks. I love it & I love Clinique skincare products. Its work for me & will work for you .. Try it!!
product_name: Pore Refining Solutions Correcting Serum

review_text: I love it so far have been using it for two weeks and I already see the difference!! This is my first cold winter in a diff state and this has been very helpful in making my skin stay hydrated! I love that this has no scent, I have also used it with acid serums and peptide serums and this plays well with others. I haven’t had any adverse reactions when I mix it with others, I also enjoy that even though it’s 75% Hyaluronic acid, it doesn’t leave my skin sticky!! Which for me is a first!! Usually I find this acid to leave a sticky residues feeling on my face which I find works like a primer for my skin with out making pores worse! But I love that I can use this on. O makeup days and not have to worry about attracting any pollution to my face!! I’ve worn this also while working with my face mask on and it has not made me breakout or produce any extra oil it’s fantastic!! I will deff be going back for me once this bottle is over, it’s the perfect amount of moisture without heaviness!
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Glow Serum

review_text: This is the first CBD product I’ve used. I loved the oil and tried it out the last two weeks. I have combination skin and it seemed to make my skin more on the dryer side. One thing I loved was the decrease in redness that I saw after using this product. I received this product as a free sample
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: after buying and trying the coola silk drops (and breaking out, also opposed to the scent) I decided to try this.  I LOVE it.  all the reviews are on point.  it looks lovely, feels lovely, absorbs quickly and the smell is very subtle. it leaves my skin velvety and smooth but not shiny.
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: Great experience - I particularly the speed you manage my orders! I appreciate it very much and I will surely shop again.
product_name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask

review_text: This stuff is so sticky. If I pat it on with my ring finger, it looks weird. Nice brightening effect and quite opaque, but not blendable. Maybe I’m doing it wrong??I’m going to keep and use because I need spf under my eyes. But I will not be using it on days when I need to look good.
review_title: Hard to blend, difficult to love.
product_name: Bright-Eyed 100% Mineral Eye Cream SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: My skin feels really soft and nice after using this product. I have combination skin and it works really well. It works on both parts of my skin dry and oily but especially in dry area. Happy with this one.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Lotion Moisturizer

review_text: Murad Skincare gifted me these spf drops and I love them! I love the way they feel on my skin and how easy it is to apply them. I don’t think that this spf feels heavy on my skin and the formula feels nice.
product_name: Correct & Protect Broad Spectrum SPF 45| PA++++

review_text: I have had this for two weeks now and use it every day. It has been so amazing getting rid of blemishes when you put it on just for the day!!!! I’ve used so many different spot treatments in the past and this is the only one that works quickly and does not leave scarring. I am so glad that I found this!!!
product_name: Acne+ 2% BHA and Azelaic Acid Acne Spot Treatment

review_text: I wasn’t breaking out until I started using this. So I’m assuming this is the cause.
product_name: Tranexamic Acid Hyperpigmentation Treatment

review_text: I’ve always had deep wrinkles and dark circles under my eyes, even as a child. This product has reduced my wrinkles significantly. Under eye dark circles are still there but the skin is looking stronger. I will keep using for the anti-wrinkle benefits. Hopefully in the long term the dark circles will reduce too.
product_name: White Lucent Anti-Dark Circles Eye Cream

review_text: I received this product free for an honest review and I have to say this product really made my skin feel soft and supple and help even out my skin tone and just made everything feel like my face had just gone through an expensive treatment I was so happy with how my skin is looking now I don’t think I’ll ever find another serum like this
product_name: Pore Remedy PHA Exfoliating Serum

review_text: I loved how thick this cream was for my face! Definitely hydrating. The scent was a little too much but it won’t stop me from using it! My skin is always dry and this helps!
product_name: Mini 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream

review_text: I just received this mask today and have only used it once BUT WOW - after only one use, a whitehead I had almost entirely disappeared, my skin was visibly smoother and also smoother to the touch! It left a nice cooling sensation on my face after I rinsed it off and let my face visibly mattified. My skin is naturally oily so the mattifying only lasted a couple of hours...still very impressed!
product_name: Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: The product feels AMAZING--glides on nicely and feels amazing on the skin. However, I don’t notice a huge improvement in undereye circles or general brightness. I like this as a product moreso than something that makes me look better.
product_name: Light Aura Vitamin C + Peptide Eye Cream

review_text: This product works nicely, leaves skin hydrated and feeling plump. Although the scent is nice I don’t feel that’s scent is necessary in skincare so that could be a concern for some. *I received this product complimentary of Influenster in exchange for my honest review.
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: Not an eye cream fan, they are usually useless. Love this one though, really seems to make a difference. Not sure what everyone means about it being tinted, it doesn’t leave any color behind. Creamy and makes eyes brighter and softer.
product_name: Bright-Eyed 100% Mineral Eye Cream SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: I have really been enjoying using this eye cream. I enjoy the process of the apply and drain method that they recommend it really feels like a little bit of a spa experience in my routine. I’ve seen great immediate results where my fine lines and wrinkles are way less visible after application I have also started to notice a reduction in the bags I have underneath my eyes. It absorbs really nicely I’ve never had any issues with pilling or irritation and it also sets well under make up. Definitely a new favorite of mine!
product_name: Total Eye Lift Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Eye Cream

review_text: Super you was gifted to me by Moon Juice and it took me about a week or so to start noticing some of the effects. I take a lot of supplements but non of them really help with stress or focus so it was nice adding these to my regimen. I take these in the morning on empty stomach and I noticed that my thoughts are more clear and focused vs before I used to wake up and stress about what I had to do for the day and my thoughts were all over the place. If you suffer from morning anxiety, I would say they are worth a try! Thank you Moon Juice for sending me these, I will definitely continue to take them!
review_title: Don’t let stress stress you out!
product_name: Mini SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: I received this product in a holiday box and I’ve been using it for almost a week now. It feels FANTASTIC on the skin and I’ve definitely noticed that my face is much more hydrated than it was before. The only complaint I have is the smell. It smells like play-doh and it’s not pleasant, however it doesn’t last long and then it seems to be in scented. This product would get 5 stars from me if it weren’t for the scent.
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Glow Serum

review_text: I have been using Fenty skin for a little over a year now and I love it! I recommend starting with the travel size just to see how it does on your skin before purchasing the bigger bottles
product_name: Fat Water Niacinamide Pore-Refining Toner Serum with Barbados Cherry

review_text: I’m really bummed out about this. I know they changed the formula at some point and all I can say is they need to bring the original formula back. This went from being a holy grail product for me to causing me to break out in a rash of little bumps all over my face. Goes without saying I won’t be purchasing this again, which sucks because Ole is one of my fav brands.
review_title: Broke me out in a rash of little bumps
product_name: Goodnight Glow Bakuchiol Sleeping Crème

review_text: This feels more like a gentle scrub for your face, rather than a mask. I have sensitive skin and it feels great, so likely to repurchase.
product_name: Overtime Mask

review_text: this product was really nice to use and incorporate into my routine. This has no fragrance and can take off make up really nicely. Make sure to warm up in hands before use and have a 2nd cleanser since it does leave a oily feel afterwards.
product_name: SHIKULIME Gel-to-Oil Cleanser

review_text: This is my favorite facial tanner to date - easy to use because you can mix it into moisturizer and control the amount, and it creates the most natural glow that fades perfectly. Slight smell but not unpleasant. Pricey, but lasts. Unfortunately Tan-Luxe is not cruelty free so I won’t be repurchasing :(
product_name: THE FACE Illuminating Self-Tan Drops

review_text: Very light weight and your skin feels smooth and soft after it sets. It makes your skin refined with a glow. I do not have amazing skin and this toner made my skin amazing!
product_name: Fat Water Niacinamide Pore-Refining Toner Serum with Barbados Cherry

review_text: Very moisturizing. I use an eye cream daily and this one is amazing. I have puffy eyes and dark underneath and this definitely helps. A little goes a long way. I did receive this product free from Influenster.
product_name: Ceramidin  Eye Cream with Niacinamide

review_text: I love this product! I have sensitive skin, and it is very soothing.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: My favorite cleanser. I love everything about this cleanser. It feels so nice applying it, smells like jasmine flower, removes heavy foundation, and it leaves my skin glowing and clear. I feel like it’s helping with my pores. Finished my first bottle and will be re-purchasing.
product_name: Alpha Beta AHA/BHA Daily Cleansing Gel

review_text: My skin has really responded to the SK-II line. I started several years ago with the Facial Essence, and added the masks when I saw the transforming effects of the Essence. I’ve used both this mask, and the other SK-II mask, which is for brightening.Like the Facial Essence, this mask is lightweight and has a fresh scent that’s almost undetectable. Despite having a lightweight consistency, the moisturizer is potent.Because Sephora sells the masks individually, I buy these as gifts for my girlfriends - add to birthday gift bags, Christmas stockings, you name it. It’s great for every skin type.How to use: On freshly washed skin, open envelope, unfurl cotton mask, and place on face, taking care to align eye, nose
product_name: Pitera Facial Treatment Mask

review_text: The serum is light upon application although it leaves your skin a little sticky for a few minutes. Once the serum is absorbed by the skin, it leaves it supple and looking fresh. I think it works wonders especially when you use it in tandem with the moisturizer and the exfoliating pads.I received this product free from Influenster for review purposes, all opinion are my own.
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Serum

review_text: I enjoyed using this toner overall! I like to use it by patting it into my skin with my hands after cleansing. It feels refreshing, and the tea tree isn’t too strong. I don’t think it has done anything super significant for me so far, but I am also not currently dealing with acne. If you like Dr. Jart products and want a refreshing toner that doesn’t dry the skin out, this might work for you.
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: I use this after an oil cleanse and its great! I havent noticed any breakouts after using it for 3 weeks, my pores dont look bigger or anything and doesnt make my combo skin any drier. I love the teatree smell so much, its not too strong like some other tea tree products ive used. I received this product complimentary for testing purposed by Influenster.
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: Beautiful package, nice light smell and great absorbing texture! You can see how great works right after applying cream. I love it!
product_name: That Fresh Take Eye Cream with Peptides

review_text: I used these along with the acne products when I developed hormonal acne in my 20s and 30s. I have gone off of them and noticed a difference in my skin when I do not use. They are a must have for me even in my early 50s.
product_name: Pure Skin Clarifying Dietary Supplement

review_text: I recieved this product complimentary from bzzagent. This lip mask is very hydrating. It does it’s job well and is very portable. It smells very good as well. After a few days of use, my lips were visibly softer. The container is great becuase you can dispense a bit of product without contaminating the rest. I really liked it!
product_name: Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E

review_text: Dont know if this product is really good, feel like my skin look so dull and its so greasy. I didnt like this at all
product_name: RESIST Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50

review_text: Holy cow, this product is completely amazing! I used it for my smile-lines and saw instant results. I got it as a sample, but I will definitely be purchasing this product in the future.
product_name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask

review_text: Most perfect tan in two hours. Lasts for days and days and looks SO natural! I have no need for sun bathing with this stuff. I love how it slightly shows up right away so you can tell if you need to go back over any spots. You’ll definitely want to use a mitt when applying, however. It lasts a long time too, I have used it once a week or two since February and still have plenty left.
product_name: Self Tan Classic Bronzing Mousse

review_text: I’m shocked how much I love this! It’s moisturizing and lightweight. It doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin or burn like some combination sunscreens do and it has no funny smell or masking fragrance! It feels great and offers sun protection and hydration! It’s a bit pricey but I would definitely splurge on this in the future! I received this for free to test out but all opinions are my own.
product_name: That Big Screen Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: I’ll be honest, I was not expecting to see results. Let alone results from initial wear. I don’t have terribly wrinkled undereye, but the lines that I do have definitely were less defined. ’ll have to work with it more to see long-term benefits but it’s really great!
product_name: Total Eye Lift Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Eye Cream

review_text: I was skeptical about this toner because of some of the ingredients and the fact that I have super sensitive skin; however, it’s really gentle and hydrating. I’d recommend this for anyone with sensitive skin.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: This is the first sunscreen that I tried on a dropper form and I’m impressed! It is very easy to dispense out the right amount, I usually do a couple drops per each cheek and also the forehead. This blends instantly and does not leave a white cast on me. It has a liquid texture that spreads easily and absorbs into the skin without leaving a greasy feeling. I like that it feels very lightweight so it’s like wearing nothing but I’m still protected to the effects of the sun.I have received compliments while wearing this alone on how good and radiant my skin looks, and it also wears well under makeup.
product_name: Correct & Protect Broad Spectrum SPF 45| PA++++

review_text: I’m so surprised and excited when I receive it. The cream is soft and smooth, quickly absorbed, does not feel sticky or heavy on the face. Suitable for many different skin types, including oily, sensitive or combination skin. I think it works well. Skin is brighter, healthier and more radiant than before, signs of aging, wrinkles have reduced but reduced a little, probably because I have only used it for 2 weeks.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Night Cream with Triple Ceramide Complex

review_text: I love this product so much! When I use it it leaves my skin feeling plump, rejuvenated and refreshed. It has a nice texture that isn’t too tacky like some other products. I would definitely recommend!
product_name: C15 Vitamin C Super Booster

review_text: I bought both the Emerald Glow Oil
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: *Received via Influenster complementary for reviewing purposes * Can’t say I notice a difference in appearance for my skin, but the moisturizing properties make the product for me. I tried it on it’s own without moisturizer and my dry/normal skin type felt baby skin soft! Scent is a little too much, and HOLY PRICE TAG! That being said though, if you’re willing to spend 250 a pop on a single skin care product it’s worth a shot.
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Double R Advanced Serum

review_text: Got this as a sample and absolutely love it! It made my dark circles a lot less visible and my skin brighter. It also seems to be lightening/ reducing the lines at the corner of my eyes which is a nice bonus too. Only thing is it does tend to pill from time to time so it can be irritating if you are wearing makeup over it but without makeup it’s barely noticeable.
product_name: Bright-Eyed 100% Mineral Eye Cream SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: Super tingly at first but then it becomes soothing, it’s not too tight when it dries also and the smell is decent. The results are very beautiful and it gives you a great glow.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: Doesn’t over exfoliate, leaving skin soft.
product_name: One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Orange Extract

review_text: I have been using this every morning for about 2 months now and it has held up!  My skin is usually combo but I’m winter its gets more dry. Thai moisturizer does a great job keeping the skin plumped but not overly heavy where you feel like ifs heavy on the skin. I don’t use it at night however as I need a bit more of a heavier moisturizer for overnight. This moisturizer though would be ideal for day and night use  come summertime. The amount you get is a lot so value is amazing I find. I received this product for free from Influenster for testing.
product_name: Mini 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream

review_text: I absolutely loved the mask! It was so soothing and relaxing. My skin felt great afterward! I would use this again in a heartbeat!
product_name: Cryo Rubber Masks

review_text: This eye cream is even better than the original one YTTP has. It’s so nice and light, smooths in well, and makes my eyes feel bright and open when I wake up. I’ve been using for about a week and notice how well it does at de-puffing my undereyes even if my sleep isn’t good.
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: Complimentary from Dermalogica. This moisturizer is a dream! I love the lightweight texture and how fast it absorbs into the skin.  There is a very slight refreshing scent that fades in seconds. It leaves my skin looking plump and feeling nicely hydrated through the day.
product_name: Active Moist Moisturizer

review_text: Smells amazing, it’s so refreshing and makes my skin feel clean. All u need is a very little amount and it dissolves all your makeup. I got this couple days ago and so far I love.
review_title: the smell is amazing & works GREAT!
product_name: Mini Truth Juice Daily Cleanser

review_text: Makes my skin feels so soft
product_name: Sheet Masks

review_text: Fragrance free and not oily. Not too heavy where it causes tiny breakouts around the eye area either. However it’s not the most moisturizing so if you have dry eye lids you might need to apply 2-3 times.
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Ok ok ok ok. This! Has helped reduce the dice of my pores, it’s helped even out my skin tone, and remove some of the redness! I absolutely recommend this! I’ll be using for a long time!
product_name: Goodnight Glow Bakuchiol Sleeping Crème

review_text: Can’t stand this new formula. The old formula lasted all day. In fact, my makeup would look better the longer I wore it. This new formula has no coverage even when layered. And when layered, it just looks cakey. Bring back the original!!!
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This moisturizer is very nourishing and moisturizing, but not greasy nor sticky.  A little goes a long way and it goes on smoothly.  My skin is on the dry side and this moisturizer has peptide, ceramide, and Hyaluronic Acid, so it really packs great ingredients in one bottle for your skin.  My skin felt plumped, hydrated, smooth, and glowing after using for about a week or two.  Highly recommend!
product_name: Peptide + Ceramide Repairing Moisturizer

review_text: Agree with other reviews here.... it smells great and could be “relaxing” but save your money for something else! This is fine but definitely not worth the hype/$$ I didn’t see any major difference in my skin after use. I had a sample and definitely will not be buying full size.
product_name: R + R Mask

review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster for my honest review. First off, I absolutely love the packaging, it’s so bright and inviting. The cream itself is so thick and creamy, you barely have to use any! The best part? This amazing product is fragrance free, perfect for my sensitive eye area and skin!
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin C Eye Crème

review_text: My experience with this was okay. It does not foam and for me having oily skin I like a cleanser that foams. It also left my skin dry right after using it. It is very heavily fragranced so if you don’t like that then I’d stay away from it
product_name: The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: So calming, relaxing & lux! This is expensive for a mask, but a little does go a long way, and I use it as a treat to calm my skin, especially after a stressful week or days spent in the sun. The rose petals are dried and def are a physical exfoliant so don’t rub the mask on too hard. I just smooth it on and don’t exfoliate as it suggests, because I worry about micro tears in my skin. It has a beautiful fragrance and is a nice mask experience.
product_name: R + R Mask

review_text: I ended up getting a super bad “stress break out” up my neck and the side of my face. I put this on before I went to bed and my break out was %80 gone. I did it again the next night and woke up to clear skin. this stuff is AMAZING. It has a weird oily texture but not like a smothering oil. The only down side to this product is it makes your skin sensitive to sun. I was out for 10 minutes and my face burnt so please remember to WEAR SUNSCREEN!
product_name: Mandelic Acid 10% + HA

review_text: This product work pretty well considering I only used it for the 7 night challenge. I only washed my face with my normal Cerave facial cleanser and then put this on at night. It wasn’t super sticky and the scent was super minimal. A little goes a long way, so I still have a lot left in the jar. The left on my photo is the before and the right is after 7 days. And it would probably be better if I hadn’t picked at my skin on night 5. It’s bad habit. I do think the brown/dark spot have faded.
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: I received this product direct from the brand as a gift but I will say I’m a HUGE fan of their entire line. The cleansing gel especially leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed without drying - which is a huge concern for my aging skin. Combined with the peel and the moisturizer my skin has transformed over the past few months, couldn’t recommend more!
product_name: Alpha Beta AHA/BHA Daily Cleansing Gel

review_text: This completely dried out my skin after a few uses.  If you already are on the drier side I would not recommend this cleanser.
product_name: Confidence in a Cleanser Hydrating Facial Cleanser Serum

review_text: It smells and feels great on the face, it really gets make up off effectively. It’s very gently too and doesn’t leave my face dry. Truly wonderful!
product_name: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Face Cleanser

review_text: I can feel the difference after taking for a month.   Definitely a game changer.
product_name: Mini SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: Smells amazing, feels luxurious. Worth every penny
product_name: Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: I have dark circles and used this for a couple of months and it didn’t do anything for me but really moisturize. I really wanted to love it especially since it’s so expensive
product_name: White Lucent Anti-Dark Circles Eye Cream

review_text: This is my third bottle. I love how it makes my skin feel so smooth afterwards.
product_name: A+ High-Dose Retinol Serum

review_text: Complimentary from Tatcha. Lightweight SPF from one of my favorite skincare brand, I love that it has skincare benefits. I’m combination to dry and some SPF clings on to my dry patches & this doesn’t.
product_name: The Silk Sunscreen Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: I received this product as a complimentary from Kora Organics. This is my first product from them and it’s not going to be the last. I was blown away how this removed my makes up. This dual-phase cleansing milk gently removes dirt, oil and make up. It will leave your skin clean, soft and noticeably smoother. It is formultaed with different oils that is for cleansing and nourishing our skin with a rich source of essential fatty acids. Thank you Kora Organics! I highly recommend this product.
product_name: Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: Tried the fine lines and wrinkle one and it does work, VERY temporarily. I used them on my smile lines a night before a  night out and the results were almost gone. Next time I will use closer to the event itself. Worlds well and might repurchase but not regularly.
product_name: Focuspot Micro Tip Patches

review_text: They sent me another Shiseido cream basically the same as the other, the difference between one and the other is that it has spf 20 sunscreen and the other is a normal cream to moisturize your face. and contains hyaluronic acid red. It works good it hydrates  my skin.
product_name: Essential Energy Hydrating Cream

review_text: This product is proof one doesn’t have to spend tons of money on expensive creams to get actual results. I know certain ingredients to look for when purchasing a product. Hyaluronic acid is a tried and true component for skincare. This eye cream is amazing, hydrating and I felt instant results. Definitely a win!
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: The RESIST Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50was gifted by Paula’s Choice for my honest opinion. I’m enjoying using this product. It’s not thick and goes on smoothly. It has SPF 50 but does not have that SPF smell. It absorbs quickly and is slightly hydrating; it can be worn under other products. It’s light weight and feels like nothing is on this skin.
product_name: RESIST Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50

review_text: I love the look of my skin after I put this on, and I love the feeling of it on my skin even better. I just wish the bottle was bigger! The product seems to go by fast, so you can’t use it on large areas daily unless you stock up on a bunch of them.
review_title: Awesome, but not a lot of product.
product_name: Glow Stick Sunscreen SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I received this product complimentary from influenster in exchange for my review. This made my skin feel really smooth and nice, not at all greasy! I can’t wait to use it long enough to see results! Thank you influenster!
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Serum

review_text: Doesn’t Feel like it cleaned my face at all and  sent is overwhelming .
product_name: Mini The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: This moisturizer feels really nice. It is a little on the heavy side and it comes out white so you really have to rub it into the skin, but it does brighten my skin color and enhance it just a bit. It does leave my skin soft and smooth all throughout the day and to think it’s also protecting me from sun damage I love it even more! I recommend this product 10/10!!
product_name: SHIKULIME Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30

review_text: This is a great face wash for acne prone skin or normal combo skin. I love that it has salicylic acid and azelaic acid. Those ingredients are amazing to get rid of acne or prevent acne. It made my skin feel soft and fresh, a little goes a long way! Can’t wait to keep using this.
product_name: Acne+ 2% BHA + Azelaic Acid + Niacinamide + AHA Cleanser

review_text: Game changer! I’ve used MANY eye creams through the years and I have found my holy grail. It goes on smoothly a little goes a long way and my wrinkles GONE!
product_name: Noni Radiant Brightening Eye Oil

review_text: I’ve been using this product every night for a month. It is very thick so I only need a little. It blends onto my skin so smooth! Great moisturizer! My combo skin has a very even tone with no break outs! The cream does have an earthy smell, but I’m very outdoorsy so I didn’t mind it!
product_name: The Afterglow Deep Moisturizing Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Vegan Collagen

review_text: While I did enjoy this product, it did leave a slight white cast on my skin which was shocking as I am already pretty pale. Otherwise I enjoyed it and used it under makeup!
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Mineral Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: Super nice on your skin! It really helped with texture! Definitely recommend. However, for sensitive skin like myself I would suggest once a week or gentle rubs!
product_name: Overtime Mask

review_text: I love how the packaging is so different and unique! I love this face scrub mask I feel like it dose the Jobs so good I got this in a influencer box! The only thing I don’t like about it is that it does not have a smell at all!
product_name: SATOCANE Pore Purifying Scrub Mask

review_text: It worked a miracle on my hormonal, cystic acne. Instead of a month battling a huge, unpoppable zit, it was treated in 2 uses and healed in a week.
product_name: Drying Lotion

review_text: I really was being optimistic with this product. I used it faithfully morning and night for weeks. I saw absolutely NO results whatsoever. It didn’t do anything bad, but it definitely didn’t do anything at all. Some reviewers are saying perhaps the good results are from the massaging motion of putting it on - if that were true, anything would work. But even that doesn’t do anything for my puffy dark circles. I took this product back and have pretty much decided if you have dark circles like mine, nothing works. Oh well, I am content to know this is who I am and will live with it for now. Good luck to others - I hope this or another product can work for you :)
product_name: White Lucent Anti-Dark Circles Eye Cream

review_text: Received as a sample. Not impressed at all. It did nothing. I’m 57 and I have tried so many products. It left my eyes dry.
product_name: Needles No More Wrinkle Smoothing Cream

review_text: Dr. Jart is typically a great skincare brand and I should have known this would be another great product. It makes my skin feel so clean and leaves it looking refreshed and glowy. I’ve had noticeably larger pores from wearing masks and this serum has made a difference already and it’s only been a week! I used the purifying mud mask the other night and used the serum after and my skin looked so beautiful.
product_name: Pore Remedy PHA Exfoliating Serum

review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this moisturizer. It quickly absorbed into my skin, leaving it feeling fresh and hydrated. The light scent is non invasive and quickly disappears. I love using this both morning and night, as it helps hydrate my skin overnight without any additional products. Knowing that this is all plant based makes me feel better about using this product!
product_name: Melt Moisturizer with Bakuchiol and Squalane

review_text: I’ve been using it for about a week and see some of my fine lines disappearing
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Serum

review_text: This mask is the best mask I’ve ever used! It really exfoliating which I love because sometime chemical exfoliants don’t do it for me and I really need a good manual exfoliation to get off all the dead skin. The mask is also super cooling which I love because of my rosacea and sensitive skin. The mask is expensive but really worth it! (You also get a sample of the monoi face glow with the mask)
product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: So so good. Very smooth and lightweight, and not greasy at all. New favorite sunscreen!
product_name: The Silk Sunscreen Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: I really like how gentle this scrub is. Perfect for putting on before you get in the shower and then rinse off in the shower!
product_name: SATOCANE Pore Purifying Scrub Mask

review_text: I think this a good moisturizer, but it was a bit too thick for summer.
product_name: Vitamin C Glow Moisturizer

review_text: The C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Cream is very good, This has brightened my face, it feels very smooth. Love this product it smells so good and has a nice texture, My skin looks more radiant after using it. Gifted by Sunday riley.
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review.  Overall, I think it’s a great moisturizer! It smells good and not too overwhelming. It also works quickly and I could tell that my face seemed hydrated and the skin seemed more firm. I’m taking away a star though, because it is definitely not for sensitive skin types. I felt a slight burn after applying this product and my skin was a little irritated. Sad that I can’t add this to my daily routine. However, I did let a friend try/have it and she had great results and no irritation! She is very happy with it, but if you have sensitive skin it may not be for you.
product_name: Mini 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream

review_text: I LOOOOOOVE THESE!!!!!!! They are so soft on your face but really get the job done. It isn’t harsh on the skin, it leaves it feeling so smooth and nice. I use 3-4x a week!! I received these for free but I will be buying again and again. highly recommend
product_name: Peptide 21 Amino Acid Exfoliating Peel Pads

review_text: This mask did nothing for me. I was completely unimpressed. Glad it was a sample and that I didn’t spend the money on a full size product.
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: I was recommended this by an employee due to my skin being super oily. My skin’s oily appearance has significantly decreased from this and my skin isn’t dry. I’ve tried 4 different brands before and this has been the best!
product_name: Omega Water Cream Moisturizer

review_text: This product is hydration in a bottle. Love the pretty yet simple blue packaging with a very easy to use pump applicator. All you need is 2 pumps of this lightweight serum. I love applying it at night and I wake up with soft skin every morning. After 1 week of nightly use, I’ve noticed improvements in the overall texture of my skin. Love that it’s a clean beauty brand, love the highlight ingredients, and that there’s no added fragrances. I received this product as a free sample but opinions are my own.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Hyaluronate Serum

review_text: I really enjoy trying new toners as I find it to be the easiest step in my skincare routine and the best absorbed. Prior to using this I used the ordinarys toner and though I found it to work well  for tightening poresI didn’t feel like it did anything  for My acne prone skin. The tea tree oil in this toner is the best thing ever, it’s antibacterial, cooling on the skin, great smelling and doesn’t leave a film on the skin. I received this product complimentary of influenster and am so grateful.
review_title: Tea tree oil is the way to go
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: I was gifted by Benefit Cosmetics in return for an honest review. I think it smells clean and washes nicely without striping my skin. They only thing is I would recommend this for oily skin because I have dry/combination and it felt extra dry. Other than that I think its a great addition to their collection.
product_name: The POREfessional Good Cleanup Foaming Cleanser

review_text: This calms my skin like nothing else. My skin is hypersensitive, and almost anything can cause a reaction - but when using this consistently for a night or two, it always balances out. It’s absolutely a staple in my routine. Can’t recommend enough if you have sensitive/dry skin.
product_name: Ultra Repair Hydra-Firm Night Cream

review_text: This moisturizer is amazing! I love how cooling it is to the skin, it restores my moisture barrier while also helping with irritation after dermaplaning. This product does have a very light scent. I definitely recommend this!
review_title: A new staple in my routine!
product_name: SHIKULIME Mega Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: It lasts a long time, I’ve been using it every night for about three months and still have half the product!
product_name: D-Scar Scar Diminishing Serum

review_text: It’s a staple piece. I love the scent and the glossy look
product_name: Menthol And Eucalyptus Lip Balm

review_text: I absolutely loved this moisturizer. As someone who lives in the Midwest, we deal with super dry winters. Thanks to this moisturizer, my face is the one area of my body that isn’t struggling to hold in moisture. I was worried that it would clog my pores due to how thick it is but that just wasn’t the case at all. I use this in the am & a little extra before bed, & I haven’t had any blemishes in the month I’ve been using. Typically I purchase non scented skincare products that are in direct contact with my face. This has a pleasant scent that didn’t seem to bother my skin. I would still like to see an unscented version. My one complaint is price point. At nearly $50 for 50 mL, I’d love to see this in a larger bottle. I believe 100 mL for the $48 is more reasonable for most folks especially when this bottle can easily be used up within a month - month & a half. Yet still, 5 stars for me.
product_name: Ceramidin Skin Barrier Moisturizing Cream

review_text: This is the best eye cream I’ve ever tried! I love how luxurious it feels and the fact that it covers my dark circles is just wow! No scent which is great, I have sensitive skin so this is a perfect eye cream for me!!
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin C Eye Crème

review_text: I have been using this on my smile lines and four head for the last 2 weeks. I like the tingly feeling of it working. I am definitely seeing a difference in my smile lines, I’ll keep you posted after a few more weeks of use.
product_name: Needles No More Wrinkle Smoothing Cream

review_text: Nice toner! Would recommend for combination skin. Glad they’re more tea tree oil options
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: I highly recommend this cleanser. I’ve been using it for a few months now and my sensitive skin feels great with it! It gently washes without drying it out! I love this cleanser and will keep buying it!
review_title: Great for dry and sensitive skin!
product_name: Mini Truth Juice Daily Cleanser

review_text: This serum really packs a punch! Glycolic Acic + Retinol is like an anti-aging dream team. This serum sinks in quickly and leaves skin feeling hydrated without being sticky or tacky. It works quickly too; I noticed my skin looking smoother and more even within a few days of use. If you have sensitive skin I’d take it slow with this. This serum is no joke!
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Serum

review_text: Gifted from Moon Juice. These vitamins are really nice. I wish I didn’t have to take 4 a day. But Im general a big fan. It used adaptogens thst I’ve never used before and I liked how they made me feel in the long run
product_name: SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: Love the packaging of this product, nice and modern. This serum is perfect for dry skin that needs extra hydration and glow! Nice clean scent.
product_name: Squalane + Copper Peptide Rapid Plumping Serum

review_text: As the title says, this is a really good serum. I have always loved Biossance and they are the of the few brands that actually have never irritated my skin with any of their products, this serum included. This serum really helped hydrate my skin especially during these dry winter. It made my skin look much more plump and healthy. With that being said, I gave this serum a 4 star because this serum is expensive. A little goes a long way however but still $68 is steep. I would wait til Sephora brings out their 20% coupon. Other than that, it is a great serum especially if you like Biossance.
review_title: A Really Nice but Expensive Serum
product_name: Squalane + Copper Peptide Rapid Plumping Serum

review_text: My skin absorbs it quickly. It’s not tacky at all and It works so well under makeup too. It helps to smooth texture and does not break me out. Love how it smells!
product_name: Noni Bright 12% Vitamin C Serum

review_text: This moisturizer is luxurious and rich, but it’s just too much for me. It’s my fault. I thought I had dry skin, but I’ve realized I have normal/sensitive skin that I wasn’t taking good care of. This product was overkill for me and I’ll sadly be returning it. The scent is lovely and it goes on beautifully. It might work as a weekly night mask.
product_name: Vinosource-Hydra SOS Intense Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: A lot of serum for the mask. Can use twice. Does provide smoothness and softness
product_name: Pitera Facial Treatment Mask

review_text: Hated the scent.  For the price tag, there are better creams out there than this one.  Didn’t like the thick paste-like texture or consistency as it was hard to scoop out of the jar and spread on my face.
product_name: GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Cream

review_text: I liked how easily it melted into my skin after I applied it all over my face. I wasn’t expecting that because other sunscreens are too thick and don’t melt into my skin as fast or at all! This is a 2 in 1 moisturizer and sunscreen which I absolutely love. I just wish it came in a bigger size but i would still recommend of course :)
product_name: The True Cream - Aqua Bomb Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: I didn’t care for these pads. They broke my skin out. I do think they are very moisturizing but after using them for a month I didn’t see any differences in my skin other than it breaking me out. I do have sensitive skin though, so maybe it would work better for other people. They are convenient but a pass for me personally.
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Peel Pads

review_text: I repurchased this three times. I use it under my make up on my dry flaky horrid skin. Really helps. Doesn’t break me out. Like the way it lasts forever. Not for oily skin. Great for mature skin
product_name: Moisture Surge Overnight Face Mask

review_text: Been trying this on and off for about 2 weeks now. I like how easy it is to apply. Also I try to wear sunscreen daily to protect my skin from the sun and from early aging. I thought it was decent. I didn’t love it just for the fact that it can be greasy and I have oily skin as is. I usually wear something more mattifying. It’s good it does have a scent so if you don’t like scent you probably won’t like it. It’s very mild so I didn’t have a problem with it. I had never tried this brand so it was nice to try something new. I’ll continue to use it up and hopefully end up purchasing myself.
product_name: Invisible Physical Defense Mineral Sunscreen SPF30

review_text: This stuff totally works! I tried it for 2 weeks now and can already see clear improvement in my skin texture, softness, plumpness, subtlety and even color! If nurtures my tired and winter chapped skin to a perfection!
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I was so excited to try a sample of this after reading reviews, and it lived up to the hype! I purchased the full size immediately. I have a lot of issues with uneven skin tone/redness due to acne scars and I’ve noticed a HUGE difference in two weeks with this product. A little goes a long way, if you use too much it can make your skin look super oily. I only use it at night for that reason and have found that I don’t need additional moisturizer on top of it. A lot of reviews I read complain about the smell. It is a little “earthy,” but I don’t find it overpowering or offensive.
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: Love this product. It’s refreshing and I like the orange smell. Works well on my poor old skin
product_name: High-Potency Night-A-Mins Oil-Free Resurfacing Cream with Fruit Derived AHAs

review_text: I love this lip oil I wear it and it looks like my lips are glazed it smells amazing and glossy with out drying my lip’s definitely would  repurchase this gloss !!!
product_name: Cherry Treat Conditioning + Strengthening Lip Oil

review_text: I just wanted to add a disclaimer first, I have never tried any other tanning products before, so I have nothing to compare this to, but WOW! I am not allowed to tan due to sirgery scars, so this is an awesome find. I was very nervous to try this, especially with it being clear, and me being a noob to sunless tanning, but I am so glad I tried it. I personally love the smell, not chemically, or artifical at all. It went on very smoothly, and I made sure to follow the directions exactly by moisturizing and expoliating the night before. I also used their tanning mit which worked great. The color is beautiful, no streaks and not orange at all. I camt wait to try their facial drops as I was too nervous to apply the foam to my face for a first timer. I also applied a smaller amount than reccomended incase I messed up, so Im sure with the right application the color will come out darker. I will be adding a second coat tonight.
product_name: Glow Clear, Color Correcting Self-Tanning Mousse

review_text: Really nice consistency and good application. Haven’t used it long enough to see the results beyond moisturizing, but it’s definitely good at that.
review_title: Provided a sample, will buy in future
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: This cleanser is the best out there for my almost 50 skin. I was amazed to see Amy pores thoroughly cleaned after only one use....I follow up with it’s toner...My skin feels and looks like I have a facial...glows, pink and rosy, healthy feel and glow. Must try.
product_name: Essential-C Cleanser

review_text: I’m not a fan of this product, but I have friends that love it, and that it works for them!
review_title: Not for me but still good
product_name: PRO Strength Lactic Pore Treatment

review_text: I love this stuff. It is very thick and feels a little tacky at first but my skin feels so soft and moist in the morning!
review_title: This Overnight Mask is terrific stuff!
product_name: Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask

review_text: I received my order yesterday and plopped this on last night before bed...and WOW! Not only does it feel amazingly soft & moisturizing, but I could instantly tell a difference in my fine lines. I woke up this morning and even received 2 compliments on how “glowing“ my face looked today! I ordered the trial size with my Sephora points, but I will definitely be ordering the full size once I get low. I would absolutely recommend this!!!
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: The La Mer Treatment Lotion gives my middle age skin instant hydration. The lotion quickly absorbs into my skin, leaving it looking fresh and hydrated.  Gives my face a radiant glow right after. Definitely adding to my routine.
product_name: Mini The Treatment Lotion

review_text: I didn’t really notice a difference with this product but that doesn’t mean I didn’t like it. The price point is a little bit high though especially since I didn’t notice much of a difference with my soggy bags
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: Love this this product, defiantly a staple to my morning skin care routine. Doesn’t make your face look shiny or oily, doesn’t clog pores, works great under makeup. I use it all over my face and neck everyday.
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: Definitely on top of my list of favorite products! I’m almost 30 and I am loving to try wrinkle products as a preventative. I love how it’s very lightweight! Also it tingles very little, it doesn’t bother me at all. I love using this at night before bed time. I recommend to everyone who’s looking for a great eye anti aging cream!
product_name: Needles No More Wrinkle Smoothing Cream

review_text: AMAZING stuff. Helps with calming irritated skin, can be used as a very lightweight moisturizer (hint: use as AM moisturizer where your mask goes to prevent acne) and works well for sensitive skin. Love it.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: This product has good ingredients in it! It also made my acne clear up so fast definitely recommend! I did receive this item as a free product.
product_name: KOSHIRICE Acne Calming Spot Treatment

review_text: Small to use as recommended. Have been using sparingly for a month. Just as a wash. Have not noticed a change at all.
product_name: Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub

review_text: I received this product in the Trendmood First Aid Beauty Box and I love it!  It is actually making my skin smoother and plumper after just two days:) I will definitely be purchasing it again!
product_name: Ultra Repair Firming Collagen Cream with Peptides and Niacinamide

review_text: While it a good exfoliant, I don’t really notice much difference in brightening.
product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I have a deep wrinkle between my eyebrows and this stuff is amazing at filling that line in. I’ve been using it daily in the morning for about a month now and noticed that the line is less deep looking. As other people said, there is a warm sensation when you first apply it, but it goes away quickly. I also have very oily skin and have had no problems with breakouts as other people had mentioned. I would definitely recommend this product.
product_name: Powerful-Strength Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I love the KORRES Hydra-Biome Probiotic Superdose Face Mask! It is the ideal mask to use post-sun, post-hangover, post-flight, and generally whenever your skin needs to be soothed. It didn’t make me breakout or inflamed - which is so nice
product_name: Greek Yoghurt Probiotic Superdose Face Mask

review_text: I would definitely say this product smoothed out my nose. Didn’t do anything for my chin or mouth area but made my nose smoother than silk. Used twice
review_title: Smoothed my nose blackheads, skin is silky
product_name: PRO Strength Microdermabrasion Blackhead Eliminator

review_text: After using this Moisturizer for a few weeks, my incredibly dry flaky skin is absolutely glowing. I have it consistently where the skin around my mouth flakes off, and this moisturizer has never caused that! Its incredibly thick and creamy and almost needs to be massaged into the face but overall a great everyday moisturizer!
product_name: SHIKULIME Mega Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: These are easy to use, and contain helpful ingredients to break down ingredients in your food and help your metabolism. They remind me of a mint almost! I am hoping that I see progress in the long run.
product_name: Mini Flatter Me Digestive Enzyme Supplement

review_text: Super You is an easy way to incorporate four adaptogenic herbs (shatavari, ashwagandha, rhodiola, and amla) into your daily routine. Simply add to capsules to your daily supplements and voila, you now have natural calming and mood support.
review_title: Easy way to add adaptogens to your routine
product_name: Mini SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: Formulation has changed making the product even better.  I have not purchased this product in over 2 years b/c it was slightly thick, which made it difficult to apply makeup over the sunscreen.  I recently purchased this and found it to be more liquid, which is great for makeup application.  The product is a sheer application on the skin now and it’s not dry or greasy, just feels invisible on the skin.  I wear it alone on top of my moisturizer.  Sometimes I mix one drop in with my tinted moisturizer for a perfectly smooth application.  I definitely use it every day.
review_title: Different formulation makes it perfect for makeup
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: I Love this product, It works like magic and make my skin so soft and keeps it vibrant. It’s perfect size. I recommend this Scrub.
product_name: Yo Detox Charcoal Face & Body Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I am not usually a fan of facial sunscreen for the simple fact that they are normally thick and greasy feeling on my skin. This product is definitely better than many others I have tried. While it is still a bit thicker than I would like, it does absorb quickly and doesn’t leave my skin feeling overly greasy or oily. It barely has any scent which is a plus. I prefer to have sunscreen in my foundation. If you are looking for a sunscreen that is separate from your foundation, I feel like this is a good choice. It’s definitely better than most others on the market today.
product_name: Invisible Physical Defense Mineral Sunscreen SPF30

review_text: I love how this moisturizer keeps my skin well hydrated while also adding beautiful radiance to it. Its lightweight gel formula soaks in very fast and doesn’t contribute to my t-zone oiliness, which is super important for an AM moisturizer. I’m also impressed with how it gradually improves my skin texture - my pores and whiteheads seem to be less noticeable. And last but not least - it smells so delicious (kind of citrusy-fruity). Overall it’s a wonderful moisturizer that both feels and works great!
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: At first glance this just looks like fancy vaseline but it is beautifully soothing on irritated or raw skin.  The honey is healing and the incredients are beautiful for healing irritation.  I’d recommend this for even the most sensitive skin for everything from healing a pimple, wind burn, chapped lips, over exfoliation.  I had a cold and put this around my nose over night and it helped with the redness and flaking.  You only need a tiny amount.
product_name: Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve

review_text: Look, I don’t write that many reviews.... But these seriously work!!! I had fine lines under my eyes that I was so self conscious about and it basically completely got rid of them.
product_name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask

review_text: Clarifies my skin, has a soothing effect. I like the smell too. Would actually rate it 4.5 as it doesn’t impart a glow to my skin as some of the other Caudalie products do.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: I received this product sample free. Although the cleanser and moisturizer weren’t my favorite things, this toner though! It absolutely does what its supposed to do. My face felt cleaner after using it and although it dries out quick, it feels very effective. I will definitely buy this.
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: CLEARS MY ACNE WHENEVER I BREAK OUT seriously in love w this 😭🫶
product_name: Mini Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

review_text: I love sugar products! However this product ended up irritating my lips a little and drying them out unlike the original sugar one I usually buy. With the price of the product I expect it to work amazing. It did smell really nice and have a great creamy texture going on
product_name: Sugar Mint Rush Freshening Lip Treatment

review_text: Removes all my make up and leaves my skin clean but, not dried out. Creamy texture and not much scent. Not a fan of the packaging.
product_name: Total Cleans'r Makeup-Removing Cleanser with Barbados Cherry

review_text: I have only used this a few times so far from a sample I received but seems to works great for super dry skin. Leaves it feeling so soft, smooth & hydrated. Will definitely purchase this.
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: I use their moisturizer and this face wash. I have very sensitive skin and I’m allergic to a lot of products, but this one is quite nice to use daily. I don’t find it dries me out, I usually use it in combo to their confidence in a moisturizer. I have rosacea and this does not trigger it whatsoever. I actually think its one of few products that do help with keeping it at bay. Sometimes I add a little bit of coffee grinds to give myself a nice exfoliation too. I have been using this for about two years w/ the moisturizer.
product_name: Confidence in a Cleanser Hydrating Facial Cleanser Serum

review_text: I do have somewhat oily skin and this didn’t make my skin worse I think it helped. This product clean’s the skin and gets any makeup left over that I had on my face. Didn’t cause any breakouts. Skin felt super smooth afterwards.
product_name: SHIKULIME Gel-to-Oil Cleanser

review_text: I was so excited to see what Benefit Cosmetics would be launching as a part of this new campaign! I love the concept of a flash facial. Most of us are on the go and don’t always have time to go in for one or spend a long time on skincare. This makes it quick, easy and effective. My makeup lays on well after I do this! Complimentary from Benefit Cosmetics.
product_name: The POREfessional Speedy Smooth Mask

review_text: I love this cleanser, it takes off all my make up after one wash.
product_name: Total Cleans'r Makeup-Removing Cleanser with Barbados Cherry

review_text: - I apply a small amount around my eyes and smile line- doesn’t have any scent and feels light weight- makes my skin feel soft and smooth- great for preventing those wrinkles
product_name: Needles No More Wrinkle Smoothing Cream

review_text: Complimentary from Sunday Riley. Love the light citrus scent (naturally derived), and bouncy gel texture. Instantly absorbs and leaves skin looking smooth and slightly dewy. Vitamin C, hyaluronic acid and antioxidants, this noticeably brightens my skin.  Absolutely love this moisturizer!
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: This stuff works really well. It is a glue-like mask that you apply and let dry, and as it drys, it pulls your skin tight. It works REALLY well... if you use it in small amounts. If you use too much, it does make your wrinkles go away, but it also starts cracking and leaves a dry white flaky film in places. I use a tiny amount, about 1/2 a pea size, and wet my finger tips slightly. I rub it around with the water, thinning it slightly, and then apply it quickly all over my forehead, so it goes on in an even layer before it starts to dry. I use it over my moisturizer and BB cream. I drys very matte, which is awesome. Makes my fine forehead lines and 11’s disappear! :D
product_name: Instant FIRMx Temporary Face Tightener

review_text: Gives skin great hydration! Price could be bit lower, but overall I really like this product for rescuing skin in the winter.
product_name: Lotus Youth Preserve Rescue Mask

review_text: I have tried many products for dark under eye circles. This is just one of them that does not help at all. 4 Stars because it really works well as a moisturizer. Not too heavy. I still continue to use it since I bought it and am stuck with it. I will continue to search for a solution for dark under eye circles after I am done with this. Hope there are better ones out there!
review_title: Does not help with dark circles
product_name: Eye Doctor Moisture Care For Skin Around Eyes

review_text: I got a free trial size in one of the Sephora favourites boxes and all I can say is that it went on my face once, then got washed back off and into the garbage can it went. It had an extremely unpleasant oder to the serum that is difficult to describe, but it was really pungent. It also made my skin burn slightly so that’s when I decided to re-wash my face and chuck the serum. The one star is only because it has decent packaging, especially for a trial size, otherwise, I would rate it as 0/5 stars.
review_title: Terrible and pungent smell, skin felt like burning
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Glow Serum

review_text: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL! I received this complimentary for testing purposes and I am so THANKFUL! It is the most luxurious moisturizer I’ve ever used. The texture is like velvety air. Super light weight, a teeeeeeny tiny bit goes a very long way, so use LESS.
product_name: SKINPOWER Cream

review_text: This mask is amazing! I have redness in my skin . Also had a bad reaction from a mask that had caused acne on my skin. This mask is thr only thing that helped clear it up and calm down my skin. I absolutely swear by it now and even use it as an overnight cream. Love waking up with clear/soothed skin. Highly recommended!
product_name: Evercalm Ultra Comforting Rescue Mask

review_text: I bought the Starter kit with the cleanser, toner and face cream and I wanted to love it so bad but I was so disappointed. 😩  The cleanser does not remove makeup like the ads say, I found that even after a double cleanse, I still had makeup and mascara coming off my skin with a baby wipe. I will say that the formula smells amazing and is nice and creamy but I would not call it a total cleanser at all. If you’re looking for a nice cleanser that also removes makeup then I recommend the Tatcha rice cleanser!
product_name: Total Cleans'r Makeup-Removing Cleanser with Barbados Cherry

review_text: I am so sad they discontinued the old formula. This new formula is so disappointing and cannot even be compared to what used to be. BRING BACK THE OLD FORMULA!
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This stuff is amazing. It’s so gentle on your face and eyes and does a fantastic job of getting your make-up off. Once you do this and follow up with your second cleanse, you’ll see how clean your face is. Love it!
product_name: Vinoclean Makeup Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: I love this brand and I am obsessed with the Good Genes product, so I figured I would give this stuff a try, and I love it! Way more gentle on the skin than prescription retinol, yet still effective.
product_name: A+ High-Dose Retinol Serum

review_text: I love this for temporary lip plump!! An added benefit is that it turns your lips a slightly pink shade. I love using it.
product_name: Platinum Lip Plump SPF 30

review_text: My complexion is more vibrant and glows, skin feels smoother, and my blemishes are not as visible. I can’t tell if it helps with my fine lines yet.
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Serum

review_text: With my larger pores I was really excited to try this. I love the lather and clarifying aspect. My face feels clean but not dried out. No scents or weird ingredients. I would definitely recommend. My new face wash!
product_name: The POREfessional Good Cleanup Foaming Cleanser

review_text: Dermalogica gifted me. This is such an amazing set from my favorite brand Dermalogica. First I use Precleanse and cleansing oil which deep-cleanse the skin & removes dirt, impurities, and makeup, while leaving skin feeling fresh and clean. Then I use Daily Microfoliant which gently exfoliates the skin and remove the dead skin. It is gently enough for daily use to improve the look of skin’s texture. Finally I use Skin Smoothing Cream which is a silky moisturizer which locks in the hydration and moisturize. This is such a perfect set to get healthy and glowing skin. I am glad I got this to try and would highly recommend this to everyone.
product_name: Discover Healthy Skin Kit

review_text: Fantastic product!!!!! There are a few products that I do not want to be without and this is one of them. My skin feels great after each use!!! It is amazing!
product_name: Irish Moor Mud Purifying Black Mask

review_text: Im still on the fence about this supplement. There were days when I really felt focused and less stress but there were other days that I didnt see a difference at all. For the price I have to say that I dont think its life changing enough to pay that price.
product_name: Mini SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: I love this product, it definitely works! Absorbs quickly and is very glossy. Not drying and no tingly feeling. I’ve only used it on my lips, but it works great! Makes your lips feel rejuvenated.
product_name: Menthol And Eucalyptus Lip Balm

review_text: I received this product free from Murad in exchange for an honest review. I REALLY do like the product. It does exactly what it says it does - I am naturally very shiny and this kept me shine free in our hot Florida sun. I like the rich creamy texture too! I have worn it both under makeup and as a daily sunscreen on makeup free days, it is also capable of being reapplied without caking up.
product_name: Oil and Pore Control Mattifier Broad Spectrum SPF 45 PA++++

review_text: The only sunscreen that actually makes my skin look better after applying it. This doesn’t leave a white cast, plumps your skin, and does not irritate my super sensitive skin whatsoever, a common occurrence with sunscreens. I use this and the Krave Beauty one, but I think this is just a little better.
review_title: The only sunscreen that makes my skin look better
product_name: RESIST Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50

review_text: I have the complete Dermalogica set now - and this moisturizer is the cherry on top for me! This was gifted by Dermalogica. My skin feels hydrated, soft, and fully protected for whatever my day will hold. I’ve found ever since masking for over a year, that my skin is much more prone to breakouts - helloooo maskne - and I haven’t found a moisturizer that lives up to my standards. Consider it found now! I love this smoothing cream!
product_name: Skin Smoothing Cream Moisturizer

review_text: I am in love with this dermalogica skin smoothing cream! This amazing product goes on super easy and does make your skin feel incredibly smooth and hydrated.  I haven’t yet tried a dermalogica product I haven’t loved! My face upon on applying in the morning before makeup makes my face feel amazing all day long it really lasts! A little goes a long way and your makeup will glide on effortlessly! Dermalogica products are 5 stars and I adore this company and their products and my skin thanks you.
product_name: Skin Smoothing Cream Moisturizer

review_text: This is one of my new favorite products for my sensitive, congested, dehydrated skin. Unlike a lot of products, this one does not sting my face when it is compromised from using too many actives. I really like how it balances my skin and gives it the moisture it needs while repairing the barrier.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Lotion Moisturizer

review_text: I haven’t really noticed a difference using this product. I will update my review if this changes. I have sensitive skin, and this product did not irritate it.
product_name: Cryo-Recovery Depuffing Eye Serum

review_text: It’s very expensive and doesn’t work! So disappointed!!
product_name: Focuspot Micro Tip Patches

review_text: I’ve been using this for about a month and my skin is softer, blemish free (scars aside) and a little goes a long way. You really don’t need more than a dime-size because it’s both a toner and serum, so it’s a bit thicker than regular toner. Bottom line: Love it and it’s now a permanent part of my skincare routine.
product_name: Fat Water Niacinamide Pore-Refining Toner Serum with Barbados Cherry

review_text: This great smelling luxurious mask makes my skin feel supple, firm and more hydrated. Whether it really helps to lift and firm is another question but how my skin looks the next morning makes me believe that it does just that. Another great scent of blended tea and other great ingredients that are good for your skin.
product_name: Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask

review_text: I wanted to like this as I normally love Summer Fridays, but I just couldn’t get past the glitter/shimmer in this product. I found it to be very visible, like I had gold glitter fallout all over my under eyes. Will be returning.
product_name: Light Aura Vitamin C + Peptide Eye Cream

review_text: I really enjoy how gentle and non-irritating this is for my skin. It melts make up right off and leaves me feeling clean and refreshed. The only downside is I feel like I have to use this multiple times in order to get all of my make up off which I totally don’t mind because it is so gentle!
product_name: SHIKULIME Gel-to-Oil Cleanser

review_text: Love this face lotion!! It feels light and gives me a beautiful glow. My skin feels hydrated. It blends easily and it doesn’t make my skin feel oily or greasy! Made of all amazing and safe ingredients, no scent, perfect for anyone with sensitive skin. (Like me) There was no harsh fragrance which  really appreciate. I received this complimentary from Cay Skin. This product has a whipped texture and applies very smoothly. It has a little bit of a tint that was noticeable right away.
product_name: Isle Glow Face Moisturizer SPF 45 with Sea Moss and Niacinamide

review_text: This product feels amazing on my skin. I have used it alone. Then also paired it with the after glow. I personally like to use the moisturizer first then apply the oil after for extra radiance. After using it for a few days I can already tell that my skin is so much softer!  The smell is very hemp like. But where this is made with CBD oil I feel like that’s expected. I’m excited to see how my skin looks with further use.
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: So I wear Estée Lauder Double Wear foundation every day and need a good cleanser to take all of it off. I normally start with a cleansing oil (DHC) and then double cleanse with Vanicream. Even doing that still leaves some foundation on my skin so I have to wipe off the remaining foundation on my skin. Since starting to use this Dior cleanser, I still use a cleansing oil for the first step of my nighttime routine, but I’ve noticed I don’t need to wipe of remaining foundation leftover after using the Dior cleanser. I only wish there was a smaller travel version I could take with me on trips.
product_name: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Face Cleanser

review_text: Received free for review purposes from influencer. I compared these to the mighty patch dots. I think they worked well. I will use the pack up. I think I would stick with the mighty patch as they seemed to work a bit better. I could not use this under makeup as it didnt lay completely flush. They were thinner than mighty patch though which was good. No irritation or sensitivity.
product_name: Salicylic Acid Acne Day Dots

review_text: I received this product to try for free from Influenster. Overall it was a hydrating eye cream, but it didn’t do much else. I usually like products that will hydrate and help with wrinkles, but with this, it just was hydrating. So, if thats all you are looking for, you will be happy with this eye cream.
product_name: Ceramidin  Eye Cream with Niacinamide

review_text: I apply as soon as I start to see a pimple. Leave on overnight, by the time I take off the pimple is reduced in size and redness. Dots are very thin , compared to other pimple patches .
product_name: Acne-Clear Invisible Dots

review_text: This is THE BEST mask I’ve ever used.  I have hormonal, cystic acne and rely on a mask to suck out the gunk on the regular.  I’ve been using this for at least 10 years.  I’ve tried others, but none are quite as good.  It does a great job of pulling out toxins and balancing oil.  But it does NOT dry my skin.  Bonus - you can use as an overnight spot treatment.  Put a little dab on a blemish and it will help dry it overnight. Lasts forever!
product_name: Mini Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: I love their vitamin c serum, so I was so excited to try this cream! I enjoy using it in the morning and at night. My skin has a healthier glow with a nice plumping firmness to it.  It’s an essential for  everyday routine!
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I like the consistency. Not oily and thin and a little bit goes a long way. However, it has that sunscreen metallic smell which i hate. you can’t smell it when you first put it on but probably after about 20 minutes you can definitely smell it, which makes me feel like my skin is dirty, even if it isn’t. if it didn’t have that smell i would give it five stars.
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: I was excited to test these facial wipes out for influenster.  They worked pretty well keeping my skin but was a little too potent for my sensitive skin. It made my skin burn, especially if I was in direct sunlight after using.  They were great for traveling though and I’ll use them weekly instead of daily for my nighttime skin care.
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Peel Pads

review_text: Ok this moisturizer isn’t for my skin type (I’m oily skin) BUT It works very good. I love it, this make my skin so smooth but not oily
