product_name: SHIKULIME Mega Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Don’t buy-- smells bad and is very sticky feeling on the skin. Not worth this much money at all.
product_name: Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: Ive never written a review before so i hate that my first one isnt great but i just didnt see/feel a difference in my skin after using this mask. Sephora has some staple products but this just isnt one of them.
product_name: Instant Masks

review_text: This is the only product that has helped the eczema I get on my eyelids and under eye area! It works so well on all parts of the face while still being gentle and non-comedogenic so it doesn’t clog my pores or cause whiteheads or anything. I also haven’t gotten any milia around my eyes like some eye creams can cause. The dry flaky skin was gone almost immediately when I used this, then the redness after a day or too, and the swelling along with it. I can finally wear concealer without dry patches and eyeshadow without crazy swelling from the irritation. It feels so soothing, and won’t ruin your makeup as long as you wait for it to dry before applying… but I haven’t tried to layer it over the top of makeup yet so I’m not sure about that part. Basically, I cannot recommend this enough for sensitive/puffy/red/dry/flaky eczema eyes. It’s a tiny miracle that I’m always going to keep with me now. Holy grail product!
product_name: Eczema+ Dermatitis Face Balm

review_text: Quick way to get a ‘fake’ glow. This stuff is amazing! I’m fair with olive undertones and this tanner is so nice for those winter days when I’m looking like a vampire and want some colour. I recommend buying the mitt for this as it does help with application. I usually apply this directly onto the mitt and then gently massage onto the skin and be careful to not let Product sit at all on the skin without massaging it in as it stains and can make you look blotchy. I used this last year a few days before a wedding I was a bridesmaids for and with 3 days of careful application I had such a nice tan that it looked like I went away for holidays. Will repurchase once I run out.
product_name: Self Tan Classic Bronzing Mousse

review_text: I got this cleanser as a free gift. I absolutely love it. I have dry skin, and this cleanser doesn’t strip my face. the texture of my has impressed just after one week of use. I highly recommend this product.
product_name: The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: Ok, at first I did not love this.. I am use to a liquid serum that is smooth, this one is gritty - however, after using this for a few days I can already tell my skin is brighter and it’s doing its job! I actually like the tingly feeling after putting it on.. it makes me feel like it’s actually doing something for my skin. I mix this vitamin C after the Hyaluronic Acid and before Caffeine Eye Cream.I received this product for free or complimentary for testing purposes
product_name: Vitamin C Brightening Cream

review_text: Myself & my two teenage daughters have used the old formula for years, so we were nervous about the new product! It took forever to find the corresponding shades on the Supergoop website, and I almost gave up. Fortunately the 230c matches the old Light/Medium shade. All three of us like the buildable coverage, it doesn’t break us out, and gives a dewy finish that can easily be toned down with powder if we want. We can even use it around our eyes without issue.
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I just got this product and i had to try it right away since we are at the end of winter my face has been pretty dry but this makes my face feel like a million bucks. It doesn’t have a smell in my opinion which I love for my face at night. The packaging is on point and beautiful and I would definitely splurge and buy this for my nightly routine after I’m done
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: I received this product as a free sample and I love it so far! I tend to get dry skin because I use a benzoyl peroxide facewash and this has helped a lot. It combats that “itchy“ dry feeling without making my skin too oily. In terms of packaging, the lotion comes out very easily so you don’t have to worry about squeezing it too hard and getting too much (and wasting it!). At first, I was worried I wouldn’t like this product because it is sort of hard to spread which sometimes makes it feel heavy. So far I don’t feel like it’s too heavy--it’s done a good job of making my skin feel softer and more hydrated without making me feel like I need to keep applying it. I haven’t noticed a change in my pores yet but hoping that comes with more use.
product_name: Oil and Pore Control Mattifier Broad Spectrum SPF 45 PA++++

review_text: Feels silky and luxurious! It’s not your average gel and it’s not your average lotion. Subtle fragrance that is not overwhelming. Goes on magically and behaves like a high-end primer. Absorbs quickly and completely. I’m ready for makeup immediately! This saves me a step.`
review_title: A silky and luxurious start to my day!
product_name: Confidence in a Gel Lotion

review_text: I’m very familiar with dermalogica’s exfoliants, this one is by far my favorite! I love the lather it creates, It’s very gentle yet still effective and doesn’t have a strong scent. Gifted by dermalogica
product_name: Daily Milkfoliant Exfoliator

review_text: I and my sister have used it over the past 3 months and have noticed it isn’t hydrating enough for our combination skin ( Hers more oil mines drier) and it doesn’t look the moisture that well as when I woke up the next day I needed more moisturizer, and it’s just too lightweight I would recommend to continue using your usal moisturizer like the cereve moisturizing lotion or others
product_name: Water Sleeping Mask with Squalane

review_text: I’m shocked these have such mixed reviews but I guess not everything works the same for everyone. I’ve been using these patches for a few years and have had great success with them. They stick to my skin overnight (make sure it’s clean and dry) and they always take care of the problem!
product_name: Focuspot Micro Tip Patches

review_text: This moisturizer IS NOT for people with skin concerns, it made me break out. This is just a novelty moisturizer for people in their teens with absolutely ZERO skin problems.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Pink Juice Oil-Free Moisturizer

review_text: The product was nice, moisturizing, and it was light weight.  It worked well with my sensitive and combination skin.  The thick and creamy texture is great to use during the cold and brittle winter months.
product_name: Nourishing Moisturizer with Prebiotics

review_text: I have been using this in Edmonton, AB in a dry, cold climate and have not been impressed at all by this cream. It clogs my pores, does not leave my skin feeling hydrated, and I am overall unimpressed with it considering it was $100+. I would return if I could. I would not recommend this to anyone.
product_name: Mini 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream

review_text: I am 23 and have been battling acne on my cheeks for the past 5 years. The type of acne I have is not caused by oil because my skin is dry. I’ve tried everything under the sun in terms of facial cleansers, but this is the first one that has actually worked in clearing up my skin. I didn’t think it would because I though salicylic acid is only for oily skin but it’s a miracle! I prefer the soap bar to a liquid cleanser because it’s easier to spread on my face. This, in combination with Juice Beauty’s blemish stick and starting a regular exercise routine really saved my skin!
review_title: I can't believe how well this works
product_name: Acne Solutions Cleansing Bar For Face and Body

review_text: It’s crazy how within 2 minutes for when I put this on my face I looked away from the mirror and instantly my redness in my skin started fading away. Yesterday I went to Sephora and one of the girls told me that cannabis helps with inflammation = treating redness! This whole day my skin has been red free and I’m obsessed with it!
product_name: Ultra Repair Oat & Hemp Seed Dry Oil

review_text: I really think it works at making the skin smooth! I actually use it at night on the back of my thighs and the skin looks way better, Skin looks very uniform.
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Peel Pads

review_text: I don’t see a difference. I was hoping it would live up to the great reviews but this is not the case
product_name: Premier Cru Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: love the smell and how smooth it glides on my lips. Keeps my lips moisturized for a long time!
product_name: Menthol And Eucalyptus Lip Balm

review_text: This mask is a really nice addition to my collection.  I have been using this every night for the last week.  It has helped clear up my oily zones (Tzone) and helps minimize my pores.  Sometimes I feel especially oily around my nose and cheek area, which I’ll then apply to just that area in the morning.  This helps a lot.  I really think this is the best mask out of PTR offerings.
product_name: Irish Moor Mud Purifying Black Mask

review_text: If you’re ok with scents, this is a great option for after cleansing. It’s not sticky, and absorbs into the skin quickly. I have dry & sensitive skin, and it made my skin feel moisturized and fresh. The texture is a bit runny, and you don’t need a lot. Would recommend to a friend who is looking for a moisturizing toner!
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: This eye cream caused an AWFUL rash under my eyes. Please take notice of all the reviews here of so many people having the same allergic reaction. This product caused burning, itching, dry patches, and a lot misery. Please do yourself a favor and do not purchase. I will never buy a product from them again!
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin C Eye Crème

review_text: So this is an awesome product.  I’ve used it a few times and it works great.  You can instantly see the results.  Just a note- it says to use a clean cotton ball to apply on the bottle, but I tried that and it didn’t work well, I use my finger tips and apply a generous amount - 2-3 pumps.  I also leave it on a little longer, 4-5 minutes.  Would I pay $88 for this?  Not sure, especially since my DE products have worked wonders on my pores, but it’s def effective!  I also love PTR in general, and this doesn’t disappoint.
product_name: PRO Strength Lactic Pore Treatment

review_text: I didn’t know I needed this till I got it! It leaves a very luminous finish on the skin but it dries down like in 15 minutes & the shine is gone, it goes completely matte but still hydrating.
product_name: Bright-Eyed 100% Mineral Eye Cream SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: I had never tried anything by Dr. Zenovia, but I decided to give this moisturizer a shot. I am SO glad I did! I have been using it for a couple months now and since I started using it, I have not had a single hormonal pimple. ZERO. I have pretty clear skin, but I ALWAYS get 2 or 3 blemishes right in the middle of my period. Knock on wood, this stuff stopped it from happening the last two times! The scent is very light and the texture is not too thin and not too thick. It absorbs well. I will definitely be rebuying this one!!
product_name: Aloe Vera Blemish Soothing Moisturizer

review_text: I’m really shy about doing mud masks. Many of them have weird ingredients that my skin doesn’t like such as Salicylic Acid or Dimethicone (silicone) so the congest and purge cycle becomes a horrifying mess on my face. I did a lot of homework and found this little gem. It did purge and I got a few very small blemishes that disappeared almost as quickly as they arrived, but I didn’t get the nasty cystic pimples that always seem to spring up after doing other mud masks with the aforementioned ingredients. I’m adding this to my routine twice a week to fight congestion. The pores on my nose are already less noticeable. It takes a very small amount of product since you are supposed to spread a thin layer on damp skin, so the price/value cannot be beat. This is a new favorite without a doubt!
product_name: Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: I purchased this looking for a sunscreen different from my usual Colorescience and EltaMD and thought I’d give this a try. I loved the glow-y look and texture, but not the fragrance. Wore it out a couple of times on a sunny day and wondered why my skin was red at day’s end. I checked the ingredients and discovered it had two citrus oils (bergamot & orange peel) in the ingredient list. Citrus oils can cause a reaction when exposed to sunlight, like a serious sunburn! My skin was red and itchy for days. Unfortunately, I can’t recommend this sunscreen.
product_name: Isle Glow Face Moisturizer SPF 45 with Sea Moss and Niacinamide

review_text: This is a daytime oil, it has a weird scent, but I do likeThat the oil isn’t heavy and can be used under makeup and doesn’t make your foundation look weird. But I’ve used this product for about a month and I do wish I had more time to give a proper review, but so my skin feels softer and looks smoother. My pores don’t look as big or pronounced. I like this product so far.
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I have been a Vitamin C serum user for many years as I really appreciate the benefits that it provides to my skin. I am 39 years old with dry skin that has some discoloration and melasma from pregnancy. I have used Skinceuticals vit c and had amazing results with evening my skin tone and brightening my complexion so I was a little skeptical to try something else. I have to say, I was very pleasantly surprised!! The serum is very lightweight and has a pleasant citrus scent. My skin soaked it right up and it didn’t leave any stickiness or tackiness to my skin. It does also feel like it’s hydrating. I have not had any bad reactions whatsoever and my skin has even improved. I used this for a full month before writing my review so I could give an accurate review of the product in case any delayed breakouts or rashes occurred. I have only good things to say. It’s great! I received this product complimentary for testing through Influenster.
product_name: Noni Bright 12% Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I loved the creamy texture of this eye cream. It went on smoothly and absorbed well. I didn’t have any irritation or watering eyes from it. My under eyes looked moisturized, de-puffed, and youthful. I can’t speak to any change in brightening since it’s only been a week so far of use.  But so far, so good!
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: I never thought I’d be so in love with a solid cleanser with my sensitive skin, but this is actually so much gentler than any liquid or foaming cleanser I’ve tried. Helps to control the oil on my nose without drying the rest of my face out. I bought the travel size 2 pack of bars first to try and those now live at my boyfriends house and in my gym bag. Between the three bars I feel like I’ll have cleanser for the rest of the year, if not longer. Such a good deal!
product_name: Pekee Cleansing Bar

review_text: La Mer is known for expensive skincare. Before trying The Concentrate I looked up some information about the product and brand to learn more. The history of La Mer is an interesting read. The main ingredients used in the products and the process in creating them explains why they are so expensive. But do they work? I have dry skin so this serum absorbs immediately into it. It is described as having a velvety texture and that is exactly what I thought when I first applied it before I even saw the description.  I’ve noticed an improvement in the skin barrier and would love to continue to use this, but I also think there are other skincare products that can do the same or similar at a lower price point. If you can, go ahead and splurge on this, but if you can’t, don’t break the bank just to try it. It is light, plumps skin, and has antioxidant benefits.
product_name: The Concentrate Serum

review_text: Make difference after day one, bright my face, always has compliments
product_name: Powerful-Strength Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I am so surprised that this actually worked on my skin! I have very strange combination skin that goes through phases of being super oily and then super dry. This saved me during a particularly bad dry phase, but surprisingly still works when my skin is normal. My skin has even gotten less oily since I’ve started using this!
product_name: Vinosource-Hydra SOS Intense Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: This cleanser is my absolute thing ever!!! Holy grail! A little goes a longgggg way! Definitely would repurchase 100000000 bottles of this when I run out!
product_name: Crème Radiance Gentle Cleansing Creamy-Foam Cleanser

review_text: KoraOrganics gifted me their new oil cleanser, It is a very gentle, and moisturizing cleanser, I use it as my first cleanse and does a great job removing my makeup/ sunscreen, it has a mild natural fragrance. I’ve been using it also as my morning cleanser, since is so hydrating and doesn’t strips my skin out. I really enjoy using this cleanser, it works great for my dry skin!

review_text: This is a clean and vegan product at Sephora which is a must for me ! It is such a good quality for a low price. It makes my skin glowy and super soft. It stays on all day and makes my skin feel very hydrated. I received this as a gift
product_name: All Day Hyaluronic Acid Hydrator Moisturizer

review_text: YES! This mask is amazing. I have 39 year old skin that is mostly clear but prone to congestion and breakouts around *that* time of the month. I finally ran out of the PTR sulfur mask I had been using (effective but SO drying) and decided to give this one a try. After just one use my skin looked clear and amazingly glowy, and I couldn’t believe how hydrated my skin felt—clay masks always leave me super dry. A few days later and the glow is still there, plus my pores still look tighter. And I dabbed some overnight on those couple of blemishes and it dried them right up! Where has this mask been all my life?!?
product_name: Mini Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: Super you was gifted by moon juice but I’d honestly buy this for my whole family and friends. I took this for about two weeks- after taking it for a week, i got my period and I usually get crazy cramps to the point where I can’t leave my bed but this time, I didn’t have cramps with no pain meds. Just super you in the morning! It also gives me right amount of energy throughout the day! I highly recommend!!♥️

review_text: I love this product since the first time I tried it!!!!! It is really hydrating and confortable to use. The smell is amazing and it lead my skin really soft! I would recommended this product to everyone

review_text: I am never overly impressed with masks, but this one does what it actually says. It exfoliates gently while removing dead skin and leaves skin glowing. review_text: These truly help boost my mood as well as keep me focused. I highly recommend.

review_text: This product has no identifiable smell so it’s easy to use on your skin. What I don’t like is how the consistency is just like water so it will drip quickly. When I pat it on my face it leave my hands super sticky. My face right now is sticky. I just put my chin to my shoulder and felt my skin do the stretchy thing when it’s stuck to something. The application is in the bottle pretty snugly so if you tip it over i doubt any will spill out. I imagine it’s that way because of its watery consistency. I definitely don’t see this lasting very long if you have to use twice a day and you have to use more because it’s so thin and spreads weird. I don’t think I’ll buy it again. But maybe it will make my skin the best it’s ever been. If it does, I’ll post another review of edit this one.

review_text: With the right moisturizer, this toner helped get rid of the dry patches of skin I get every year from dry winter air. A little goes a long way. And I did notice the pores on my nose shrunk. I’d buy this again next winter

review_text: Definitely made the area around my eyes softer and more hydrated. I’m seeing less fine lines because it instantly hydrates.

review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Dior in exchange for my honesty opinion and when I knew they were sending it to me I did some research on the Dior Capture Totale Le Serum and the claims were that there would be a significant change within 7 days of using this product so I legit tested these claims out! I added this face Serum to my night time skin care routine (I only used once per day) for 7 days straight. To be completely honest I did not notice a significant difference, the main improvement that I saw was it did even out the lines around the sides of my eyes a fraction. The main thing I was excited about was the claim of adding elasticity back to the skin, I have lost alot of weight over the last couple of years and I have been looking for a product that would help the little bit of loose skin on my neck, but I really did not notice a difference using this product. The product applied nicely and a little bit went a long way! I thought the smell was nice but pretty strong and although scented skincare products don’t bother me at all, I just wanted to point this out in case anyone reading this review might be sensitive to smell or scented products. I am still using it every night to see if there might be anymore improvement but I received the product on 12/14/2022 my 7 days ended on 12/21/2022 and I am writing this review on 12/27/2022 so I have been using it daily for 13 days and I still don’t really see much of a difference sadly. Overall a decent product but I don’t think I would repurchase.... I attached 1 picture after the first use (I’m wearing the lighter Grey shirt) and 1 picture after the 7th use (I’m wearing the darker Grey shirt) for reference.
product_name: Capture Totale Le Sérum Anti-Aging Serum

This is a serum with advanced radiance and lifting effect technology, that targets visible signs of aging and makes your skin appear smoother, brighter and makes your pores appear redefined. This serum combines two technologies to create a highly effective action on the skin. It’s a beautiful luxurious serum that I am in love with. This serum comes in a very luxurious bottle. It looks very luxurious on your vanity. Its defiantly a little pricy if you are someone who’s in the market to buy a new serum and don’t mind spending money then this is a product to try. product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: I absolutely love this eye cream! It’s a very thick cream so it stays put no seeping into your eyes. Very moisturizing, within 1 use it got rid of the dry flaky patch I recently developed under my eye. And made my skin feel super soft. I felt brighter and refreshed in the morning!
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: Y’all this is a really great product! It works!! The picture is 4hrs after application and I was indoors the entire time! Imagine if I was outside in the sun! The formula is perfect, not greasy and my skin absorbed it well. No streaks left on my skin either! The scent is Chef’s Kiss!
product_name: Gradual Tan Watermelon Daily Firming Lotion

review_text: Overall I LOVED this product! I am very petite and also have a small head apparently (even finding sun/glasses is a huge production b/c even the small/narrow frames look big on me) so sheet masks I often run into the same problem. But with this mask, because of its structure & flexibility, worked! Definitely recommend! And I got the brightening one, which did brighten my skin!
review_title: sheet masks not fit right? this does!
product_name: Cryo Rubber Masks

review_text: This sunscreen was not greasy, and didn’t typically leave that weird white opaque moisturizer on your face. It was scentless and I didn’t notice it under foundation.
product_name: Invisible Physical Defense Mineral Sunscreen SPF30

review_text: Great toner, feel like my pores look smaller, and my face just looked more even and dewy. No complaints, was happy after just one use.
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: Well I put this mask on my face and I really like how it felt and smelled. When I washed it off I didn’t notice any diffrence at all in my skins texture. If anything my skin was slightly drier. So overall it didn’t do too much. I feel like it would be awesome to put on a sunburn but I probably wouldn’t use it for anything else. Also it slightly irritated my acne :( I don’t love it.
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: For the price absolutely not. The quality was there but much better put there. It was light weight and neutral in smell.
product_name: That Big Screen Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: Gifted by Supergoop. I wanted this for the days I wear makeup and want to reapply spf.The nozzle didn’t get clogged and the mist sprays evenly.I didn’t experience any irritation around my eyes either and it didn’t disrupt my makeup either.  This works well!
product_name: (Re) Setting Refreshing Mist SPF 40

review_text: So this mask is legit amazing. As someone who has ridiculously sensitive skin. I was told it actually helps your skin feel less pain because of the mushroom extract that is in it. I used it for flare ups and irritation and it actually works. Within ten minutes, my flare up was pretty much reduced. Redness was almost gone. My skin felt hydrated but not oily, it just felt perfect and calm. This is a must have for anyone and everyone from oily to dry skin. And its a makeup artist must have cause I use it after my morning shower, before putting on makeup, and I actually have to use less concealer and foundation. If you have any doubts about this mask, just buy it and try it, I promise you won’t regret it.
product_name: Evercalm Ultra Comforting Rescue Mask

review_text: Sunday Riley really knows moisturizers, if you ask me. This is a beautiful vitamin c moisturizer, very hydrating, and good for daytime and nighttime use. I did notice a boost of radiance after a few uses but it’s still too soon to talk about brightening effects.
review_title: A very good vitamin c moisturizer
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve been using the 25SPF version of this for a year & it’s fantastic. I cannot use chemical sunscreens because they make me break out, this being a physical sunscreen is a godsend, no breakouts, no itchiness yay! Another review mentioned a bad smell, it does have a scent but it dissipates quickly, it doesn’t bother me. The best thing about this is that it keeps me from getting “sweaty face“ syndrome. You do sweat, but the beading of sweat & overall feeling hot in the face is minimized so this is awesome in the summer & working out. I don’t know how it does it but it minimizes the amount of sweat on the face & that’s why I LOVE it. A little goes a long way, blend it in WELL with your clean fingers let it sit for a minute & proceed as usual with makeup application. Makeup last longer, less “sweaty face“, controls oils (a bit but if you’re VERY oily look for a primer to help with that) this is holy grail for me. The amount of SPF could be higher but overall love this product! (note: I take medication that makes me hot, that’s why I have “sweaty face“ syndrome but if you’re menopausal or get hot easily you will like this too)
product_name: City Block Sheer Oil-Free Daily Face Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Primer

review_text: I have never been so excited to get a pimple so I could use this product ! They have a really good adhesive stick which is perfect for using overnight while sleeping. I did have to use it a couple days to really tell a notice but it did seem to help. I’d do receive this product from influencer in exchange for my honest review.
product_name: Salicylic Acid Acne Day Dots

review_text: I got a sample of this product and I love it. It does have a scent, but it smells like oranges and it isn’t too strong. I will definitely be buying the full size!
product_name: One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Orange Extract

review_text: Amo este tónico es eficiente en controlar la producción de grasa de cara
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: When I first started using this I had gone through the worst purge period. I really wanted to give up on this, but I’m so glad I pushed through. I’ve seen just a drastic change in my texture, and areas where I typically have most of my active break outs. I feel significantly more confident in my skin and I’ve already secured a second bottle for when this runs out. Obsessed is an understatement !!
product_name: Goodbye Acne   Complete Acne Treatment Gel

review_text: There was no harsh smell and no negative reaction. It spread very well, practically glides over my skin. Did notice “brighter” skin morning after first use. Would purchase in the future!
product_name: Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid

review_text: For the price, I  was expecting more. This night cream is rich and moisturizing, but it is nothing out of this world. I  tried to replace all my products for this cream and I  would wake up with dry skin. It is a good cream, but only as a last step in your skincare routine.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Night Cream with Triple Ceramide Complex

review_text: I am a compulsive skin picker which has resulted in numerous pitted and wavy scars on my face. I got this to see if I could flatten them out any. While this is no miracle product, some of the less severe scars are very slightly better.
product_name: D-Scar Scar Diminishing Serum

review_text: I used this product for 6 days straight  and it causes dryness, and painful tiny white heads on my chin and nose. The larger pimple on my nose is very painful. Will reduce use and see if that makes a difference.
product_name: Tranexamic Acid Hyperpigmentation Treatment

review_text: Gets all the makeup off and smells great! Would highly recommend
product_name: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Face Cleanser

review_text: I love Glow Recipe so I was very excited to try this new product! This serum glides and absorbs into the skin so easily. It does help blur the pores because it deeply hydrates the face. It doesn’t necessarily act like a silicone primer but helps minimize the appearance of pores by giving the skin that quick hydration. It works well under moisturizers and well under makeup so I def will be using this on the daily. Plus lovee that it has BHA to cleanse the pores!
review_title: A great product to prep before makeup!
product_name: Strawberry BHA Pore-Smooth Blur Drops

review_text: Was really hoping this would be a miracle worker for my long standing hormonal breakouts. Unfortunately, this hasn’t been the case. It cleans and removes my make up just fine but getting rid of my break outs, it has yet to do so after 3 weeks of continuous use (at night before bed and a gentle facial cleanser in the morning).
product_name: Acne+ 2% BHA + Azelaic Acid + Niacinamide + AHA Cleanser

review_text: I have been using this a few weeks and I found the perfect sunscreen for me. I love that is also great for aging. I put it on before my makeup and it absorbs really quickly and leaves my oily skin matte. My makeup looks great.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Mineral Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: Lovely lightweight moisturizer.  If you are very dry it won’t be enough alone.  The smell is absolutely delicious.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Pink Juice Oil-Free Moisturizer

review_text: Since summer is starting I have been looking for a new favorite self tanner at home! I normally pay to get a spray tan but just wanted something easier! This is it! The application was so smooth and dried quickly! It didn’t make a mess and came out beautiful and bronze not orange!
product_name: Self-Tan Luxe Whipped Crème Mousse

review_text: Influenster Time!!! I haven’t used this as often as I would like to, but every time I do use it (about one or twice a week) my skin feels SUPER SOFT!!!  I haven’t noticed skin imperfections being minimized, but one of my employees said the my skin was literally  GLOWING!
product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: This is now my Holy Grail sunscreen for the face. Algenist is so lightweight and goes on so smoothly. It does have a matte finish so I feel good wearing it by itself and knowing I won’t look shiny. It feels so silky that I can go without using my foundation primer on top. I then apply my powder foundation and looks great. My makeup wears very well during the day. I have very oily skin so this feels so lightweight and my skin feels soft after I put it on. Also I’m a darker-skin Latina and this sunscreen doesn’t look ashy on me. It blends so well and disappears into my skin. I would highly recommend this sunscreen. I wish I could give it 10 stars.
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: I really like these patches, they blend in with my skin really well that you cannot tell I even have it on. I do think it does a good job at getting rid of acne but more of the cystic spots will need multiple treatments but so far I’ve had nothing but good experience, the only reason it is getting 3 stars is the price point. $19 for only 20 stickers? That’s seems like a lot especially when I can find the same thing for half the cost that works just as well! *received this product from influencer for my honest review
product_name: Salicylic Acid Acne Day Dots

review_text: I have a slight amount of rosacea so I though this would be a good idea. I also love the No makeup, make up look. However, although the coverage is fine. It makes my face greasy midday. Towards the end of the day I have no product left. Won’t repurchase.
product_name: Cicapair  Tiger Grass Camo Drops Color Corrector SPF 35

review_text: Unfortunately, the results of this product are not cumulative. I will not repurchase this item. I’ll pay any amount if a product delivers but in this case, I need results that are longer lasting. As soon as you wash your face, you’re back to where you started. No visible improvement for me.
product_name: Needles No More Wrinkle Smoothing Cream

review_text: This product was just OK.  I’ve used these types of regiments for my skin before and really, this was no different than any other one.  I really expected more out of it than what it provided.  A disappointment
product_name: Discover Healthy Skin Kit

review_text: Makes my skin look so awake and refreshed! For someone that doesn’t have too much time to do skincare and masks this is a must will defiantly repurchase! I received this item to try out!
product_name: Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid

review_text: Obsessed with this product!! This is the second Algenist product that I own and I’m very impressed! This sunscreen is so light & luxurious; it feels like you have nothing on! It also comes with great anti-aging benefits. I put it on right after my moisturizer and my face almost has like a powder-like feel. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and I haven’t had any skin reactions which is surprising with my oily skin. Get this! You won’t be disappointed! A little bit goes a long way!
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: The best!!! My pores look visibly smaller after use. I mask about twice a week.
product_name: Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: There aren’t many products I would endorse as a must have but this serum is the real deal. I’m justifying the price by saying, it’s a wonderful moisturizer, so I use less of the moisturizing creme. velvety soft finish means no need for primer. Plus the reduction in fine lines used over a two month period means no fillers.  Love this product!!
product_name: The Concentrate Serum

review_text: I love these dots so much- they are my best friend, especially around my period time. I didn’t try makeup over it because I just wear at night when I sleep. They work great!
product_name: Salicylic Acid Acne Day Dots

review_text: This scrub is so good I threw out my other face wash! My face glows- it has never looked better. The only problem is that it “exfoliates” the skin on my fingers too from scrubbing and now the tips of my fingers hurt and it’s all blistered and peeling off in huge chunks.
product_name: Yo Detox Charcoal Face & Body Enzyme Scrub

review_text: This is an awesome mask for sensitive skin. I definitely noticed some brightness on my skin without any breakouts. I have a combination (mostly towards dry , sensitive skin)
product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I’m honestly really loving this facial essence! It leaves my skin feeling tighter, glowy, and totally refreshed. From the first moment opening the box I knew I’d love it. The completely recyclable/compostable packaging made my eco-friendly heart sing, and when I realized that the bottle was fully recyclable (with a metal cap, too!) my fate was sealed. I knocked one star off because the bitter aroma is a bit much at first, and if you’re sensitive to smells just proceed with caution. But otherwise this brew packs a powerful punch in a small, but mighty (and eco-friendly) bottle!
product_name: Ferulic Brew Facial Treatment Essence with Lactic Acid

review_text: I’m brand new to self tanning, and all IOP products I’ve tried so far (mousse & drops) have been awesome! You definitely need to exfoliate and moisturize dry areas before applying your self tan. The best tip I’ve seen is to use an old kabuki brush to buff out wrists, feet, hands, etc. after applying your tan. Its helps your tan blend so well!
product_name: Glow Clear, Color Correcting Self-Tanning Mousse

review_text: I’ve been on the hunt for a good eye serum for quite some time now. I love the way this one makes my under eyes feel - so hydrated, plump and ready for anything makeup I want to layer on top for the day.
product_name: Total Eye Lift Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Eye Cream

review_text: This cream is heavy and rich but settles like a light weight lotion. Leaves skin moisturized and has a slight fresh scent that would be unnoticeable to some. Love it!
product_name: Polypeptide-121 Future Cream with Peptides and Ceramides

review_text: I have super oily skin so this is a bit too thick for me personally. However, I have been using it at night and I really enjoy it.
product_name: Mini 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream

review_text: This glow face lotion gifted by Cay Skin is so nice. It make my skin look glowy without making me look metallic or glittery. I used it under my makeup as well and it gave me a glowy finish. I love it and I’m going to keep it in my routine now.
product_name: Isle Glow Face Moisturizer SPF 45 with Sea Moss and Niacinamide

review_text: I love this mask!! It’s really nice for hydrating the skin and when you put it on your face at first it gives a nice cooling effect. It’s so easy to use and since it’s not charcoal it’s really easy to wash off. I do it whenever my skin is really dry or when I want to be relaxed and I’m in love with the results. I also have combo skin where it’s oily in my t zone and dry by my cheeks, the mask hydrated and doesn’t give me acne I love it!
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: Very calming and moisturizing for my dry skin. I use this both in the morning under my moisturizer/ spf and in the evening.
product_name: Emerald Hemp Seed Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: Wanted to LOVE this. I have extremely sensitive skin and was looking for something to help during the dry winter months. This seemed promising, it feels hydrating between the fingers. However, it was incredibly difficult for me to spread onto my face. The amount of rubbing and smoothing required to get this to absorb seemed excessive and just irritated my skin more. Additionally, even with several minutes of massaging into my face, I still felt a somewhat sticky residue that was unpleasant to the touch and that I didn’t really want to layer makeup over or sleep on my pillow at night. Sadly, will be returning this.
product_name: Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve

review_text: I love the pump on this compared to my other vitamin c’s which use a dropper- way easier to apply. I like the added protection of SPF, makes me feel protected when working from home if I just want to use this and moisturizer in the morning. Definitely recommend for ingredients and protection. Will definitely use in the summer when I’m outside more
product_name: Daily Dose Vitamin C + SPF 40 Sunscreen Serum PA+++

review_text: This is such a lightweight but effective product! It feels like there is no makeup or oil left on my face at all after use. Definitely worth the money for this product. I use it every night when I am taking my makeup off.
product_name: The POREfessional Get Unblocked Makeup-Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: It was a nice face mask, had a great smell and left my skin feeling very hydrating and smooth. Not sure if it perfected my pores but I liked it
product_name: Clean Face Mask

review_text: I recently moved to the desert and needed to adjust my skincare routine.  I was recommended this oil when I was at Sephora.  I liked the smell, felt very natural and pure. I did not feel like I was getting enough moisture from it though.  It did feel calming to my skin which was a plus but I really needed more moisture.
product_name: Emerald Hemp Seed Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: I love Kiehl’s. I tried a set from them a few years ago and I’ve been hooked ever since. This product did not disappoint. I live in a city that has is warm most of the time, but the winter drop just happened. This mask was great. It looks pretty solid in the container, but it is actually soft and then melts onto the skin rather well. I love squalene so I’m glad this mask contains it. I would definitely buy this again.
review_title: You need this for the winter
product_name: Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask with 10.5% Squalane

review_text: The smell of this was amazing! It didn’t have that traditional sun block smell. It was also not heavy on the face when applied!
product_name: The True Cream - Aqua Bomb Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: I have VERY angry skin. I get cystic acne that flares up when I use a different product. This sunscreen doesn’t make my akin react at all. Love it!!
product_name: City Block Sheer Oil-Free Daily Face Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Primer

review_text: I am a Caudalie addict. It started with the book, then the Vinoperfect serum... and now this! I am 27, have combo skin. I am really into natural products, preventative aging, & antioxidants. This essence reigns supreme! Sprinkle a few drops onto fingertips and press into skin after cleansing. It’s been day 5, my pores are smaller, skin tone more even.
product_name: Vinoperfect Brightening Glycolic Essence

review_text: i use this every night before bed i find that it hydrates my skin through out the nights and gives my skin a glowing look. i received this product for free for testing purposes and it’s wonderful after i am done using this bottle i plan on purchasing more!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Mist

review_text: This product is awesome - one of the most affordable and hydrating hyaluronic products I’ve used. It has a slightly cooling effect when applied - I use it daily with a face oil after and it’s kept my skin plump and hydrated. Love it!
product_name: All Day Hyaluronic Acid Hydrator Moisturizer

review_text: I remember when I would get certain oils for my skin all the way in Hawaii.  I would either stock up while I was visiting or I would have a family member grab some for me.  Noni oil was definitely one of them.  So to receive a product that has this oil as one of the main ingredients made me shake my okole . These are amazing products to really brighten your skin as well as improve your skin’s texture. I have seen a difference in the  appearance of my skin for sure but I want to wait see what using it for a longer time period would do for my skin. The fragrance of the Noni Oil and Vitamin C Serum is very mild.  I would have wished for something a little more, but that’s my preference. I know most skin care companies try not to use to much fragrances but I wish there was a bit more of a citrus smell in the Vitamin C Serum.  Other than that, I really don’t have any complaints.  What really impressed me was that Kora Organics created a filtration process using Rose Quartz for their all their products. Bringing good energy infused products is unique and impressive Thank you @influenster and @koraorganics for sending my these products complimentary for review. #contest #complimentary #noniglow
product_name: Noni Bright 12% Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I really like this product. My face feels clean after use and I noticed that it reduced the appearance of white heads on my nose. I will definitely recommend this product.
product_name: Mini Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: This face mist is so soft and subtle and left my skin feeling refreshed! The soft scent is perfect and not too strong and left my skin hydrated! I highly recommend this product!
product_name: Brume de Beauté Beauty Mist

review_text: I was in a pinch and used a drugstore sunscreen and didn’t realize it had fragrance in it. I woke up the next day with horrible dermatitis all over my face - I mean, ALL over!! It was bad. My skin was never so itchy, red, or blotchy in my life. I knew Farmacy made this honey salve and so I knew it was time to buy it. While at the store, I also bought Skinfix’s Eczema+ balm for the worst areas on my face. I gently massaged the products into my skin 3 times today and my skin is already mostly better! I’ll continue using this over the weekend to heal my skin 100%, and of course I’ll keep this handy for any and all skin repairs I may need to do.
product_name: Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve

review_text: Just bought this product tonight and I’ll return tomorrow. It was too perfumey and sticky for my taste. It felt like it was sitting on top of my skin and it made my skin turn red. I wished it off because I felt like it was going to break me out.
product_name: Vinosource-Hydra SOS Intense Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: I got the full size eye cream from Influenster. have been using it for 3 days day and night and haven’t noticed any changes. it may be too soon, but I’ve used samples from other brands that I can feel the difference from the first time. although the package is really nice, I don’t like when I have to touch my face creams with my bare finger, I have less expensive eye creams that come with a pump, or by squeezing it. besides, their tag line is “beauty has no expiration date“ so I couldn’t find any expiration date anywhere in the package. I wouldn’t spend $48 on this eye cream
product_name: That Fresh Take Eye Cream with Peptides

review_text: I really enjoyed using this product. It is from a brand that I know and trust. It left my skin clear and clean feeling. I would recommend it to others.  It formed when washing and helped reduce aging. My pores were not clogged resulting in them in being very smooth. Skin looks very healthy.
product_name: Acne Clearing Skin Wash Cleanser

review_text: I have been using this for months and couldn’t figure out why my makeup looked so dry. After trial and error, found out it was this! It also made ZERO difference in my dark circles. Smells nice, but that’s it.
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin C Eye Crème

review_text: I have been using this product for a few months and I like it. I have been using different VitC products for years and switched to this one to save money. I have used vitamin C serums that I much prefer but for the price this one is good. I have dry sensitive skin and find this product non-irritating. I also like the way my skin looks after application, it is mildly greasy but gives the dewey effect. I am considering switching to a higher potency product to see if I have better results.
product_name: Ascorbic Acid 8% + Alpha Arbutin 2%

review_text: it worked like most sheet masks. Good but nothing amazing. I was excited for the bubbles, wore it for 10 mins and nothing ... oh well.  I know my skin was dry and had dead patches, I had some flakey patches which my foundation highlight very well.
product_name: Sheet Masks

review_text: I loved this moisturizer it’s become part if my daily routine. It really keeps my skin hydrated all day love how smooth my face feels after applying this. 10/10 recommend
product_name: SHIKULIME Mega Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Love the refreshing citrus scent of this cleanser! It cleans skin very well and after two weeks, has improved brightness. Careful though, I have dry skin and need to follow up immediately with a good hydrating serum and moisturizer as I find the cleanser strong and feel like it strips my skin a bit
product_name: Truth Juice Daily Cleanser

review_text: Moon Juice is the bomb! It’s a great value too, you get 3.3 oz for only $39, thats alot of product and it’s still concentrated enough for great results. Alot of similar AHA products go for at least $60/oz or even .5 oz. I highly recommend this and will purchase again.
product_name: Acid Potion AHA + BHA Resurfacing Exfoliator

review_text: This product made my skin look better and more refreshed. I was confident using it because the ingredient list showed many natural components. Most importantly for me it is made without alcohol and fragrance that I don’t like in any of my beauty products. These exfoliating pads is a good addition to my skin care routine because they help tackle dark spots and do peeling. Would recommend this product !
product_name: Resurface+ AHA/BHA Niacinamide Exfoliating Pads for Face and Targeted Body

review_text: I’m in the test run for essences. The effectiveness of this product with its price is just right. It made my skin soft and hydrated my skin, it lessened me from breakouts except from my hormonal acne. It is a runny consistency compared to other essences that I have tried. I only use it at night bcoz I use a different one in the morning. It goes a way, I bought mine November 2017 and I only finished it 2 wks ago. It is a good buy worth your bucks!
product_name: Vinoperfect Brightening Glycolic Essence

review_text: One of my all-time favourites! I use this less as a mask and more so as a gentle exfoliant every few days and let it sit on my skin just while I brush my teeth or for a 1-2 mins. I find my skin becomes softer and has a nice clean feeling. I personally love the pumpkin smell, but can see how some may not. Packaging is kinda wasteful near the end of use-I feel like some product does get wasted.. soI usually use a q-tip to get remaining out (LOL). Overall, highly recommend!
product_name: Overtime Mask

review_text: Leaves my skin feeling clean, soft, moisturized and unbelievably radiant. It’s my favorite mask of all times!
product_name: Lotus Youth Preserve Rescue Mask

review_text: I had high hopes for this product, especially based on the other great reviews. Sadly, it did not work for me. I have oily, sensitive, and acne prone skin. This product broke me out....not horribly, but I did get a lot those little pimple bumps. It was also a pain in the butt to apply over my moisturizer. I think if you have clear skin this might be an awesome sunscreen. Wouldn’t recommend otherwise.
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: Great all natural sunblock it  could have higher percentages of each but I also love the pale yellow skin color  it works well with my complexion which is fair Irish it dissipates so I think it would also work fine with darker skin colors also it’s not too drying which is great and it leaves a lovely glow which I wanted I don’t want a matte sunblock which is very aging instead this just leaves a light glow which is just perfect and it works well under makeup
product_name: City Block Sheer Oil-Free Daily Face Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Primer

review_text: I tried this product on two different types of breakouts. Regular pimples and hormonal breakouts before and during my period. I found that it helps the hormonal breakouts a lot more than it does for regular breakouts as it did nothing for my occasional pimples. This is a great and promising product! gifted by Murad Skincare*
product_name: Deep Relief Acne Treatment with Salicylic Acid

review_text: I just turned 39 and I’m trying to be very diligent in my skincare routine. I like that this not only protects my skin from the sun, but also contains hyaluronic acid. I’ve used it under makeup and outside by the pool, & it has worked great in both scenarios this far.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Mineral Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: I am forever on a quest for a face sunscreen with high spf that plays well with my other skincare products and doesn’t break me out. At first, this seemed like the one. But oh my goodness, what a complete packaging fail! I had read the other reviews and thought people might be overreacting - I should have listened. The bottle has never left my bathroom counter and the label is still flaking off all over my hands every time I touch it. Really heartbreaking because the formula is great, but it’s basically unusable unless you want tiny bits of purple all over your face. Might try salvaging the rest by putting it into another container, but I won’t be purchasing again unless the packaging changes.
review_title: Skip this unless the packaging changes.
product_name: The Silk Sunscreen Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: i love this sunscreen! the bottle has such a cute bright color. i’m happy that this is no scent sunscreen! it goes nicely on the skin and protected me from the sun. Would definitely buy again and recommend it to everyone!
product_name: The Sunscreen - 100% Mineral, Broad Spectrum SPF 30 with 20% Non-Nano Zinc, Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: I moved from the east coast to the mountains and my skin would not adjust. The wind and elevation aggravated my eczema and for the first time in my life it showed up on my face. My medication wouldn’t work. I received this serum along with the peeling pads and moisturizer for free to test from Influenster and after 3 weeks my eczema cleared up, I have moisturized skin and can finally feel confident without makeup on OR simply wearing makeup that doesn’t look terrible on my skin. This is SO worth the money!
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Serum

review_text: I received this gift complimentary from Paula’s Choice! I love the consistency of this product! Leaves my skin looking & feeling amazing! I have oily skin and I didn’t have issues with this product; it didn’t look or feel oily! BONUS it has spf and doesn’t leave a white cast and protects you from sun damage! This is definitely a must have moisturizer if you have oily skin!
product_name: RESIST Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50

review_text: Doesn’t strip✅ Smells great✅ No irritation✅ basic ✅ Lather✅ Hydrating✅ it’s a basic cleanser and it’s become one of my favorites as of now!! If you YTTP cleanser, this one is so similar!! but better!!
product_name: Squalane + Amino Aloe Gentle Pore-Minimizing Cleanser

review_text: This is my new favorite moisturizer. My skin is so hydrated and smooth. It’s feels plump and youthful.
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve been using these products for about five days and I’m already running out, I would like to give this a good review because I hear a lot of good things about these products,But unfortunately they don’t even give you enough product to do a proper trial to see if you even like the product or if it even works for your skin
product_name: Discover Healthy Skin Kit

review_text: My skin type combinated sensitive , area around the eye gets kinda dark and dull sometimes. Texture of the eye creme is as if you make banana smoothie so creamy and rich yelowish .. has no scent . After applying it has slightly cooling effect for 60 seconds. I never used Vitamin C enriched skincare before and decided that banana eye bright creme just what I needed  , especially since it been part of the promotion from the Influenster app! After applying area around the eye feels fresh and lighter giving me a look like a slept for 10 hours . Good absorbency . Could be used with no problems as moisturizer and or a base for concealer. I love love love the new formula !
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin C Eye Crème

review_text: My skin feels so hydrated and soft! My pores have reduced as well. Love this product! It smells amazing! I have sensitive and dry skin and it works well for me.
product_name: Fat Water Niacinamide Pore-Refining Toner Serum with Barbados Cherry

review_text: I wasn’t sure about this product as I have naturally oily skin, I thought using an oil base facewash would make it worst. However, I have to say that I am pleasantly surprised! I use this cleanser as the first step in my double cleansing routine. My skin has been extremely soft, and healthy since I added this product to my routine.
product_name: Mini Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: Clean, easy to use, does not peel/pill with actives underneath. Firms came up to make moisturizer/sunscreen an easy application. Love it!
product_name: Triple Peptide Hydrating + Firming Oasis Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. It was a very small sample so I’m unable to testify to the benefits of this product in the long run but it’s very light weight and for my sensitive skin, not irritating.
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: I was gifted by Moon Juice. This product is honestly so amazing. I’m always a bit apprehensive with trying supplements but I can truly tell the difference with this one. Adaptogenic mushrooms are so good for you and these are the exact ingredients you need to kick the days butt every day
product_name: SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for the last week after removing makeup. It removes dirt and oil great from the face without leaving my face dry and lifeless. The smell makes me want to wash my face again. It’s a thin gel consistency easy to use a large amount of product.
product_name: Mini The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: I was lucky enough to be gifted by Influenster & Gucci to try this wonderful product. Gucci’s Brune de Beauté mist is a luxurious spray of heaven. It contains black rose oil which has soothing & antioxidant properties & hyaluronic acid which we know is a superhero for hydration. It provides our skin with that beautiful youthful glow. Combined with the black rose oil, the results are amazing. The packaging is absolutely luxe. It is as exquisite as it’s formulation. A heavy glass bottle with a lavish gold cap it screams extravagance. 10 out of 10 for packaging. The mist is beautiful & remarkablely hydrating which creates a glamorous glow. It is a light mist in my opinion but covers very well. The fragrance is of a distant rose floral scent that reminds me of spring time. Far from offensive to the nostrils or any cause for irritation concerns. Though of course you may want to do a skin test. Brune de Beauté is a formulation from the skin Gods. My only flaw with this would be the price. Other than that, this is a HOLY GRAIL in the hydrating mist world. A definite must try!
product_name: Brume de Beauté Beauty Mist

review_text: This is a great product for you if you have dry skin or if you live in cold areas like I do in Chicago cold harsh winter my skin has never felt so refreshed and hydrated before
product_name: Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask with 10.5% Squalane

review_text: So I had to write a review! This is my favorite eye cream  by far. The texture is smooth and creamy. You don’t have to use a lot as a little goes a long way. I have been using consistently for about 3 weeks. Immediately upon application my eyes feel relaxed and hydrated. I have noticed my eyes are less puffy and dark circles less visible. I would definitely recommend this product.
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: I love this mist in the summer when I have makeup on and want a little refresher. Cools my face and makes me feel refreshed. Love this mist!
product_name: Brumisateur Natural Mineral Water Facial Spray

review_text: I received complimentary from Kora organics Berry bright eye cream. I got to say the small package was hard to open but the reward for what’s inside is amazing.   I have dark circles under my eyes due to lack of sleep. After 3 days I received a compliment which was really nice. It’s thick & creamy and don’t require alot to moisturize the under eye. The box was a little small for the container but it fit just right. And I love how the package has refillable pods.
product_name: Berry Bright Firming Vitamin C Eye Cream

review_text: The product smells wonderful and the texture is good And leaves skin smooth after use. but after about a month of using this twice a week my skin has never looked worse. Very broken out and the texture feels dry and rough and discoloration seems worse than ever. The formula and scrub seems to have made my skin very sensitive to the summer sun even with plenty of spf on.
review_title: Wanted to love it but it’s way to harsh
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: Snagged this because after not wearing foundation forever due to quarantine, my skin reacted very poorly when I tried to use it again and broke out immediately. I needed a substitute that wouldn’t interfere with my skincare routine (so trial and error with BBs and CCs wasn’t an option). Love this stuff! Instant color and no transfer onto my pillowcases. I use about 2-4 drops every other night and mix it with my Sunday Riley face oil. Note that I have olive-y skin so don’t have an issue with orange-ish tints, but I could definitely see the dark shade turning some lighter skin tones orange.  Just MAKE SURE you scrub your hands like crazy after applying—I have learned that the hard way twice now. :) Highly recommend!!
product_name: THE FACE Illuminating Self-Tan Drops

review_text: A stay at home mom with a toddler. All day everyday. Ive been super drained since the lockdown and pandemic started. I wake up sad, not having much energy, some days are better some are worse. This were helpful. It gives a boost of energy, my appetite is better, i get annoyed less. Totally worth a try for when the first thing you think in the morning is “gaaaah another day i cannot wait for it to end“ received this product complimentary from moon-juice
review_title: Stressed free me is the best version of me
product_name: SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: This is my first time using exfoliating peel pads like this, and I was pleasantly surprised. My skin is combination and usually on the sensitive side. If I wax anything on my face it needs to be before bed, so the redness will have a full 12 hours to go down because my skin reacts poorly. I had a fear that this product would cause my skin to flush and react, but the results  far exceeded my expectations. I love the way that this product feels on my skin and the raised bumps on one side act as a slight exfoliated that is perfect. No redness or reaction. Paired with the full new Peptide 21 product line, my skin absolutely loves the hydration and I feel I am truly fighting the signs of aging.  Well done Peter Thomas Roth! I received this product free through Influenster for my honest review.
product_name: Peptide 21 Amino Acid Exfoliating Peel Pads

review_text: I am a side and stomach sleeper so I always have puffy eyes with dark circles - these work magic on both!!! Love keeping them in the fridge for an extra cooling factor when you put them on. Def a must in my beauty routine now!
product_name: Cucumber De-Tox Hydra-Gel Eye Patches

review_text: Girls go to Winners. I bought three $12 silk pillow cases in different colours, maybe not as high quality silk, but has the exact same effect on my hair and skin
product_name: Silk Pillowcase - Standard/Queen

review_text: This doesn’t leave your skin feeling oily and it protects well against the sun! Recommend
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Mineral Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: I normally struggle with dry skin especially during the winter.  I already own some Kiehl’s products and had great results so I was super excited to try this as part of a free sample program. This mask is ultra rich and hydrating that melts into your face. It doesn’t have a fragrance which is nice to prevent further irritation to my skin. It makes my face feel nice and supple without feeling clogged or weighed down. I would avoid using too much as it can make your face feel rather tacky due to excess. A little does go a long way as the semi solid melts into a nice creamy texture when applying. After using it for one week, my face did feel smoother and radiant. This will definitely be incorporated into my skincare routine and maybe even daily during the drying winter.
product_name: Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask with 10.5% Squalane

review_text: I use this as a daily cleanser. A little bit foams up and cleans my pores. Really Helps to keep oil buildup at bay at and helped reduce sebum. Fresh fragrance and gentle enough to use daily without drying out my face like a raisin.
product_name: Acne Clearing Skin Wash Cleanser

review_text: Wow!! I had some peeling from a sunburn. This thing is literally a facelift in a jar. Left in on overnight for a few nights and my face looks amazing! Love this! A little does go a long way. Highly recommend! Five stars lol
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: the roller ball itself doesn’t really work. But the product that does manage to come out did hydrate my under eyes a bit. I feel like if the roller ball worked better I would have been able to use more of the product. Skeptical of buying again if the rollerball is ineffective.
product_name: Noni Radiant Brightening Eye Oil

review_text: Quite expensive, but a luxurious treat of a mask.
product_name: Pitera Facial Treatment Mask

review_text: I am absolutely loving this spot treatment by skinfix. I have dry but acne prone skin and I breakout often. Tgis helps zap at my zit without overly stripping my skin. I highly recommend this this treatment
product_name: Acne+ 2% BHA and Azelaic Acid Acne Spot Treatment

review_text: My skin likes BHA to brighten and remove texture from my dry skin. I love how soft my face is after using this. However I took off a star because I used it on my boyfriend one time and he was super red and irritated after using. He is fair skinned.
review_title: Love it, But Not for Everyone!
product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: Great for acne breakouts and congested pores. It helps to manage my adult acne and keeps my break outs on a minimum. Good stuff especially for my dark skin girlies
review_title: Great for acne breakouts and congested pores
product_name: Alpha Beta AHA/BHA Daily Cleansing Gel

review_text: I received the Mineral Sheerscreen complimentary Supergoop. I love the coverage this gives while in the sun. It has a wonderful scent as well. I have used this under my makeup too and it worked that way. Thus is top notch sunscreen for your face and I really enjoyed it! Will continue to purchase.
product_name: Mini Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I love supergoop product and was very excited to try this out. The serum was very watery but also difficult to spread around my face. Once on, it did leave a bit of a shiny finish like others have mentioned but I did layer moisturizer and more spf which dialed it down. I had no issues layering other products on top. I think I’d continue to layer on extra spf but I do likehow I’m getting a bump in my serum step and this would be a good for a day I’m in a hurry. Overall, I’d recommend giving this a try but I am not sure if I would repurchase.
product_name: Daily Dose Vitamin C + SPF 40 Sunscreen Serum PA+++

review_text: I loved this! I’ve been using it on my skin every night, and find that my skin texture is much more moisturized and supple! I’m only 21, but I enjoy preventative skincare, and found this great!
product_name: A-Gloei Retinol Oil

review_text: I adore this eye cream. As a young mom I’m constantly on the go and have little sleep. This eye cream has been a life saver! I’ve never had any irritation with this product and I’ve ordered it several times. Would recommend this eye cream again and again. You won’t be disappointed!
product_name: Light Aura Vitamin C + Peptide Eye Cream

review_text: LOVEEEE! I use it in my night routine and it left my skin feeling super soft the next morning :) bright and smooth!!
product_name: Ultra Repair Oat & Hemp Seed Dry Oil

review_text: I want to give Kiehl’s Ferulic Brew 5 stars, but I’m waiting to use it longer to assess it’s anti-aging effects. Pro’s: It smells really good, like herbs and lemon water! It feels good on my face, really light and hydrating (if you have really dry skin, I wouldn’t use this as your only moisturizer). My skin glows after I use this. Con’s: I haven’t seen a reduction in my fine lines and discoloration. That doesn’t mean it doesn’t work, it just may mean I need to use it for longer than the month I’ve had it. If you use this in the morning, expect your face to feel slightly sticky under your makeup. This is why I switched to using it only at night.
product_name: Ferulic Brew Facial Treatment Essence with Lactic Acid

review_text: I recently purchased this product three days ago. I have currently been using their face wash and night eye cream. I love both of the products. I still have fine lines around my eyes so I though that I would give this a try. I absolutely love it! I have only used it once but I noticed a difference (not right away) the next day and continue to still have the same results. I cant wait to use it again tonight and watch my wrinkles fade away like some of my bad romances. I want to grab every slightly aged person by the ears and stare into their eyes while I whisper how great this product is!! If this product seems spendy.. try going in on it with some girlfriends and split the box. Again this product is like the potion in death becomes her. Its just that good.
product_name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask

review_text: I really like that the mask doesn’t feel too thick, and that you don’t need too much product to cover the whole face. This was really good for the dry patches I’ve been getting because of the cold weather - I’ve been using it about once a week and I’ve noticed fewer dry patches. Gifted by Dermalogica
product_name: MultiVitamin Power Recovery Mask

review_text: I love Sulwashoo products & this activating serum is no different. I use it in my AM routine as 1st step after cleansing toning & really has made a difference on how my skin looks and feels. It has a very faint smell & light texture, doesn’t make my skin feel oily & absorbs quickly. Yes it is more of a splurge but if you are looking for a serum that really works give this a try I am sure you will like it.
product_name: Mini Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: Obsessed with this product it’s been great for the winter my skin feels so plump and moisturizes I love pairing it with the yttp Airwhip moisturizer and their glow oil it makes for a perfect natural dew look and it doesn’t cause breakouts or excess oil
product_name: Triple Peptide Hydrating + Firming Oasis Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I love everything Vitamin C. For the price this is a great product but I’m not sure if it’s right for me. I personally don’t like the silky feeling of silicones so I don’t enjoy putting it on my face (just based on the feeling). Again, at the price though you can’t beat it.
review_title: Great if you like silky silicone feeling
product_name: Vitamin C Brightening Cream

review_text: Works as good as 15% vit C serums I’ve bought for much more money. Feels nice, it feels a little warm for a few seconds on application even on my feet, but nothing unexpected or concerning for use on the face. Helps scarring heal quicker for sure, my bad carpet burns and bug bites are doing well! Skin texture wise I wouldn’t say this did the trick, and I prefer the 30% silicone suspension on the face now, but I use this on my body to heal up scarring now and am happy it is effective for that.
product_name: Ascorbic Acid 8% + Alpha Arbutin 2%

review_text: After a week of use I am pleasantly surprised with this.  I saw results on day one, my forehead was smoother and my cheeks were a bit firmer.  With one week of use I am seeing smoother skin all over.  My pores are close to invisible in places which I never would have expected.  When I read up on what this is supposed to do I discovered there is a retinol like ingredient in this, so to give the product a fair chance I stopped using my retinol serum.  I have to say I don’t miss it.  This product delivers gentle results.  I would have given 5 stars but for the price.  I do wish it were cheaper, but quality costs a little more.  I did receive this product free in exchange for my review.
product_name: Kx Active Concentrates Bio-Mimicking Peptides Serum

review_text: Such a nice mist to use especially during dry summer months. Whenever I travel I like to bring a soothing mist. Can’t wait to see what this does The next time a travel
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Mist

review_text: J’ai achetée cette crème car ma crème de jour n’était plus en stock, et finalement je l’aime beaucoup plus que ma creme habituelle qui coûte trois fois plus chère. Belle découverte je recommande à 100%
product_name: Nourishing Moisturizer with Prebiotics

review_text: I really like this sunblock. It is very lightly tinted but extremely sheer. I don’t know if it’ll look ashy on darker skin, but it looks very nice on mine. My skin has a pretty smooth appearance and this just makes it look a bit nicer. I like the fact that it has SPF and I also like that it doesn’t smell like sunscreen. It’s not greasy and makes skin look nice and smooth. This is really good if you want protection and a tiny bit of coverage.
product_name: City Block Sheer Oil-Free Daily Face Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Primer

review_text: I was pleasantly surprised after receiving this product (gifted). I have very sensitive skin that typically results in dermatitis after applying eye creams. However, this was NOT the case with this eye cream. It’s a lightweight formula that is ultra hydrating (more gel like than creamy). It has only been a week of use and I am already noticing a difference- I definitely look less tired lol. I can’t wait to continue to use this product and hope to see further improvements in my under eye area. Love a clean and affordable skincare product!
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Very affordable and feels great. No fragrance, feels moisturizing but not too heavy. I love this!
product_name: Nourishing Moisturizer with Prebiotics

review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. The fragrance is a little strong but I don’t mind it! The only downside is the product caused me to breakout immediately and in abundance. I’ve been using this on targeted areas instead of full face to prevent further breakouts. Beside the breakouts, it gives an instantly smooth appearance and a nice vibrant glow.
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Double R Advanced Serum

review_text: it works really well and leaves my skin feeling soft, it had a slight stinging feeling which surprised me, but I do have sensitive skin. Overall, it is a nice thing to add to my skincare routine 3 times a week.
product_name: Instant Masks

review_text: I’ve always loved Tula and this is no exception. This cleanser feels so nice and leave my skin feeling soft and smooth!!
product_name: The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: I have fair and Freckly skin, and this had been the only self tanner I trust. Love the this express tan the most so I don’t have to worry about sleeping in tanner or sweating. keep it on for 30mins to 3 hours depending how dark or how much time before a date then wash off and pat dry! goes on evenly and is not smelly. Recommend to use with a tanning mit and apply in circular motion. Watch at Tropez applying Video! It helps
product_name: Self Tan Express Bronzing Mousse

review_text: Pros:1. The bottle is really nice, I was expecting some flimsy plastic bottle. 2. The oil itself functions really well. It felt both moisturizing but not greasy, and set into my skin really well. I have oily skin and this helped to balance it out. Cons:1. The smell, or should I say “after small” lingers and was so off putting that I had to return the product. I can normally manage as I do with Sunday Riley and Dr. Hauschka face oils but this odor is more cloying.
review_title: Would have kept using but smells awful
product_name: Get Even Rose Face Oil

review_text: This cc cream is very light weight, long-lasting, and   definitely not dry. 100C was definitely too light for me, but I got it work by a lot of blending. This cc cream is very fine texture, so none of it stuck in my fine lines after full 6 hours, which is definitely amazing. The finish in my face is kind of matte, needs extra work if looking for a dewy look. But, matte as it is,  this cc cream is not dry at all. I love it
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This is no exaggeration when I say that I could tell a difference in my skin after just one nights use. I am a skin care lover and there have been so many products I’ve tried and hardly any of them produce results right away. Not only did I love the lightweight feel of this product, I loved that it was fragrance free and didn’t irritate my skin at all. I noticed a huge difference in the color of my skin. In the places I had redness and enlarged pores, those places were significantly reduced. I would highly recommend this for my dry skin twins and those with combo skin as well. I received this as a free sample from a sampling program and I will be repurchasing this as soon as I go through this jar 100%.
review_title: Skin Care Lover APPROVES Big Time
product_name: Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask with 10.5% Squalane

review_text: This will be my 5th time purchasing! I use it everyday! I love the way it makes me skin feel! Waking up with glowy skin is amazing! I will continue to use until they never make it again( please don’t ptr) I use it with the cloud moisturizer as well!
