product_name: Retinol Fusion PM Night Serum

review_text: #complimentary from GLOW RECIPE. I really enjoy using this brand new multitasking Pore Refining + Blurring Serum from Glow Recipe. I love how silky smooth it feels on my skin! It’s very soft, yet gentle and so beautiful as it blends cleanly and evenly on the skin. The serum absorbs quickly and leaves no residue on the skin. My skin feels very comfortable and looks very nice already without other makeup products yet. The serum helps smooth out the texture more evenly and makes my pores look smaller and less visible. I love the non greasy, oily or sticky formula of the serum. It leaves my skin with a lovely soft matte finish which is perfect canvas for the rest of the makeup to go on top effortlessly and cleanly. The serum works well for blurring those imperfections on the skin, especially refining pores and texture so that makeup stays on a lot longer and looks less oily and shine. I thought I would smell the strawberry essence, but it’s so fainted. The serum is a beautiful one and super lightweight on the skin.
product_name: Strawberry BHA Pore-Smooth Blur Drops

review_text: a perfect serum for autumn time because it will give you that glow and hydration like it’s still summer time. i noticed how it brightens and plumps up my face so it creates this soothing base for my face when applying my makeup! plus i adore the packaging of it!
product_name: Great Skin Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Loving this sunscreen! It’s a medium consistency that absorbs into the skin very nicely without making your skin feel oily afterwards. It has a pleasant citrus-y scent, & it leaves my skin with a more matte finish yet a natural looking glow. It layers nicely with other products and makes a good face primer. Very gentle on the skin & claims to be gentle enough for babies as well! I received this complimentary from Influenster, but it retails for $39. Overall it’s a great sunscreen, but not going to be my new go to or anything. I’ll, personally, only use it on my face & neck just because the bottle is pretty tiny to be using on the entire body every day. That’s the only reason I gave it four stars, but still love the product and will be purchasing another when it’s out!
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: I am in no way sensitive to scents ..but this smells like hotdog water....didn’t do anything for me...will not be purchasing again
product_name: Tranexamic Acid Hyperpigmentation Treatment

review_text: I want to start by saying I’m almost 26. I  have oily skin but get dry patches here & there, especially in the wintertime. I have very large pores & i’m acne prone. I’ve always been like this, HOWEVER this past year I got hit with adult acne... which is completely different than the teen, hormonal acne, & the random pop up breakouts I’m used to dealing with. It comes up in clusters on my cheeks & between my eyebrows, takes forever to get rid of, and scars sooooo easy if I pick at it. Since using this cleanser I’ve seen a huge reduction in those breakouts, by at least 75%. Also, I want to say it makes your skin feel squeaky clean but doesn’t dry it out. I use this day & night everyday. Side note: I also have the Dermalogica Clear Start Breakout Clearing Foaming Wash which is phenomenal but I feel like if you’re trying to choose which one you should go with I’d highly suggest this one if you’re in your mid to late 20s & up... something about it just works better. I still use the Clear Start on my chest & back in the shower though to keep those places clear too!
product_name: Acne Clearing Skin Wash Cleanser

review_text: Really enjoy this product. It goes on so easily and has a nice sheen to it.
product_name: SHIKULIME Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30

review_text: Very gentle but does not get rid of tough makeup dish as eyeliner or mascara.
product_name: SHIKULIME Gel-to-Oil Cleanser

review_text: absolutely delightful to use. perfect for all its purposes, hydrating, setting, and refreshing. beautiful gentle rose scent!!
product_name: Brume de Beauté Beauty Mist

review_text: It seems to help with the acne but it leaves skin oily. Maybe i am using it wrongly? I wash my face before bed and I’ve been using this cream right after. In the next day i feel my skin oily.
product_name: Aloe Vera Blemish Soothing Moisturizer

review_text: I loved how smooth and glowing my skin look and felt after applying this mousse! After serval hours, I had glowing skin with a beautiful and natural looking tan. I loved how easy it was to apply and how fast it dried as well. Highly recommend!
product_name: Self-Tan Luxe Whipped Crème Mousse

review_text: Love how a little goes a long way! Made my skin feel refreshed and clean without stripping it’s natural oils and making it dry.
review_title: A Little Goes a Long Way
product_name: SHIKULIME Gel-to-Oil Cleanser

review_text: I’ve been using this cream for two weeks and it has done wonders to my dry patches, I feel like has definitely restored my skin barrier. I also love the rich but not heavy texture it has, works great under make up as well.
product_name: Ceramidin Skin Barrier Moisturizing Cream

review_text: Love it love it love it! I bought it based on a recommendation of a Sephora employee. He suggested three altogether but said he used Origins himself. His skin was near perfect so I went with what he used. Oh my goodness I was not disappointed. I love the soft citrus smell and how it’s very lightweight. A little goes a long way so a jar will last me two months.It only took two night to see a HUGE difference! My face was oh so soft in the morning! Also...no breakouts! I don’t get acne unless there is a change in my routine. The moisturizer I returned for Origins gave me deep pimples. This did nothing negative! I will definitely be buying again!
product_name: High-Potency Night-A-Mins Oil-Free Resurfacing Cream with Fruit Derived AHAs

review_text: Both supergoop mineral FACE sunscreens pill and are a complete mess! The only thing worth the money is their play mineral body sunscreen.
product_name: Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: The mist is very fine with a subtle hint of rose. It is a perfect midday refresh as it doesn’t make your skin look oily. You can also use under your makeup as a skin prep. It will make your makeup last all day without rubbing off. I have sensitive skin and this product and not cause any irritation. 5/5 stars!This item was given to me complimentary for my honest opinion.
product_name: Brume de Beauté Beauty Mist

review_text: I love this product i will be replenishing a refill on this once mine is empty! It is soothing, the tip always stays so cool and i do see a difference on my skin!!
product_name: Cryo-Recovery Depuffing Eye Serum

review_text: I love this sunscreen! It provides wonderful protection and is a very nice base for foundation or concealers. It has a slightly matte almost nude finish and goes on very smoothly. I like how it makes my foundation look even smoother.
product_name: City Block Sheer Oil-Free Daily Face Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Primer

review_text: I have rosacea-prone skin, that’s combination and beginning to show first signs of aging (46) - I’ve tried everything from LaMer to Tatcha to Dior and back, including other Algenist products. This is the FIRST time I’ve ever used the whole jar of a moisturizer because they usually end up irritating my skin or causing blackheads around my nose. This moisturizer does not feel heavy and does not clog pores, but it does deliver clean, supple hydration. It also makes skin supple, younger-looking and just pretty. I’m happily on my second 2 oz jar.
review_title: First Time I’ve Used The Whole Jar- LOVE IT!
product_name: GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Cream

review_text: I’m no stranger to toner and previously used an Origins toner for years, unable to find anything as good. This product has changed my mind!! It leaves my skin feeling clean and tight (without feeling tight) without any dryness. It’s easy to use, which makes it a great staple in any skincare routine.
product_name: PRO Strength 10% PHA Exfoliating Clarifying Liquid

review_text: Absolutely love this product. This product is not only fading my post acne hyperpigmentation but it also is giving my skin the glow I havent seen in a very long time. This one is a winner. I love the consistency and thinness, and how easily it absorbed into my skin. I have combination acne prone very sensitive skin. I am on prescription clindamycin/tretinoin (antibiotic + retin-A) and this has not caused any irritation. I use the serum in the morning and my active meds at night. My skin is FINALLY clearing up.
review_title: A must for post acne hyperpigmentation
product_name: Ascorbic Acid 8% + Alpha Arbutin 2%

review_text: This is an awesome pore mask. My skin Leeds smooth instantly, and over time it looks much better. My pores look smaller. It very easy to apply and clean, as it transforms to clay when it’s dry. Complimentary from Benefit Cosmetics.
product_name: The POREfessional Speedy Smooth Mask

review_text: I alternate between this and one other product. I’mNEVER without it. Leaves my pores looking smaller, my skin smoother and doesn’t make my face oily. LOVE IT
review_title: Smaller pore, smooth skin and not oily
product_name: Pore Refining Solutions Correcting Serum

review_text: I’m not sure if this does much to minimize the look of my pores, but it definitely improves the texture of my skin. My skin tends to be slightly oily, but this lotion seems to minimize that. It works very well as a primer underneath makeup and in general just makes my skin feel like cashmere.I gave it only 4 stars because of the price, but I definitely notice a decline in the quality of my skin when I’m not using it, so I always repurchase it willingly.
product_name: Pore Refining Solutions Correcting Serum

review_text: I use a pump with my hair balm when I style my curly hair and its amazing!!! Helps with frizziness so much :) Also wonderful mixed with or after moisturizer!!!
product_name: 100% Sugarcane Squalane Oil

review_text: I was so excited to use the product. I have been using it for a few days now and already see a difference. My eyes are always baggy looking and dark under eye. This moisturizes it and brightens up my under eye. I am impressed by the quality of the Sephora brand eye cream!! Definitely recommend
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: i got this bar as a stocking stuffer in a mini kit. I really like the soap and was pleased to find that it can be used on body as well. however it did dry my skin out significantly so I would suggest pairing it with a good moisturizer.
product_name: Acne Solutions Cleansing Bar For Face and Body

review_text: I’ve been using this eye cream for about a month and really like it. It gets the job done, doesn’t have a strong scent, doesn’t break me out at all, and makes my eye area feel and look good. It hasn’t worked any miracles for me yet, but I would reccomend this to anyone that needs an eye cream. Every Origins product that I’ve tried has really worked well for me.
product_name: Eye Doctor Moisture Care For Skin Around Eyes

review_text: I got these immediately after reading a blog post on the different types of acne that different patches treat. The ones I had didn’t work on deep/cystic zits below the skin but these do! The zit isn’t completely gone but this helped reduce the size significantly These come with a ton of packing though, so I will probably look at a different brand that is more eco-conscious
review_title: Perfect for zits below the skin
product_name: Focuspot Micro Tip Patches

review_text: Hideous.  So disappointed in Sephora!!!  Should be 0 Stars!
product_name: Clean Cleansing & Gentle Exfoliating Wipes

review_text: Great product. I use twice a week and have seen a huge difference. Highly recommend!!!!
product_name: PRO Strength Lactic Pore Treatment

review_text: I received this mask as a free sample, but I will definitely be purchasing this product! This mask works wonders on my skin. Whenever my skin needs a hydrating “boost” I put this mask on and the results blow me away! Instantly hydrated skin, minimized blemishes, and an amazing “glow”.
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: I actually didn’t have a great experience with this kit. I feel like there are too many steps and it took too long to apply. It would be nice if there was a more clear instruction on what you need to do each morning and night.
product_name: Discover Healthy Skin Kit

review_text: I’m very fair skinned and bought this to try for the summer. I’ve only used it on my body, not face and it’s very effective. This summer has been the first one in a while that I’ve had no burns. The sunscreen itself applies very smoothly, my only complaint is it gets a bit sticky if you get sweaty. Luckily it dries fairly quickly after, but it still can be uncomfortable if you live somewhere with a lot of humidity.
product_name: Glow Oil Body Sunscreen SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: Truthfully, I hate putting sunscreen on my face. Body sunscreen makes me break out really badly. This product is lightweight and reminds me of skin lotion. I really like it! I did have to reapply a few times if you’re out on the water.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Mineral Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: I received this product for my honest opinion. I really enjoyed using the product for the past month. I do believe my skin got softer and more hydrated even throughout the day. Working un a healthcare setting we still need to wear n95 masks, and I don’t find this product breaks me out or makes my skin oily even with the mask. I do have a deeper forehead wrinkle, it didn’t magically disappear, or soften within this month use. But my skin is noticeably more glowy.
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Double R Advanced Serum

review_text: I received this in a sample. I have alot of acne scars. This serum works it doesn’t happen overnight. SO HAVE PATIENCE. I have noticed my scars are lightening and it’s so nice. I have tried everyrhing from drug store brands to presrciption medication wirh no results. This works! Go Kate!!!!!!
product_name: D-Scar Scar Diminishing Serum

review_text: I just recently started using this product and haven’t noticed any changes in my dark spots yet. But I appreciate that I haven’t broken out with it either. I do hope this works. I have also recommended it to my friends and family.
product_name: Tranexamic Acid Hyperpigmentation Treatment

review_text: This product has made a difference after one week. I have some discoloration and patches of uneven skin on my face. The difference when I began to use the pads are good. My skin has become smoother and I am less reliant in make up for that smooth finish. I go more days fresh face since using this product.
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Peel Pads

review_text: Through my 30s I noticed that my skin kept looking more abs more tired. I wanted to have my glowing skin from my 20s back! I finally have the best skin I’ve ever had and it’s in part thanks to this moisturizer. It’s thick enough to be really moisturizing, but lightweight enough not to feel like a huge greaseball. It’s definitely worth it, especially for the 40s crowd.
product_name: Mini 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream

review_text: Okay I absolutely loved this with the rest of the Cicapair products. Made my skin feel so refreshed!!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Mist

review_text: I could not get past the smell of these pads from Skinfix. I’m not sure if this was just a bad batch, however I asked other people that received these as well, and they also said that the fragrance was overpowering. It smelt like they were bad, so I was too scared to use them on my face. Also, they came unsealed.
product_name: Resurface+ AHA/BHA Niacinamide Exfoliating Pads for Face and Targeted Body

review_text: Awesome even saggy skin is firm. Don,t know if overall helps, buts instant firmness is amazing. Just. Need to wipe off white dry spots, that’s only problem as it removes the product.
product_name: Instant FIRMx Temporary Face Tightener

review_text: I have visibly noticed a difference in my skin since I started using this! I am very happy with hoe my pores look and the amount of blemishes I have gotten to go away!
product_name: Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) Blemish + Blackhead Serum

review_text: This cleanser is unreal. My new favourite for sure. It’s super moisturizing while cleaning everything off your face.
product_name: Confidence in a Cleanser Hydrating Facial Cleanser Serum

review_text: it works! the brand is great as a whole!
product_name: Sheet Masks

review_text: I really like this acne treatment! It definitely helped with the blemishes that I had! I would highly recommend!
product_name: KOSHIRICE Acne Calming Spot Treatment

review_text: Love this for my daytime cleanser. I wouldnt say it gives you a super deep clean which is why I don’t use it at night after makeup removal. But it is so refreshing with the citrus elements in the morning and it’s the perfect size for travel. It’s a cream based cleanser.
product_name: Mini Truth Juice Daily Cleanser

review_text: These masks are the best. I keep them in the fridge and use them when I get out of the shower whenever I want my skin to look especially great. I use each mask three times, and then if there is still additional liquid left in the pouch I make sure to smooth it into my face, neck, and the backs of my hands. They make my skin look amazing, smooth, plumped, hydrated.
product_name: Pitera Facial Treatment Mask

review_text: It’s really improved my skin by reducing redness. I apply this serum under my regular moisturizer.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Hyaluronate Serum

review_text: This. Is. Everything. It’s light, weightless, has no smell (such a relief, as a lot of face oils bother my nose tbh), and makes my skin look so bright and young. It absorbs quickly too!
product_name: 100% Sugarcane Squalane Oil

review_text: I love this. I love the scent, I love the way it feels on my face, I love the way my skin feels after I wash it off, I love the packaging. I love this as much as I love their jetlag mask. I use it on days my skin looks dull and lifeless, especially on mornings after I get back from working my night shifts at the hospital. After using it, it plumps up my skin and leaves it looking bright. I’ve only used it three times and it’s already climbed it’s way to number one on my list of scrub masks. I can’t wait to see what else Summer Fridays comes out with!
product_name: Overtime Mask

review_text: I love the way this product feels, smells, and removes every trace of makeup, but it dries my skin out terribly. I have combo to dry skin and this leaves my face itchy, flaky, and tight if I don’t put on moisturiser within 10-15 seconds of drying.  If your skin isn’t dry and you’re looking for a good, makeup removing cleanser, I would highly recommend!
product_name: Mini Truth Juice Daily Cleanser

review_text: I used this product only at night. I have sensitive skin so I cleanse with only water in the morning. I used this after a cleansing balm, and found it not stripping at all. It’s a very gentle cleanser and has a mild floral fragrance. It starts out creamy but foams up and has a decent lather. Overall I loved the experience- it feels very luxurious. I really enjoyed it!
product_name: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Face Cleanser

review_text: I have been really enjoying this moisturizer. It is light and spreads really easily onto the skin. BUT it really keeps my skin hydrated throughout the day. I like that it doesn’t sting my skin and I am not quite sure about the prebiotics but my skin didn’t break out or feel any more or less textured. It is more like a basic moisturizer that feels incredibly lightweight but still moisturizes for a long period of time.
product_name: Active Moist Moisturizer

review_text: I learned recently thanks to TikTok that there’s a difference between dry and dehydrated skin. I realized that perhaps all along I was actually dehydrated and switched up my skincare to reflect that which included using this as a moisturizer and my skin looks infinitely more hydrated with far less effort. Seriously, supple glass skin and whatnot. No acne, reduced fine lines.. it’s funny because now I can get baby soft skin without needing to exfoliate so regularly so now I only do that once and a while but I am free to skip it without the penalty of meh skin, acne or makeup not going on well. Moisture barrier seems to be doing great too.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Pink Juice Oil-Free Moisturizer

review_text: OMG!! So, I received this product as part of a free sample program, and I am very proud of this product. I have already told everyone I know about it. First off, the scent is absolutely wonderful, and reminds me of vanilla pudding. Second off, the results! I used the product for a week and my lips look absolutely wonderful. They actually look much healthier than before, and are most definitely much softer. Lastly, the feel of the product while on the lips is extremely comfortable, and not nearly as sticky as most lip masks. I definitely think this is the best lip mask I’ve tried! I will most definitely buy this when it comes back in stock😩 Y’all should get it, it’s literally the best I swear
product_name: Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E

review_text: I saw this product when i was in Sephora and guess what i decided to buy the sample one which is quite expensive for an ace clear invisible dots. The truth is i didn’t expect a lot on this product but I’m a little surprised with this.I didn’t think it will work but i truly did. It reduces my pimples on chin (not 100%) but they’re kinda gone. The only thing I’m not obsessed is the price. Oh one more, you can’t expect your pimple will disappear after 1 night. Be patient!! Overall, I feel happy about this
product_name: Acne-Clear Invisible Dots

review_text: I love the amount of hydration this gives my skin and how soft it feels. The smell however is horrible! I wear it at night.
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: It seems to work, not sure if it actually does. I’m on my second bottle. Will keep using it...
product_name: Pure Skin Clarifying Dietary Supplement

review_text: The moisturizer works well and feels great on the skin.
product_name: Omega Water Cream Moisturizer

review_text: I am really not a fan of SP Cream. The scent doesnt bother me but the more it lingers, the more it irritates me.  It leaves my face pretty greasy feeling and irritated. At this time, I havent used the system long enough to form a more extensive opinion/review.I received a complimentary product in exchange for my review, these are my initial thoughts.
review_title: Not A Fan At This Time
product_name: SKINPOWER Cream

review_text: I was this to give my honest review . I don’t care for it. I usually like their brand of face products. But I used this one everyday twice a day and didn’t see any changes in my skin. Only thing is that is soaks onto my skin well. I wouldn’t repurchase but I will keep using it til gone ans if something changes come back and update my reviews
product_name: Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid

review_text: This is genuinely one of the best lip balms I have ever had! The little bit of cooling from the mint and eucalyptus is so soothing, and its formula as a salve makes application so smooth. No waxy-ness, no drying out. I love it.
product_name: Menthol And Eucalyptus Lip Balm

review_text: I’ve used this for five years on and off for mainly chest and back acne. It works extremely well and doesn’t dry out or irritate my chest or back. I recently broke out like crazy on my face from a sunscreen and could not get ahold of the Cerave SA cleanser so I’ve used this and it works! It is very potent and can be drying for my face but it gets the job done!! This is such a cost effective and effective product!! It also lasts forever!!
product_name: Acne Solutions Cleansing Bar For Face and Body

review_text: Squalene Do you know what this is? Squalene is made from harvesting the liver of sharks so I don’t know why this is marketed as VEGAN
product_name: Vinosource-Hydra SOS Intense Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: An amazing product! I was looking for a new mood boosting product that included ashwaganda which this caught my eye. I have noticed a complete difference in mood after taking for a month and half. I did have a bad breakout once I started, this is most likely due to the shatavari, but went away in time.
product_name: SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: I am hooked on this product. It did take a while to remove dark spots but it will by the end of the first bottle. I found that this product first evens your skin tone and then targets dark spots.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: After suffering from acne for 10+ years, I finally went to the dermatologist and got a skincare regimen. However my skin, although clear of acne, still broke out sometimes and was definitely lackluster in texture. Enter: THIS FACE WASH. I promise. buy this face wash. I have been using it nightly as a makeup remover and wash. my skin IS GLOWING. all the bumps I had are long gone. WAY WORTH THE PRICE
product_name: One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Orange Extract

review_text: I just took a daily dosage (2 capsules a day) and i am feeling great! A bit pricey for only getting a 30 day supply. I have always taken herbal supplements and vitamins for mood support and when i saw these i jumped on it! I was full of energy for the first 2-3 hours. I hope it sticks.
product_name: SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: This was gifted by Paula’s Choice. The product felt very watery and liquidy. It was very lightweight. It has a fluid consistency. It did not cause any white cast. It has SPF 50 which is a really good amount of SPF. This product made my skin feel and look hydrated. The product was not greasy at all. My skin was moisturized. It contains antioxidants and soothing plant extract.
product_name: RESIST Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50

review_text: Complimentary from Moon Juice. I’ve been taking this every day now for almost two weeks and have noticed a difference in the way I react to stressful situations. I feel calmer and much less anxious. Best part no side effects so far for me.
product_name: Mini SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: I purchased the full size after having tried its sample. My skin did look better after using it for a few times.
product_name: Moisture Surge Overnight Face Mask

review_text: Amazing product!! My stomach has gotten so much flatter & I hardly feel bloated after I eat a meal it’s crazy love it!
product_name: Flatter Me Digestive Enzyme Supplement

review_text: The water-free formula allows for little degradation of the vitamin C. The pH is low which allows for greater penetration. Everything about this product is perfection other than the fact that its 30% vitamin C which is WAY too high based on published data. This would be a fantastic product if it was less irritating and had a more reasonable percentage of vitamin C. Made my face red and flakey. If this product had 15-20% vitamin C you’d have a lifelong customer.
review_title: PLEASE MAKE THIS IN A 15% VERSION
product_name: Vitamin C Suspension 30% in Silicone

review_text: These little bundles of joy are just plain amazing. I use them any time I’m a little tired, or if i need a little de-puffing.... They instantly make me look refreshed and awake and help my eye moisturizer really soak in (i put it on after wearing these for about 20 minutes)
product_name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask

review_text: I really really like that this product is in a pump and I don’t have to dip my fingers in- I was alternating this with another product (Neutrogena water gel) and I hate that this is double the price but I try to buy products that work for my skin as well as my teenage sons and this does. If it was more affordable, one more star
product_name: Confidence in a Gel Lotion

review_text: My new favorite eye cream. I’ve been using since the launched it & I can’t stop using it. It is a pretty think cream going on, but soaks in like a dream ☁️
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: I love that this product addresses not only your undereye area, but even more! Eyelids and the eye area as a whole needs love. The product may be expensive but I can tell that it will last a long time. It spreads super easily and you really only need a drop to cover all areas. The Total Eye Lift feels very hydrating when applied and absorbs quickly. It has a light scent that goes away quick. I can see results right after regarding plumpness and moisture, but it doesn’t make my dark circles any better unfortunately (but I have really bad pigmentation).
product_name: Total Eye Lift Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Eye Cream

review_text: I’m a skincare junkie and spend far too much time online reading reviews. From these, I’ve tried multiple types of moisturizers - from the unbearably heavy to the invisibly light. I had just decided with myself I am not a moisturizer kind of gal (they break me out, or they make me feel greasy, or they sit on my skin and do nothing, or I hate their smell).Fresh vitamin nectar is a GAME CHANGER. I honestly have loved it. It has a fresh, lovely scent that’s addictive; it didn’t irritate or provoke my skin with breakouts after two weeks of use, and it was the perfect medium when it came to moisture (prefect for my combo skin). I didn’t feel greasy. It was comfortable, absorbed well, and made me feel radiant.Of course, different peeps will have different opinions, but this certainly didn’t constitute a basic moisturizer for me. This has been a product that truly delivers what it promises. Well done Fresh!!! Now if only you can add a cleanser to compliment this nectar line!
product_name: Vitamin C Glow Moisturizer

review_text: I got this from Influenster Vox Box and I was so excited because I LOVE Dr. Jart, like a religious user. The consistency is clear and is of a gel/liquid type. You need maybe a nickel sized for the face, as it lathers up on the face very well, but doesn’t get sudsy, which I like. My face felt so clean after using it and it wasn’t stripped or felt dry like it sometimes feels after I use my other acne or salicylic face washes. I usually have to run to my moisturizer drawer right after the shower because my face is so dry but i actually didn’t experience that with this product. The crazy thing is that I actually saw a reduction in my blackheads AFTER SIMPLY WASHING MY FACE! I never expected that because my typical blackheads are pretty rooted within my nose. I’m hoping that if I keep up with this they will stay away!!!! I would love to purchase again and I think as soon as I run out of my sample I’m going to Sephora for a treat myself day :-)Ps: it does smell like tea tree but it’s not overpowering
review_title: perfect gel cleanser, won’t leave you feeling dry!
product_name: Teatreement Cleansing Foam

review_text: I received this as a complimentary gift for the purpose of my honest opinion. I used this for approximately 2 weeks i apply it twice a day as it can be used morning or nightmare that extra hydration. I apply on top of my daily products it’s not sticky super absorbable and has no scent for those with sensitive skin or smell.  Hands do2n. I will continue use this as my daily routine
product_name: Omega Water Cream Moisturizer

review_text: Love it great moisture for my face at night. Among other things! Will soon order my 4th bottle.
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: What I love:  Smooth, cooling feel.  Undecided:  Not sure about real benefits as advertised. Not so much:  Pricey.  If you can afford it, it’s a nice luxury but not a must have.
review_title: Nice luxury but not a must have
product_name: Silk Pillowcase - Standard/Queen

review_text: I bought this instead of replacing my play supergoop because I heard mineral sunscreen is better for acne. I love the texture of this and it doesn’t feel greasy at all. But the white cast...it’s almost like a purple white cast. It kind of fades away after a few minutes but I also self tan and it just doesn’t work how I want it to. I may just stick to the Play! Great sunscreen and it would be my new holy grail except for the weird cast it has.
product_name: Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I wear sunscreen everyday because I live in Arizona and the sun is very intense here. It is very hard for me to find a product that can successfully wash the sunscreen off of my face every night. This product does an amazing job I literally can feel my pores breathing. It is also amazing at removing any make up like foundation or mascara
product_name: The POREfessional Get Unblocked Makeup-Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: I can feel it tighten but other than that I don’t notice a huge difference compared to other creams. I tried putting it on my eyelids but I felt it was too thick for that area and enhanced milia there.
product_name: Cryo-Recovery Depuffing Eye Serum

review_text: Good product but there is an initial unpleasant smell which disappears shortly. The packaging is tiny and that  is not a good thing.
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: Love it! Occlusive and full of peptides! Little goes a long way, then cost effective!
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Lotion Moisturizer

review_text: I’m not one to use physical exfoliators so I was skeptical about buying this, but I love anything turmeric. I gotta say I love it. I mainly use it in my T-Zone & I add some water to my hands & in circular motions I rinse it off gently. Leaves my skin bright & very smooth. I have sensitive skin & I didn’t find it harsh, but do a test patch.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster and JLo beauty to give my honest opinion. I was absolutely stunned at how gorgeous the packaging was. This made me feel like I was handling a prestigious product and gave me high expectations. The lid even locks into place so you know it’s securely closed I thought was a great addition. Who wants to have the lid accidentally unscrew in a bag while traveling, not me. Actual moisturizer: very thick, smooth, creamy formula. Strong odor of the added spf which I expected some spf smell but this was quite intense and did not go away as the day went on. The consistency of the cream did allow it to go on smoothly and completely, a little goes a LONG way. I have combo skin and feel this did well on my skin now (winter) however I’m not sure how it will hold up in the humidity and heat of summer time. Overall: I enjoyed this moisturizer minus the strong spf odor, would use in the winter and try in the summer to see how it behaves.
product_name: That Big Screen Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: i really like this face wash! i have acne prone skin and the salicylic acid in it really help that! it doesn’t dry out my skin either which i really like. the packaging is also very pretty which is a plus!
product_name: Acne+ 2% BHA + Azelaic Acid + Niacinamide + AHA Cleanser

review_text: I’m super picky about my self tanner because I’m scared of looking orange (IRL and in pictures) but I really love the color of this one! It dries super quick and using the tanning mitt made it super easy to apply, I ran over my body twice with the mitt and didn’t have any streaks or white spots. Super pretty, deep brown color that lasts longer than most other self tanners.
product_name: Self-Tan Luxe Whipped Crème Mousse

review_text: I never used this product Before but I got the whole line in the Trendmood Box and was happily surprised at how I enjoyed using it I will definitely purchased some of the items especially this one the collagen cream with niacin really feels good on my dried up skin
product_name: Ultra Repair Firming Collagen Cream with Peptides and Niacinamide

review_text: I loooove this mask. My face feels so clean and refreshed after using it. It really calms down skin irritation. It also adds an unexpected glow. Worth every penny!
product_name: Greek Yoghurt Probiotic Superdose Face Mask

review_text: Love love love this mask! Not sure if noted but one mask uses a quarter of a bottle of essence so it is really valuable for your skin. Instead of doing what’s suggested, I leave this baby on until my skin soaks it all up (takes a little more than an hour for my oily skin) and there’s not one drop of essence left on the sheet mask. the result? Smooth, plump skin. I’m in my mid 20s and make a habit of doing this when it’s that time of the month and my skin needs the extra help. I think sheet mask per month is not too bad on the budget and it’s a great way to take care of skin before you hit early signs of aging. I also use the essence every day.
product_name: Pitera Facial Treatment Mask

review_text: This product was amazing! It made my skin feel very moisturized the next morning after use. I have dry skin and always looking for something to help that. I’ve only been using it a short time so it’s going to take more use to know how it’s going to help my skin. But so far I like how it makes my skin feels.
product_name: Kx Active Concentrates Bio-Mimicking Peptides Serum

review_text: Favorite lip plumper! A little goes a long way and lasts for at least a few hours. It goes on clear and turns pink for a super pretty natural look!
product_name: Platinum Lip Plump SPF 30

review_text: I love this cream. I put it on before bed and when I wake up in the morning I can’t believe how soft and smooth the skin around my eyes is. It feels tight and moisturized.
product_name: Eye Doctor Moisture Care For Skin Around Eyes

review_text: My favorite thing from this line! I can feel it working and my skin has been looking great. Will for sure buy when I finish my own. Influenster sent me this for free.
product_name: Peptide 21 Amino Acid Exfoliating Peel Pads

review_text: First I received this as a complementary gift to review. But WOW! I’m definitely adding this to my essential list. I don’t get much sunlight where I live, so my Hispanic genes are taking a defeat rn. But this stuff is a life saver!! You can build up the tan, and it lasts for days! It doesn’t leave a sticky feeling after it’s applied, and you can go to sleep in it and it doesn’t stain fabric. It smells amazing but not overpowering. Love this stuff!
product_name: Self Tan Purity Vitamins Bronzing Water Body Mist

review_text: So I ordered this online - and bad on me for not looking at the amount in the bottle - and thought there had been some mistake when I received this. I thought I had gotten a sample size by accident. This is the TINIEST little tube of product. If it performs miracles then maybe it’ll be worth it but for a tube of colloidal oatmeal ointment - which is pretty much what Aveeno’s products are - this feels like such a ripoff.
product_name: Eczema+ Dermatitis Face Balm

review_text: Pricey yet didn’t do anything for my facial seborrheic dermatitis
product_name: Eczema+ Dermatitis Face Balm

review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser almost everyday and I can say that it is really gentle on the skin, it does like strip your face like most cleansers and it does give you that clean feeling. I have oily skin and it has helped keep that in control
product_name: The POREfessional Good Cleanup Foaming Cleanser

review_text: I’ve only used this twice but I’m so impressed.The first time I missed a few spots but it wasn’t super noticeable which was good. My tan looks very natural and is gradually getting a bit darker the more I use. I use this with the serum and I put the serum on my face. The mist is especially nice because the sprayer works super well and I don’t notice any giant droplets on my skin. It’s very mist like and dispersed nicely. I also use the tropez mit to spread the mist out so I make sure I hit every area. I enjoy this product because i can leave the house immediately after applying. No one will notice at all because it takes a few hours for it to show. The other good thing is the scent, it’s so low key and I’m obsessed. I’ve struggled finding the perfect self tanner. They usually just show all my imperfections along with streaks that I missed. Then it comes off my skin and I look scaley for a few weeks. This has been phenomenal!
product_name: Self Tan Purity Vitamins Bronzing Water Body Mist

review_text: The Ren Clean Skincare Overnight Glow is a very moisturizing night cream. I have seen improvement in my dark spots but it is on the slower side (which is to be expected). My only gripe with this product is the smell! It’s so pungent and smells like fake orange. However, if you can get past the smell, I think the cream is moisturizing, a good deal for the price, and seems to be slowly correcting my dark spots. I do hope they will change the fragrance or at least make it a little less severe.
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: As a black women it’s hard to find a sunscreen that has no white cast and one that doesn’t have a greasy feeling. This is a nice moisturizing sunscreen that goes on seamlessly on my dark skin. It has help greatly help reduced my hyperpigmentation on my face. Must have step in my daily morning routine.
product_name: Correct & Protect Broad Spectrum SPF 45| PA++++

review_text: This was gifted to me by the brand I put my opinions are my own - I love that we now have access to good retinol over the counter! I love everything from Farmacy and this product is no different! I didn’t irritate my skin in anyway shape or form! No breakouts or dry patches which can sometimes happen with Retinol. If you don’t have retinol in your routine I highly recommend checking this one out!
product_name: 1% Vitamin A Retinol Serum

review_text: This is a wintertime favorite. Its made with 5 ceramides and panthenol to strengthen the skin barrier and increase moisture levels, which is exactly what my skin needs in the winter.
product_name: Ceramidin Skin Barrier Moisturizing Cream

review_text: I really loved this product. I was getting some texture in my cheeks and skin was feeling super dull. I’ve been using this for about a month and texture is gone. My skin feel baby smooth and much brighter! I’m would recommend this product. Of it feels too strong for your face (peeling or burning) don’t use every day or mix it with you regular moisturizer it seems to tame the effect.
product_name: Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid

review_text: The glow is insane! Not shiny or oily - just radiant! Feels amazing on the skin. I think I expected more of an oil but was pleasantly surprised by the texture. Makes my skin feel good and removes 3 steps in my usual routine, which had gotten quite unmanageable!
product_name: Great Skin Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: It really works! I applied it after I wash my face, it gives you a great glow!!!
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Glow Serum

review_text: LOVE LOVE THIS sunscreen!! First off there is absolutely no WHITE CAST! whatsoever! and I am skin of color!! (I revived this product for free to share my honest opinion/experience!) It didn’t make me break out, feels amazing on skin isn’t oily or greasy feeling, doesn’t peel and so far my skin is loving it!! So I definitely recommend though it is pricey, other then that love it!
product_name: The True Cream - Aqua Bomb Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: My daughter has had a significant improvement in her skin after using this product for just a few days.
product_name: 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Cleanser

review_text: Absolutely love this, it feels wonderful on your eyes and gets rid of puffs immediately. I haven’t tried it in the fridge yet but I bet it feels even better!
product_name: Cryo-Recovery Depuffing Eye Serum

review_text: I used this product for a couple of nights and didn’t notice anything special.  I don’t wear that much makeup but a makeup remover that you can’t use on your eyes seems pointless.  Also the product did seem watered down.  It didn’t do anything to harm my skin just didn’t notice anything great from using it.
product_name: Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: As much as SI tried to like this product, it really did nothing for me.  I love YTTP products but this one is a big nothing.  Not even much of a moisturizer.
product_name: Polypeptide-121 Future Cream with Peptides and Ceramides

review_text: I am very picky about serums and moisturizers, and this one is perfect. It’s light, blends into skin beautifully without feeling heavy, and is very hydrating. I have repurchased it several times and it is my only serum I use now. In the winter my skin does get a little dryer, so I mix it with the 10+10 moisturizer.
product_name: Slushy Serum Moisturizer Crush Infused with Bakuchiol

review_text: Love this!  I mix in a few drops with my nightly moisturizer and wake up with a touch of sun. Even if I forget at night i’ll use it in the morning and the color develops in a few hours. It’s like I’m getting a tan while working indoors!
product_name: THE FACE Illuminating Self-Tan Drops

review_text: I received this product from Influenster and PR in exchange for my honest review. This product is great for fine lines! I used on my face, neck and décolletage every night for week and notice difference. My fine lines on my face were smoother overall and my décolletage smoothed out nicely as well. I think for the price you can’t beat this product
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Serum

review_text: Amazing sunscreen! This product is truly mind blowing. It is such a hydrating and smooth sunscreen with no white cast. This sunscreen is also very light on the skin which is amazing. I highly recommend getting this product if you want something light and hydrating that will protect you from the sun!
product_name: The True Cream - Aqua Bomb Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: Disclaimer: I recieved this product for free from Influenster and Shiseido in exchange for my honest reviewI was so happy to recieve this product since I live somewhere that is always sunny! I would say that it did great with protecting my skin from sunburn, and has a very light sunscreen smell to it. I didn’t notice that much change in my skin, but I do love that is has a little nozzle to allow product put. I would recommend this product for anyone looking for a nice sunscreen.
product_name: Urban Environment Vita-Clear Sunscreen SPF 42

review_text: **I received this product for free from Influenster (VoxBox) in exchange for an honest review.**I’ve been using this product for about two weeks now (nearly every day but not quite). I tried it both after using my favorite toner (Lancome Tonique) as well as on its own after cleansing (I wanted to see if the effects were distinguishable). It wasn’t a mind-altering difference, but I imagine that with any serum, it’s at least marginally more effective after toner application.The main thing that I noticed is that my skin felt incredibly smooth the morning after - solidly supporting the claims of “smoother after 4 hours“. The next claim is firmer-looking after 10 days, which was a bit more difficult for me to judge since I wouldn’t say that my skin has lost a significant amount of elasticity [yet]. (For full disclosure, I get monthly facials at a medispa.)Interestingly, a couple of reviewers have mentioned a very strong fragrance. I have a very sensitive nose, but find the fragrance to be fairly mild and pleasant in a nostalgic way. I can’t quite put my finger on it, but it smells like beauty products that I smelled when I was a child/teenager - like a mix between baby lotion, floral notes, and sunblock. In any case, I personally find the fragrance gentle and pleasant.If you have skin texture or elasticity concerns, this product should improve some of those issues - but as with any product, YMMV. And remember that nothing beats being preventative and hydrating well by drinking enough water!
review_title: Noticeably smoother feeling the next morning
product_name: Capture Totale Le Sérum Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: I am so happy with this product! It matches fully and feels like air! Nothing is messy or thick cake feeling! I’m so impressed and so in love! This will now be an always go to! You will love it! Buy it!
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I have pretty clear and even normal skin that sometimes leans to the dry side. I’ve been pairing this toner with the FAB cleanser which I love along with the occasional sleeping mask by another brand. While my skin does feel deeply hydrated by this new routine I’m not sure if I see any significant changes I can attribute to his toner alone. It has been a month of use and will continue using . Kinda thrown of by preservatives being so high up on the list but I’ve had no adverse reactions.
review_title: not sure if I see a difference
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: AMAZING! I’ve tried a ton of night creams and this one is by far my favorite. Leaves my face glowing and has significantly reduced dark spots and fine lines on my face.
product_name: Goodnight Glow Bakuchiol Sleeping Crème

review_text: I couldn’t be any happier with this mask! When ai first opened it I felt in love with the vanilla- like scent that emerged right off this container. It was so smooth to apply and it seem my skin loved it because within only 5 min. It absorbed it. I’m guilty of not taking good care of my skin and abusing it by exposing it to computer lights all day long. This mask was simply amazing! My skin felt so good that I will continue to use it, it definitely made a difference and the scent stayed with me even after a good rinse.DISCLAIMER: I received this mask for free in exchange for my honest opinion. I was in no way told or forced to leave a positive review, I simply enjoy the positive results I’m experiencing.
product_name: Greek Yoghurt Probiotic Superdose Face Mask

review_text: Absolutely love this product!! It’s one of the only products that cleared my acne without causing itching or burning. I’ve bought several new bottles and am a huge fan! I’d recommend this to anyone with combination to oily skin. It cleared up my acne so well!
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: This cleanser makes my skin feel so fresh
product_name: Crème Radiance Gentle Cleansing Creamy-Foam Cleanser

review_text: YEARS…. And I mean YEARS and thousands of dollars later of trying to find products for my dry, hypersensitive and reactive skin. This whole time sephora was creating this gold mine of a product. First aid beauty has nothing on this formula, and actually FAB products gave me one of the worst breakouts of my life. This is literally the best moisturizer i’ve ever used. My skin looks amazing and is glowing from the inside out. I am forever grateful for this product!!! I use it with the firming eye cream and glow serum, it is simply a chefs kiss. Don’t think about it just buy it for real
review_title: PLEASE RUN TO SEPHORA FOR THIS NOW
product_name: Nourishing Moisturizer with Prebiotics

review_text: Magic potion in a bottle! Seriously. The texture is very lightweight, it’s very watery and gets absorbed quickly. I’ve used this lotion daily every morning after my cleansing routine in conjunction with La Mer hydrating emulation, and my skin has never looked better. It evens out my skin tone and visually makes my skin brighter and healthier looking. It keeps my skin hydrated throughout the day.
product_name: The Treatment Lotion

review_text: I received a Deluxe Sample of Isle Glow face moisturizer and I was impressed.  It left me with a dewy glow that was very hydrating.  I didn’t notice much color from the tint, even though I have fair skin, and the sparkle was nice, and not super obvious.  The fact that it is a sunscreen is an added bonus!  Would definitely recommend.
product_name: Isle Glow Face Moisturizer SPF 45 with Sea Moss and Niacinamide

review_text: First time I’ve used an overnight mask and I have to admit it is hydrating and my skin appears former after 3 weeks of use. Still I think it can be better and there’s room for improvement as that firmness does not last all day. Overall a good mask
product_name: Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask

review_text: The moment I used this serum I was hooked! My skin has been looking fresher than ever
product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: This hydrating cream is amazing. It gave my skin that hydration it needed. Helped my skin to feel hydrated and moisturized. The texture of the cream is so soft and melts into your skin. I recommend 10/10.
product_name: Essential Energy Hydrating Cream

review_text: I was waiting to try it from long time. It’s been a week I’m trying and i can already see the difference. It’s another magic of wishful. I think you all out there should try this beauty.
product_name: Thirst Trap Juice Hyaluronic Acid & Peptide Hydrating Facial Serum

review_text: I am very excited to be able to try this serum. It recommends 4-5 drops but I think 1-2 are plenty to be moisturized and not noticeably oily. It feels very nice
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: This product is awesome. I have struggled with “hang nails” and dry, cracked, even bloody hands for years. What made it worse continuing to pull on dry skin. This product has helped me stop a 16 year habit of picking and biting the skin around my nails. My hands are so soft and the dry skin has healed amazingly. I like to put this on at bedtime. Highly recommend!
product_name: Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve

review_text: It felt more like a moisturizer instead of a face mask. It didn’t really do much for my skin except make some areas shiny. I think the Sephora clay mask were better than these face mask
product_name: Instant Masks

review_text: Great product, but the quality only lasts for a month or so. I threw my first one away after a couple months and purchased another. The problem is that washing it really ruins quality over time. I would only recommend it if you have the time and patience to hand wash it every week.
product_name: Silk Pillowcase - Standard/Queen

review_text: I really loved the original formula of this cream and I’m super disappointed to see they’ve taken out a bunch of the key ingredients and replaced them with artificial colouring ! i hope they go back to the old formula
review_title: Sad I’ve lost on a must have for me
product_name: Ceramidin Skin Barrier Moisturizing Cream

review_text: I love this lip balm, I am a sucker for tube balms and I love eucalyptus anything. This balm soothes my dry cracked lips that I get every single winter and it also leaves a nice shine to the lips so you don’t have to wear a lip gloss over it (if you like to multitask your products). This is one of my must haves in my purse, makeup bag, backpack, etc.
product_name: Menthol And Eucalyptus Lip Balm

review_text: This cleanser smells great and leaves my skin luminous and soft.
product_name: Essential-C Cleanser

review_text: This is a hidden gem! I love this moisturizer! It’s really great if you’re using actives and would like a moisturizer with almost nothing in. It does have HA! Which is awesome and it shows! This one works well with multiple sunscreens and never pills!
product_name: All Day Hyaluronic Acid Hydrator Moisturizer

review_text: Amazing, I like that it was a gel to foam or cream to foam cleanser. My face always feels so amazing after using
product_name: Total Cleans'r Makeup-Removing Cleanser with Barbados Cherry

review_text: At first I was liking this product. Because of Covid and work from home I don’t wear makeup as much as I used to. I put makeup on recently and it just did not go on well over this product. It made my makeup look dry and not have a smooth application. The product does get pilly also. Not sure if it’s from getting combined with my eye cream (the inky list Caffeine eye cream) or not bc I often notice the pilling closer to my upper cheeks and eyes. I probably will not be repurchasing.
product_name: Vitamin C Brightening Cream

review_text: This product does exactly what it says it will. I felt a difference within a few days of use. I woke up with noticeably softer skin after incorporating it into my nighttime skincare routine. Not only did my skin feel softer and smoother, it also corrected some uneven skin tone that I was experiencing from recent sun exposure. It reduced puffiness around my eyes after just five days of use. I would highly recommend!!
product_name: Advanced Génifique Night Cream with Triple Ceramide Complex

review_text: These unfortunately did not work for me. I had a mini bump knowing it was a small zit that was about to form. I put one of the patches over the zit over night but nothing happened, it didn’t even reduce in size. I tried to give it another shot the next night, still nothing happened and the zit grew BIGGER. I would not recommend this product. Peace Out Skincare works 10x better this
product_name: Focuspot Micro Tip Patches

review_text: Absolutely love! I’ve tried out a lot of sunscreen and this is the only one that is not only lightweight but also doesn’t leave your face greasy.
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: Starting using this a couple of days ago and I’ve already noticed a huge difference! I’ve been trying to get rid of post inflammatory hyperpigmentation left behind by a couple of old and bew pimples. I was using YTTP vitamin c in the morning to help and it was effective but it wasn’t doing enough for me, so I added this to my night routine. Noticed that the dark spots faded the day after my first use. Three days later and my skin is almost clear again! I was using the DE baby facial and TLC serum prior to this but this is so much more effective for my skin and it’s saving me a lot of money.
product_name: Acid Potion AHA + BHA Resurfacing Exfoliator

review_text: Wish this could’ve worked for me but it didn’t , i received the 7 packet sample and I was really exited to try it since I love fresh products but it make my skin break out , I guess it’s not for every type of skin , I have combination skin, oily on the t-zone and kind of dry on the cheeks .
product_name: Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask

review_text: After receiving this as a gift, I can say that I love the way it smooths into the skin! It leaves my under eyes super hydrated and my concealer sits perfectly on top. I love that it’s vegan and cruelty free all the while being affordable.
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This and the niacinimide products from the inkey list completely cleared my skin.
product_name: Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) Blemish + Blackhead Serum

review_text: I was excited with my new eye cream option. It felt creamy and moisturizing but I had to return after 3 days of purchase. My under eyes felt dry with a slightly burn sensation. I was bummed it didn’t work for me, but it’s ok, everyone’s skin is different.  Other than that, I loved how creamy it was.
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: This was way to strong for my skin and caused my skin to dry out. My skin was able to recover after I stopped using it.
product_name: Acne+ 2% BHA + Azelaic Acid + Niacinamide + AHA Cleanser

review_text: J’adore ce produit! Je l’applique sur ma main et frotte un peu avant de masser sur mon visage au complet. Je rinse et l’huile se transforme en une sorte de liquide/lait texture. Tout mon maquillage est enlevé incluant mon mascara et rouge à lèvres! J’adore l’odeur d’amandes aussi très reposant!
product_name: Vinoclean Makeup Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: This mask has been the best for thristy skin to that needs hydration. The serum locks into the skin looking youthful and radiant.I highly recommend this product for any with dry/combination skin.
product_name: Sheet Masks

review_text: I’m into it! It also looks so cute with all my other skincare. This foam is light weight and feels great on my combination skin. So far I have used it for a week and I haven’t noticed anything drastic but it does feel nice. This was gifted by Benefit.
product_name: The POREfessional Good Cleanup Foaming Cleanser

review_text: Love this! I had a few big breakouts on my cheek and usually the redness turns into dark pigmentation so I started using this right away and in a matter of a week, the red marks completely faded! I have not seen anything work this quickly. It says to use it at night but I have been using it morning and night and I have gotten no irritation. My skin has been looking so nice. Will buy again.
product_name: Tranexamic Acid Hyperpigmentation Treatment

review_text: It’s a nice scrub that gets the job done without being overly abrasive on the skin! Def recommended for any skin type. Super nice on my neck, chest, and shoulders!
product_name: Yo Detox Charcoal Face & Body Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I’ve only used these patches at night when going to bed and never under makeup. I feel like they helped a little to diminish the size of my blemishes. The only thing preventing me from repurchasing is the price . I’ve tried the more affordable alternatives and they work just as well.
product_name: Salicylic Acid Acne Day Dots

review_text: I love this product! I’m halfway through my 2nd bottle and I’m def gonna be buying a 3rd. The biggest change I see with this is the bloating. It also has helped keep me regular which I can’t complain about. If you’re on the fence about it I would say just try it you might be surprised how well this works for you. Everyone’s body is different so it might take a couple days before you start to notice if this is working for you (for me it took about a week) but if you stick with it it’s worth it.
product_name: Flatter Me Digestive Enzyme Supplement

review_text: I currently use and love Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum, so I was eager to try the Toner from the same line. Not really amazed by it. Sure it tones and cleans, but felt too soapy for liking. It may be better for others, but I love my facing feeling tight after toning and before applying my moisturizer.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: This is the best product ever for removing texture from my skin without removing natural oils or making my face dry. I will forever have this in my facial routine.
product_name: Mini Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

review_text: Around my eyes get super dry in the winter. Even my eye lids were flaking since they were so dry. Once I started using this I noticed a big difference in how hydrated my under eyes look. I highly recommend and even bought a back up.
review_title: brought moisture back to my flaky, dry eye area
product_name: Eye Doctor Moisture Care For Skin Around Eyes

review_text: I received this product in a Sephora gratis package for my honest review. I really wanted to like this product but it was too much for my sensitive skin. If you don’t have sensitive skin this would be a great product to start an anti-aging regimen with.
product_name: Glow Peel Pads

review_text: I am so happy with how this treatment worked for me. After having my son, I went from having a plump
product_name: PRO Strength Lactic Pore Treatment

review_text: This stuff really help reduce my redness on my chin and really helps hydrate my skin for the day. I love applying this after I wash my face and before makeup applicants. This really helps make everything go on smoother
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I was experiencing dry skin due to cold weather. My skin is pretty resilient. But this mask made my dryness worse and I broke out in a red dry rash around my mouth. Like almost a peel? I don’t know what to do. I left the mask on for maybe 5-10mins and left the remaining stuff on my face.
product_name: Clean Face Mask

review_text: I have dry/sensitive skin, this has fixed all the dry patches i got from the DE retinol. Highly recommend. Skin never looked better and the packaging is nice to look at as well
product_name: Thirst Trap Juice Hyaluronic Acid & Peptide Hydrating Facial Serum

review_text: I finally come around using oil on my face, I did stay away from oils for having oily skin, little goes a long way, it’s on the top oil I have, now I finish my skin care with oil always.
review_title: This the best oil i ever use
product_name: 100% Sugarcane Squalane Oil

review_text: glowing skin - check. Easy to apply - check. Does exactly what it promises and love the compactness. Easy to carry in my bag all the time. No scent at all. Will def buy again.
review_title: The perfect SPF to carry in your purse
product_name: Glow Stick Sunscreen SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: Overall its a good moisturizer, tho me being adark skin woman it does make me look gray.So i can only wear it at night or days i put onmakeup. A little goes a long way
review_title: leaves a white hue on darker complexions
product_name: SHIKULIME Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30

review_text: I am not much of a serum girl but I did like how this felt. Soaked into skin pretty quickly. I look forward to seeing results after a few uses
product_name: Thirst Trap Juice Hyaluronic Acid & Peptide Hydrating Facial Serum

review_text: I was very surprised with the results I got using this product! My skin is so smooth, my makeup is flawless and doesn’t make my face oily.
product_name: Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid

review_text: Love dr jart and every product i have was amazing. This was no less! I have lots of hyper pigmentation & sensitive, red skin & this helped calm it down a lot. Recommend to anyone that want quick & definite soothing!!
product_name: Cryo Rubber Masks

review_text: I’ve always had very distinct and big pores and this has truly made the most noticeable difference of any product I’ve tried. I use a few times a week and noticed results as soon as the next morning after first use.
product_name: PRO Strength Lactic Pore Treatment

review_text: I love the packaging, I love the consistency and smell but it hasn’t done much to hydrate my skin. It ok alone but when I mix it with vitamin E oil it lasts longer
review_title: It’s a Grade C for me
product_name: Confidence in a Gel Lotion

review_text: Smells awful, feels nice on the skin, I haven’t noticed a difference at all. Sometimes acts weird and causes my moisturizer to pill on top of it.
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I am so in love with this spf! I needed a new sunscreen and was so glad I could try this one! Supergoop has always had some incredible spfs that have worked for me and my combo oily skin. This spf I swear I smelled popcorn when I first applied it! I know that sounds crazy weird, or maybe I was just craving popcorn in the am when I’ve applied it, lol. The initial “scent“ dissipates instantly once applied to the skin as well. This is nice and sheer to the skin and slightly oily on my combo oily skin. It does dissipate and sinks into the skin within a few minutes and looks great on the skin. It’s nice this is 30 spf but I do prefer 50 or higher, personally. But I know I’m protected during the day while at home. When I do leave the house, I will reapply to ensure I am protected against the suns harmful rays. This has a white creamy texture (see pics) and there is no white cast, which I am so happy with! I definitely recommend as Supergoop is a brand I really have been happy with!
product_name: Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I bought this cleanser alone, rather than with the other products in this line, as I already really enjoy my drugstore moisturizer. This cleanser is great. I noticed my skin cleared up after about a month of use (I don’t have bad acne or anything but definitely noticed a difference). I love the mild scent that this cleanser has, and the consistency/texture is lovely as well. The packaging is also great - no need to worry about the cap being loose or falling off as it simply twists to open. I find that a small amount goes a long way so this will last me probably about 5-6 months. Also a great makeup remover - which I find most cleansers don’t achieve well. This cleanser won’t make your skin feel dry and does not feel heavy on your face. This is a great every day cleanser, and I will be purchasing again.
product_name: Total Cleans'r Makeup-Removing Cleanser with Barbados Cherry

review_text: okay soo let’s just get this out of the way. I did receive this product complimentary which is amazing because this little bottle is a big price tag! Second it doesn’t change my thoughts on it either! I want to make sure your money is well spent! So is this worth your money? YES! I’ve been battling with enlarged pores within the past year (probably because I’m getting older) and I noticed a difference at week 2! I use this product twice a week and you don’t have to use much of this product so it’ll last you awhile! I recommend investing in your skin! You only have one of them! So if you’ve been looking for a product for pore minimizing this is it!
review_title: YOU NEED TO TRY THIS PRODUCT
product_name: PRO Strength Lactic Pore Treatment

review_text: Wear this every night I have oily skin and I don’t like anything heavy on my skin at night and this feels slightly sticky at first but when it drys it feels like nothing is on your skin which I love and I have been seeing results with fine lines and wrinkles and helps with my acne.
product_name: Mandelic Acid 10% + HA

review_text: I bought this to replace my acne wash, as I don’t really have as much of an issue with breakouts, but wanted something similar as a preventative measure. It’s super concentrated, which makes me happy, since it will last longer. I haven’t had any breakouts since I started using it, so I recently moved on to using it on the backs of my arms as well. The only downfall is that it SMELLS awful. It’s not a dealbreaker, but it would be much more enjoyable to use if I didn’t have to hold my breath
product_name: Alpha Beta AHA/BHA Daily Cleansing Gel

review_text: I must admit that I’m kinda disappointed this didn’t work for me, especially considering I bought 2 bottles because I was reading that it was constantly out of stock. I saw glowing reviews on it and the description/ingredients seemed spot-on to what I was looking for in a chemical exfoliant. Before trying this, I was only used to using products with glycolic acid and even though I had gotten some results with that, I felt like it wasn’t addressing enough concerns. So I thought something “lighter” would be more suitable for me. I will say the consistency of it terrified me during my first application because it feels kinda oily and doesn’t absorb easily, at all. I also noticed that it calmed some redness and irritation, almost immediately. It SEEMED like it was reducing my acne in the beginning, but after using it for a couple more weeks, my acne started coming back and it was more than before. I was baffled, so I started slowly canceling out other products I was using. I finally broke down and considered that maybe it was this product... so I told myself I would stop using it for a week and almost immediately, I stopped having new breakouts. I truly wanted this to work, especially because it seems so many other people like it, but it just isn’t for me. I have combination/dry skin and prone to breakouts... so, if your skin type is remotely similar to mine, I’d be cautious on trying this.
review_title: I wanted this to work so badly!
product_name: Mandelic Acid 10% + HA

review_text: Love this product! It calms my skin and lessens the redness. My skin is sensitive and is easily irritated by many products. I had Accutane treatment about 12 years ago for my cystic acne. After years of no issues, the acne started coming back - not nearly as bad but still bothersome. I spent a year testing a variety of products and found that Herbivore worked best for my skin. I use the Emerald Oil after washing my face with the Herbivore Charcoal Bar every day and it keeps my skin clear and without irritation. I love that the Emerald Oil provides moisture without feeling greasy. I highly recommend!
review_title: Permanently a part of my routine
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: it didn’t work at all I’ve been using it for a 2 WHOLE weeks and it’s a total rip off.
product_name: Pearly Girl Vegan Teeth Whitening Pen

review_text: I was a little skeptical about trying this night cream since one of the main ingredients is Shea butter, and I have oily – combo skin. The consistency of this cream is super thick – almost like a cream ointment, so you only need a very small amount to do the job if you have skin like me – more if you have drier skin. I know there seemed to be some complaints about how crazy thick it is, but I see it as a little going a long way, and I think one jar will last me at least four months or so. Plus The price point is amazing. I was so tired of spending so much money on night creams that just left my face feeling greasy and broke me out. My skin felt really nourished and moisturized when I woke up in the morning – and no break outs so far. As for reducing the lines and wrinkles, I can’t really speak to that at this moment. I am approaching my mid 30s and don’t see any visible lines yet although I know it’s coming so I’m just using this as a prolonging measure.
review_title: now a part of my night time skin care regimen
product_name: Ultra Repair Hydra-Firm Night Cream

review_text: I use several Caudalie products and love them to death, so when I discovered this I was very excited about it. After trying it, I thought it was worth the hype; got all my makeup off in one go, very gentle even on my sensitive skin - seemed perfect. However, after several weeks using it, I started breaking out - not all over my face but one or two big pimples constantly, which is unusual for me. I quit using this, and it stopped. My skin is very sensitive and prone to react with changes in skincare but I was still disappointed. I would still recommend you try if you’re on the fence, it’s a great product!
review_title: Works great but made me breakout
product_name: Vinoclean Makeup Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: Thank you so much for this opportunity to try out dr. Zenovia. This was first that I heard this name before.
product_name: Aloe Vera Blemish Soothing Moisturizer

review_text: I Was gifted by Alpyn Beauty. This moisturizer is so smooth. It goes on smooth and absorbs very quickly. It leaves my skin moisturized and it melts on very nicely. I like the light scent and gentle formula. It felt luxurious and clean.
product_name: Melt Moisturizer with Bakuchiol and Squalane

review_text: This will NOT disappoint! I have very difficult skin (sensitive, oily/combination, larger pore size and hormonal acne with texture and redness) - this mask is the ONLY clay-based mask that soothes my skin, keeps acne at bay, and visibly shrinks my t-zone pores in 1 use. I especially love using the week before my period to get a head start at fighting any increased oil production. Life-saving product, i’m on my 5th tub maybe? 1 jar lasts me about 5-6 months (i use this once a week maybe) it can be A BIT drying if you’re using it a few times a week (i started breaking out when i did that). 100% WOULD RECOMMEND.
review_title: Why this product saved my life
product_name: Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: I love this product it makes my skin super glowy and hydrated. I love the results for my skin.
product_name: Dream Oasis Deep Hydration Serum

review_text: LOVE this product. Super hydrating and my skin feels amazing the next day. The packaging is so nice that I leave it on the counter too! Highly recommend
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: This product is AMAZING! After one use I saw a difference. I had to go get the mask for the face. If the eye treatments are this good I cant wait to use the mask on my face!
product_name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask

review_text: Decent cleanser and does what it advertises! Not ideal for makeup removal, but great second cleanser. Nice scent!
product_name: goopglow Cloudberry Exfoliating Jelly Cleanser

review_text: I have tried many products to help with blackheads on my nose area since it’s the most oily there and nothing has seemed to help u til this!! I love the fact it is a 2 in 1 product and I can use it as a mask on my whole face or on trouble areas or/and as a cleanser. It’s also helped to balance my skin out for the most part and helped reduction of oil on my nose! This is a great product and I highly recommend this to anyone rather you have blackhead issues or not. The benefits will benefit anyone and my face is sooo soft! It doesn’t dry out my face in other areas that are “normal” and it doesn’t make my face feel stiff afterwards either. Highly recommend!
product_name: Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub

review_text: I love that this is a lightweight sunscreen or all skin types and tones. It does not leave any white residue, which I love. I can have sensitive skin, so does my mom, and we both really like this product. This summer I will be so loyal to this product I already know it!
product_name: Invisible Physical Defense Mineral Sunscreen SPF30

review_text: It was gifted by alpyn beauty wildcrafted plant genius melt moisturizer, I’m so glad I was I absolutely love it and so does my skin. My skin felt so soft and smooth and could definitely tell a difference after just a few uses. It came packaged very well to protect the moisturizer because it is in a glass container. Definitely would recommend to everyone !
product_name: Melt Moisturizer with Bakuchiol and Squalane

review_text: I received this as part of a promotion. This is a hard balm almost like coconut oil so you do need to rub it between your fingers to warm it up. A little goes a long way with this product. It is hydrating and makes my skin feel nice and plump in the a.m. it absorbs well and really feels like it is strengthening my skin.
product_name: Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask with 10.5% Squalane

review_text: i liked it but it was continually sliding off my face the whole time i was using it. i have very sensitive skin and it didn’t give me a reaction or make my skin break out. i would use this product again
product_name: Cryo Rubber Masks
