review_text: I received this in an Influenster’s box and I’m so glad I did! It is amazing, my skin is brighter and this product has helped with lighten acne scaring and I feel like within 3 days I’ve seen huge improvement with healing current acne as well!
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: This made my skin feel so nice and clean! It was also super relaxing to use as part of my routine.
product_name: Clean Face Mask

review_text: It feels really good, scentless so theres no harsh smells or damaging fragrances.  I really enjoyed it . I think it’s a little on very priced personally but that doesnt mean it’s not a good product .
product_name: SKINPOWER Cream

review_text: does exactly what it describes...couldn’t be happier. Just wish it was bigger or cheaper.
product_name: JuJu Exfoliating Bar

review_text: Skinfix is my favorite brand for its effectiveness. This face lotion nourishes my face while protecting it with a barrier to lock in moisture and keep my hydrated. My skin feels plumper too!
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Lotion Moisturizer

review_text: This spf is wonderful! It’s lightweight with a creamy gel like texture that works under all of my primers/foundations with no pulling at all and it sinks right in giving your skin a silky velvet feel. No greasiness at all. It also doesn’t make my eyes water as alot of sunscreens do. This is gonna be my new go to for spf.
product_name: Urban Environment Vita-Clear Sunscreen SPF 42

review_text: - I used this on my face and neck. But I focus my results on my neck because I usually neglect that area and deal with eczema there. AND OMG, after one use I can see a huge improvement there. My neck lines look less apparent! With consistent use, I don’t see any more drastic changes. But I’m still very happy with it since it doesn’t irritate my eczema prone skin. I don’t see any changes on my face but I’d like to use it as a preventative.- Minimal stickiness Received this for free from influenster but opinions are my own
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Serum

review_text: A retinol with ceramides? Yes please! I love that this product has a high enough percentage of retinol to give me all the anti-aging and anti-acne benefits I’m looking for, but also hydrates my sensitive skin.
product_name: A-Gloei Retinol Oil

review_text: These definitely work! Truth be told, you have to be slightly careful even when blending with a lotion or serum to cover your face (And neck) evenly or you risk streaks or some staining on your hands.
product_name: THE FACE Illuminating Self-Tan Drops

review_text: One of the best sleeping masks I have used! This will definitely be my new go-to. It smells amazing and doesn’t leave any residue on my face over night. I woke up with my skin feeling so soft and hydrated. It also brightened my skin!
product_name: YUZU-C Beauty Sleeping Mask

review_text: I received this product from Influenster and Evelom in exchange for my honest review. I have  oily skin and with occasional acne. These worked great overnight in Zita. Would recommend.
product_name: Salicylic Acid Acne Day Dots

review_text: This sunscreen absorbs really well into the skin and has minimal to no scent. With that said, I don’t see how it’s any better than some of the face sunscreens you can purchase at a drugstore. The packaging is very fancy and it has JLo’s name on it but other than that in a blind test I would not be able to tell the difference between this sunscreen with my less expensive one.
product_name: That Big Screen Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: This is such a great serum I can feel the difference in my skin immediately I use it before going to bed and waking up the next day my face feels so supple.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Hyaluronate Serum

review_text: Gifted by Dermalogica. It’s a very powerful moisturizer with vitamin c, e, HA and lactic acid. It gives deep moisture and plumps the skin. It can be a bit heavy on acne-prone skin & oily skin, even combination skin. I’d recommend this moisturizer to people with dry skin and mature skin. It does make the skin super smooth and supple. Since it has many active ingredients, it is not the best for skincare beginners.
review_title: Good for dry skin & mature skin
product_name: Skin Smoothing Cream Moisturizer

review_text: I used this eye cream in the evenings to correct dark circles and it is very effective at both brightening and reducing dark circles. I can have sensitive skin in my eye area, and it felt very soothing and moisturizing as well. I can see why it is often sold out! I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox.
product_name: Premier Cru Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: This product is interesting! It’s really moisturizing and feels nice on the skin. It also smells really nice! I like the way the bottle works as well, it’s upside down so all the product is already toward the lid. However, when the tan developed it was a little too orange for my liking. It stuck to my knees and ankles (even though I exfoliated beforehand) and was a tad patchy. I think I’ll keep trying it, but it may be a little too orange for my skin tone.
product_name: Even Skin Tone Self-Tanning Body Butter

review_text: It does what it says, I would repurchase this and try the others too.
product_name: Clean Lip Balm & Scrub

review_text: i still say clinique remover is number 1. If you have money to spend great, it works, if you don’t, just get something cheaper.
product_name: Mini Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: Not impressed with this oil. I like the idea of using rose quartz, but the product kept getting in my eyes and would blur my vision. I have long lashes so it’s easy for the oil to sneak up into my eyes. Could just put it under eyes only but above the eyes need it too.
product_name: Noni Radiant Brightening Eye Oil

review_text: I started trying this moisturizer a week ago and what I’ve liked it so far it’s that it makes your skin feel soft, the texture of the cream is smooth and the size of the container is big enough..something I didn’t like about it,is that I didn’t feel it is totally absorbed by the skin so after applying it,you still get the skin kind of sticky..It ‘d be perfect for using it at nights before going to bed but not during the day,specially before make up ‘cause then the compact powder won’t absorb well..
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Moisturizer

review_text: If you were thinking about getting Pat McGrath’s divine essence, DON’T. Save yourself some money and get this instead.
product_name: Great Skin Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I LOVE THIS MASK!!! SO MUCH!!! i was looking for a new face mask and decided to try this one because i’ve loved every other fenty product i’ve tried, and wow!!! this mask is unlike anything i’ve ever used before. i absolutely love the texture of it and the way it applies and feels on the skin (i use it on damp skin). the charcoal beads are so cool!! it left my face feeling soo smooth and clean. it feels so good as it’s sitting on your face too!! totally recommend and will be repurchasing; it’s perfect for a self care night. fenty has done it again!!!!
product_name: Cookies N Clean Whipped Clay Pore Detox Face Mask with Salicylic Acid + Charcoal

review_text: This mask has a delicious scent smelling strawberries and other sweet summertime fruits. It is cold when you apply the mask, like opening the freezer after a long hot run. But, it is refreshing and a must for anyone working from home. Since my living room has become my office, I have been having difficulty finding a work-life balance, but this is a friendly reminder to treat yourself and relax a little. For the price, it is an excellent add-on when completing an order.
product_name: Clean Face Mask

review_text: I have oily skin with hyperpigmentation and acne scars. I do still get active acne despite being over 30. It’s a big bottle for the price paid but I don’t think I’ll be repurchasing. Not a fan of the ’alcohol’-like smell and upon applying with a cotton pad, my skin feels a bit tight. I apply moisturizer right after. I wanted to give this a try because I’ve tried other Caudalie products and liked them, and the fact that it’s ’clean’ skincare.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: I have been searching for a product that contains Vitamin C.  Going on to my mid 30’s, I thought it is never too early to start using products that would help with collagen production and have anti-aging properties.  I have suffered acne during my teenage years which cleared in my twenties, and back again in my 30’s.  After receiving this product as a sample, I decided to give it a try. The first application, I used it at night, the next morning, my skin was radiant, glowing and acne scars faded.  Throughout the week, I’ve noted that my skin is more clear and radiant.  After researching the different oils and reviews from other customers, decided to purchase the whole bottle.  It has been 3 weeks and I am still happy with the results.
product_name: 100% Sugarcane Squalane Oil

review_text: I liked it, gave me a nice even brown and left my skin glowing even after I showered. Light fragrance, kind of reminds me of cucumber? But after a few hours does start to smell like “self tan”. Didn’t like that the glitter had weird buildup but I just wiped the extra buildup off with a cotton round. Gave me a nice even tan and I look extra toasty which was the goal. St. Tropez gives me a rash and this doesn’t! Also a plus that it doesn’t rub off everywhere so you’re not chained to the house.
product_name: Even Skin Tone Self-Tanning Body Butter

review_text: After using once, my face felt softer and looked smooth and plump. The formula is definitely concentrated and I was surprised by the slight tingling sensation. I am looking forward to using twice a week as directed and hoping to see some improvement on some of my stubborn acne scars. I will definitely be able to get more than 5 application out of this mask, as the formula goes on thin.One of my favorite things about this mask is that the application time is only 3 minutes, which is easy to fit into my beauty routine!
product_name: Instant Masks

review_text: I really love to spray this mist on my face as soon as I get out of the shower!! My skin is overly sensitive during spring thanks to all the pollen in the air. I get itchiness, redness and minor rash during the transitional seasons and this mist has helped me alleviate and survive all that drama. I use it along with the honey savior salve by pharmacy and although I still have enough for a couple months I am ordering a couple back ups because my teenage son , who gets occasional acne breakouts , also likes to incorporate it in his routine from time to time. Highly recommended for dry sensitive skin!
product_name: Adaptogen Soothe + Hydrate Activated Mist with Peptides

review_text: I don’t understand all the hype on this; I have tried it out twice and both times I have an orange tint and it’s streaky looking even when applying evenly with the mitt. Waste of money; like all the other cheaper ones.
product_name: Self Tan Express Bronzing Mousse

review_text: Didn’t foam up enough for me, so I felt like I had to use more to really clean my skin. Also feel like my pores were a bit clogged after use.
product_name: Teatreement Cleansing Foam

review_text: This eye cream is amazing for those who don’t like eye creams that give them that weird tingle sensation. I love the smell of this eye cream and what it does for my eyes. It noticeably brightens my eyes and helps cover dark circles and bags. I’ve been using farmacy beauty products for awhile and this was gifted by farmacy beauty but did not sway my review
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: Wow this product is amazing. It does exactly what it says it does. It leaves you blemish free.
product_name: Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) Blemish + Blackhead Serum

review_text: For a month I have used this, I even got my hubby to use it and I adore it! It is gentle yet leaves your face brighter, softer and my skincare and makeup apply beautifully after.
product_name: SATOCANE Pore Purifying Scrub Mask

review_text: This lux serum is really a good one! Just upon using it the application is so delightful, it’s literally feels like soft velvet on the skin. It’s one of those that is so silky, so velvety, so smooth on the skin it almost feels like your apply a “cloud” experience.  I will say it does have a musky earthy fragrance, which I enjoy….but it’s strong enough if scent bothers someone it could be a issue. Upon using it your skin feels so soft, and for my skin I almost saw instant reduction of redness, which then created brightening of my skin. This serum is pricey, but the experience of using it, with it creating results it says could make it worth that price.
product_name: The Concentrate Serum

review_text: I liked this moisturizer a lot but I don’t think it’s worth the price that is being charged. There are products that work just as good if not better for a fraction of the cost.  It goes on great and has very little scent which is a must for me. To put on a good even layer you will have to use more than the 2 pumps it states to use. It does absorb good into the skin and after several weeks, you can see a difference.
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: Nice mask. I have very sensitive skin and this didn’t irritate or cause any redness. It left my skin very smooth and hydrated. I’ve tried other anti-redness masks from other brands and so far this has been the best.
review_title: great for sensitive skin and rosacea
product_name: Evercalm Ultra Comforting Rescue Mask

review_text: So harsh and zero results. My skin is very used to chemical exfoliants (I was using P50 before this) and I found this makes my skin so irritated. I’ve given it a month or so (using around twice/week) to see if it improves anything, and I see no difference in my skin texture or glow. Probably has just damaged my moisture barrier. :/
product_name: Acid Potion AHA + BHA Resurfacing Exfoliator

review_text: I received this as a sample couple months ago and loved it. I always like to have few products as a back up. This has really brightened my slight dark eyes and leaves it soft.
review_title: A Little goes a long ways...
product_name: Noni Radiant Brightening Eye Oil

review_text: It’s a very average toner. I did like that my skin did not feel stripped. Overall I’m not crazy about it but if you have the rest of the tea treatment line you might want to get it just to use all the products together. I wouldn’t get it If you can a toner that works for you that you already love
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: Didn’t change anything for my dark circles or fine lines.
product_name: White Lucent Anti-Dark Circles Eye Cream

review_text: Didn’t notice any great improvements. May work on tiny blemishes
product_name: Acne-Clear Invisible Dots

review_text: LOVE this product, it has helped tremendously with my acne and texture. I am new to retinol, I had a bad experience a few months ago with a different product that caused my skin to react and this has helped so much over the course of a month. I saw immediate results and didn’t purge.
product_name: A+ High-Dose Retinol Serum

review_text: It was light and non greasy.  It brightened my face, hydrated, and was easy on my skin. I was impressed in just a few days of use how my facial skin brightened and it helped the blemishes as well
product_name: The Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: I received this product complimentary by Influenster to try and give my honest feedback.I will absolutely be looking into using more Charlotte Tilbury line. Their products are absolutely off the charts. I am over the moon about the Cryo Recovering Eye Serum. I have been using it for about 2 weeks and I can tell a difference from day to day when I use it and I don’t. The product is so smooth it glides on like nothing I have used before. The application tip is such a amazing touch to this product. It stays cold so when you apply the product the cold helps to de-puff your under eyes. They use ice-tech of cryotherapy and the ancient art of facial acupressure to make this product work so well and see results almost instantly. Definitely 10/10 would recommend trying this!
product_name: Cryo-Recovery Depuffing Eye Serum

review_text: This mask was everything I had hoped for. I highly recommend. It made my face feel firm, while also refreshed. I would even buy this product again.
product_name: Cryo Rubber Masks

review_text: I don’t know why this isn’t more popular. First, the formulation is great! It’s both a chemical and physical sunscreen which means it works by both deflecting UV rays and releasing UV rays from the skin. The formulation is also very liquid-y and easily absorbs into skin. Since you typically need 1tsp to cover your face for sunscreen to be effective, this makes it super easy to apply. There is a slight white cast that goes away after being rubbed in. In addition, it will feel very oily but absorbs in a minute so it’s best to wait a minute for make-up application.
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: I love this sunscreen. There is a slight white cast, but it seems to go away after a little while. I usually also use the supergoop  resetting powder on top of it and I love the combo. I got my boyfriend to start using this sunscreen daily and he also likes it, though he says he feels as though it leaves a slight film after applying multiple times in a day.
review_title: My bf and I both use this daily!
product_name: Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I have been using this moisturizer for about three weeks. First I have to say I love all FAB for the quality and skin care benefits, doesn’t have heavy perfume smell. This does not disappoint. I can literally tell the lines around my eyes and just generally my skin is smoother and brighter.
product_name: Ultra Repair Firming Collagen Cream with Peptides and Niacinamide

review_text: Does a great job at moisturizing the skin without leaving it greasy. No negative things to say about it but also not AMAZED or noticed any long term benefits.
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: LOVE this product. It’s super gentle and doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry after using.
product_name: Squalane + Amino Aloe Gentle Pore-Minimizing Cleanser

review_text: I am loving this new wake up honey for my eyes and have been using it for a few weeks now. I’ve noticed that my eyes are less puffy in the mornings and am starting to see a slight improvement with the few spots I have around my eyes. It’s also a great hydrator, especially for the colder weather. Kindly gifted by Farmacy Beauty.
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: I’m liking this for quite a few reasons. It’s easy to apply - much easier than the lotion and dries pretty quickly (less than 2 minutes on my skin). Not pricey, maybe a bit more than other tanning lotions and products but it’s definitely worth paying that small amount extra as when comparing it to other brands; this product has the least streaking and most natural looking color, not orange, just a nice golden hue. Bonus: there is no funny smell left on your skin once you have washed it off.I find one full bottle lasts me for approximately 6 full body applications which makes it more than worth it for me. It is very much on the ’chemical’ side which is the only reason I haven’t given it a full 5 stars, but if you’re not overly concerned about that kind of thing then definitely give this a try.~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~(My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Hair Oil2. Shampoo: ’Sephora Collection’ - Deep Cleaning Shampoo3. Face Mask: ‘Peter Thomas Roth’ – Pumpkin Enzyme Mask4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Facial Treatment Serum5. Face Scrub: ‘Sisley’ - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream6. Lip Balm: ‘Nuxe’ – Reve De Miel Lip Balm7.Lip Liner: ‘Sephora Collection’ - Rouge Gel Lip Liner
product_name: Self Tan Classic Bronzing Mousse

review_text: I received this product from Influenster. It works well with the three-step regimen and it’s great to have peptides in a nice light moisturiser format
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Moisturizer

review_text: First of all this comes in a really cute frosted container. The eye cream is thick and lush, it doesn’t break my skin out and sinks in to my skin and leaves it smooth, it helps smooth my fine lines as well. I received this product complimentary from farmacy beauty
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: This product didn’t make my face feel greasy, or clog my pores. But after a couple hours having it on I noticed it has a weird plastic smell to it. It did an excellent job protecting my fair skin in the sun but I personally would like something scented.
product_name: Glow Stick Sunscreen SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This mist is good. The bottle is beautiful and very luxurious. The spray is very fine and even. I’m normally not a fan of rose, but this smells amazing and the rose smell is subtle and doesn’t linger. Gives a beautiful natural skin like glow without being too much.
product_name: Brume de Beauté Beauty Mist

review_text: This is a good face mask to sleep in. Out of all the products this brand has to offer this was my favorite. I have very dry skin, I wish this was a little more moisturizing. Besides that this is a wonderful product and I would recommend this to someone who is interested in a sleep mask.
review_title: This is something I’ll incorporate in my routine
product_name: YUZU-C Beauty Sleeping Mask

review_text: Influenster sent me this product to test out but I must say I absolutely love it! It cleans my face so well and it does not have a strong scent which is perfect for my sensitive skin! I would recommend this product!
product_name: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Face Cleanser

review_text: This product was great for my sensitive skin even, and still worked wonderfully as an exfoliator. It has been a life-saver in the winter to spring transition.
product_name: Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) Gentle Exfoliating Toner

review_text: I wanted to like this, but I was left disappointed. It did slightly reduce redness, but not enough to make me want to purchase the full size.
product_name: Cicapair  Tiger Grass Camo Drops Color Corrector SPF 35

review_text: The WASO Yuzu-C Beauty Sleeping Mask is a nice brightening overnight mask. I LOVE that it has vitamin C powered by sun-ripened Yuzu Citrus. I like to apply it over a lightweight oil-free gel moisturizer for extra hydration. My skin looks nice and glowy when I wake up.
product_name: YUZU-C Beauty Sleeping Mask

review_text: This product has changed my life! My mood has increased drastically. I used to wake up and lay in bed for a few hours and now I have so much more energy and everyone loves to be around me now lol this is a game changer!
product_name: Mini SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: I was so skeptical at first about using Ilia Bright Start Retinol Alternative Brightening Eye Cream and the claims it made of giving me brighter eyes and hiding? Covering up? Diminishing? Dark circles. But seriously I love the way I was able to easily glide it on and just add it to my everyday look and freshen up my tired “mom of 3 boys who never sleeps“  eyes this paired with my morning cup of coffee makes me unstoppable!!!
product_name: Bright Start Retinol Alternative Brightening Eye Cream

review_text: Helps a lot with bigger pimples. Undersuface pimples doesn’t work with this. Note for sensitive skin: it kind of burns when you apply on for the first 20 seconds. It helped remove most of my pimple scars.
product_name: Drying Lotion

review_text: This product is for very dry skin to the point where you have redness or cracked painful skin. In the winter my skin gets very dry and this healed the area overnight. This product could work for diaper rash or chaffing as well. It is expensive and an unusual type of moisturizer that is for dry spots, not the whole face or body. It smells like raw honey.
product_name: Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve

review_text: I loved this product, only reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is because the bottle definitely had a manufacture issue and the lid wouldn’t close right. I made the wrong decision of packing it in my suitcase with clothes and spilled over everything, had to leave it there! Will buy again but definitely check and make sure you got a good bottle!
product_name: Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) Gentle Exfoliating Toner

review_text: This product is amazing! A,t first at didn’t see any result but after changing my skin care routine and adding this product to it the result are incredible! For me, I saw a big difference after a one week or so, let the product do his work on your skin.
product_name: Mandelic Acid 10% + HA

review_text: I really love this and you need it so please get it..
product_name: That Fresh Take Eye Cream with Peptides

review_text: This works surprisingly well. My skin tone is more even looking since I began using it and my dark spots are noticeably lighter. The formula goes on nicely and didn’t cause any breakouts or leave behind a greasy residue.
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: Even after exfoliating this did not go on even and is very orange. It also has an awful smell. Very disappointed for this price point. I have had better results with Jergens with the same smell.
product_name: Even Skin Tone Self-Tanning Body Butter

review_text: I received a sample of this cream. It is perfect for my combination skin in a warm but dry winter.
product_name: Ultra Repair Hydra-Firm Night Cream

review_text: I have been using this serum twice a day for about a week now, and all I can say is WOW. My skin looks as if it’s glowing and fine lines around my lip area have already diminished. I received this product from influenster for testing purposes and I am so glad, I will be purchasing this again in the future.
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Serum

review_text: I’m so obsessed with this oil! Makes my skin feel so hydrated and gives it that glow we all want! Love that it’s rose scented will definitely repurchase!
product_name: Get Even Rose Face Oil

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Kora Organics .This berry bright vitamin c eye cream is a good addition to my skincare routine. It helps with my puffy eyes and brighten my undereye .I’ve been stressed lately and making my skin more dry. This eye cream is thick and it absorbs faster it works well under make up and my moisturizer. This is great if you have dry skin .it works great for me.
product_name: Berry Bright Firming Vitamin C Eye Cream

review_text: This is my first Sunday Riley product and so far, I’ve been pleasantly surprised with the results! I cannot speak too much on the overall brightening of the dark marks on my skin, but I can say it’s left my skin hydrated and I do wake up with a subtle glow!
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I’m incredibly fussy when it comes to my skin and hair. If a product performs well, I’m not afraid to spend money on it. I received this item free from Influenster in exchange for my unbiased review, and it’s outside my usual price point. Scratch that, it’s an exception to my usual price point and worth every penny. I went into this test with a raised eyebrow. I’ve used plenty of products that brag about how they’ll improve your skin and reverse the signs of aging, and I’ve yet to be dazzled by any of them. After using this for 4 weeks, I’m dazzled. This is the nicest moisturizer I’ve ever put on my skin. It just feels good when you put it on, and the pretty cobalt blue container makes you feel really fancy when you apply it. I used it at bedtime because I apply sunscreen in the morning. The first day after I used it, I woke up with really plump, hydrated looking skin, and it’s been a solid performer ever since. My pores look smaller  and the lines by my eyes are less noticeable. Even my “goal posts” ( wrinkles between my brows from 46 years of being expressive) have softened up. Stop the presses-The cynic has been dazzled!If the price is the only thing that’s keeping you from trying this amazing moisturizer, save up for it or cut corners somewhere else in your beauty budget so you can incorporate it into your skincare regimen. It’s absolutely worth the price, and because it’s higher end you don’t need nearly as much as you would a cheaper product. Just buy it already. Your skin will thank you.
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: This product claims to reduce the size of your pores by 58% in two weeks, I have been using this serum for over 6 weeks and have not seen a difference in the size of my pores. I would not recommend this product.
product_name: Pore Refining Solutions Correcting Serum

review_text: very light weight but yet moisturizing all its fits my budget i have high end moisturizers as well but it defiantly hangs with the best of them
product_name: All Day Hyaluronic Acid Hydrator Moisturizer

review_text: This is my all time favorite skincare product! ive been using it for about a year now and im in love. It has an amazing fresh fruity scent and always leaves my skin feeling clean and glow-y. it is a little pricey (at least for me) but its definitely worth it.
product_name: Truth Juice Daily Cleanser

review_text: For reference, I am in my early 40s, with combination skin, very dry areas due to the use of Vitamin C, and textured skin (pores, lines and dark spots). PROS: * The mask is very saturated with product. * It covered my face completely matching the eye, nose and mouth location perfectly. * It stays in place. * I kept it longer than the recommended time and left my face hydrated, plump and soft. * It has a nice relaxing scent but if you are not into perfumed products, this is not for you. * It has 95% ingredients from natural origin which is always appreciated. * Great value. CONS: * if you have sensitive skin you probably won’t like this mask as it has perfume as an ingredient. Thank you Sephora for trusting me to test and give my honest opinion about this mask. I loved it and will be purchasing more!
review_title: Relaxing spa experience for glowing skin
product_name: Clean Face Mask

review_text: I have really been enjoying this overnight cream! It’s very thick but doesn’t feel heavy on my skin. My skin feels healthier & looks a lot less dull in the mornings. I have noticed some lightening but the main reason I like it is the healthy glow it gives my skin.
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: I received this I’m exchange for my honest review, and honestly, I’m pretty happy. I always look at the price and see if I think it’s worth the cost. In this case, I think it is. The smell was heavenly in my opinion and my face felt so clean and moisturized. I could see this replacing my usual daily fash wash. A little really goes a long way too.
product_name: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Face Cleanser

review_text: I received this as a free sample with a purchase, but I plan to buy the full size when it runs out. The sample size is 0.17 fl oz, and I’ve used just half of it in a month.I have sensitive, combo skin than leans towards oily. I mix 2-4 drops of this into my moisturizing cream and apply only at night. This is a heavy oil, and I’d advise people with oily skin to try 1-2 drops with their moisturizer as I’ve over-moisturized with this stuff very easily.It didn’t break me out (yay!) I have mild acne and also get hormonal breakouts. I had a big, pink acne scar on my cheek that didn’t improve for 6 months, but after I started using this oil, it began to heal more quickly. (Also, I would advise anyone who is acne prone to spot test this first. You never know what might make you break out.)I don’t have a problem with the scent. It smells hemp-y, yes, but it also smells like rosemary. I’m used to natural smelling products as I have skin that can’t tolerate fragrance, but those more accustomed to fragrance in skin products may want to add and essential oil to the mixture.Overall, I love it, and I will repurchase. I probably never would have bought this without trying the sample first as the price would scare me away. This size would last me 6 months, which means I’m spending about $15 a month for glowy skin.
review_title: Good for my sensitive skin, scars
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: I got this product for free from Influenster. Similar to the eye balm, it was okay. I love the gel texture of the cleanser and it made my skin feel nice for the first couple days. However, I normally use CeraVe and I found my skin became more textured after using this cleanser. That’s not to say it would do the same thing to someone else’s skin. The biggest reason why I’m giving it 3 stars is because of the smell. It just smells like pure soap - the kind that would assault your nostrils when you would walk into your grandparents’ bathroom. It’s just unnecessary for the smell to be that pungent. This would be a far better product if it had no fragrance.
review_title: Nice texture but the smell is awful
product_name: The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: Sadly this didn’t work well for me. I wanted to love this and for non makeup days I do, but it just does not play well with my foundation. Something about this moisturizer breaks down my foundation and leaves it looking patchy and oily after only a few hours no matter what I do. I attempted giving it time to soak in before foundation and also doing makeup right away, various setting powders and sprays, with and without primer even though I don’t need any with my foundation usually, but each combo still left my base looking not so stellar. I’m sure this is a non issue with different foundations but since I have a harder time finding foundation I like than I do finding good moisturizers that work great for me I decided it’s just not worth it to switch things up in order to make this particular one work. I did receive this item complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Peptide 21 Wrinkle Resist Moisturizer

review_text: This moisturizer is great! I have dry/combo skin with mild rosacea, and this calms me right down. I prefer it over any other moisturizer I have tried. Subtle, light fragrance
product_name: Skin Smoothing Cream Moisturizer

review_text: This Caudalie Vinosource Hydra SOS intense moisturizer is great. I like the silky texture of the cream. It absorbs well into the skin leaving my skin soft and moisturized. It’s also lightweight which is great. Definitely recommend. #freeproduct
product_name: Vinosource-Hydra SOS Intense Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve been using various retinol serums for years. I just finished my Sunday Riley and thought I would try this because I love Farmacy products. It burned my skin within 3 days and I was using Retinol every day.
product_name: 1% Vitamin A Retinol Serum

review_text: Does not take off mascara and I’m blind. Blah!
product_name: Take The Day Off  Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: I like the sunscreen! There is no white residue like normal sunscreen and it leaves my skin looking moisturize and hydrated. Less is more and the coverage is great.
product_name: The True Cream - Aqua Bomb Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: I actually really liked it. I love the applicator! I felt like I have better control over the product and how much I wanted to use. I like the serum type texture. It applied nicely into the skin. It looked good on the skin. Best part was I felt my skin was protected. Overall very happy with this product!!!
product_name: Correct & Protect Broad Spectrum SPF 45| PA++++

review_text: I really like this sheet mask because it delivers results but I must say that it is uncomfortable and I find I look like a freak with it.  Still, I will continue to purchase it and hide from others for the half hour I have it on...
product_name: Sheet Masks

review_text: Not for sensitive skin.Made my cheek area worse that before.
review_title: Not for sensitive skin.Used as per instructions
product_name: Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) Gentle Exfoliating Toner

review_text: After using this for a few weeks, I can vouch for its gentleness on normal to dry, eczema-prone skin. It feels hydrating without being too heavy, which is working for me this summer.
product_name: Ultra Repair Hydra-Firm Night Cream

review_text: I have a deep brown toffee complexion and this is the BEST sunscreen I’ve ever used. It’s thin and easy to smooth out, leaving no white cast on my face.  It also saved my skin in terms of texture and hyperpigmentation which I’ve been struggling with for the last year. I use it everyday and don’t mind the price at all.
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: I would say its good for someone who has dry skin. it kind of has this oily tinge to it. I have combination skin and the hormonal sits on the chin when it’s that time of the month. the 1st time I used it, it felt really nice. By the 2nd use, I started getting little pimples. I continued using it thinking it was unclogging my skin. But I couldn’t handle the pimples any longer. so I returned it. just not for me.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: I used this product on my elbow and it feels very smooth, love the smell and can’t wait to try it on my face! Love Huda beauty products!!!
product_name: Yo Detox Charcoal Face & Body Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I’ve been having anxieties for quite some time and since starting having two capsules first thing in the morning, I strongly felt the difference in my mood and overall quality of my emotional state on day three. Makes you feel lighter and in control. It does work, I love the effect and the selection of the ingredients. I received it complimentary from Moon Juice. I’d recommend it and will buy it again. Thank you!
product_name: Mini SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: Dreamy!  Smooth as silk going on. Eye area stays hydrated through the night and eye area looks plumped up in the morning which helps diminish the look of dark circles.  This a great addition to the YTTP line up.  I have super sensitive eyes and I have had no issues.  Sunshine in a jar!  I will continue to purchase.
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: I purchased the normal size immediately after trying the travel size. I prefer this than the scrubbing one.
product_name: Pekee Cleansing Bar

review_text: This is the best daily self tanner I have ever used. I have light skin and this gives a nice colour after only one use. I have been using it every other day and the colour builds nicely, with no weird build-up or rub off. Pretty mistake proof to apply, just make sure you wash hands well at the end. As an added bonus, it truly works well as a moisturizer and leaves my skin noticeably soft. Finally, the best part is the smell or lack thereof! The watermelon is subtle and there is no self tan smell! I struggle to understand the other reviews complaining about the smell. You can slap this on in the morning, dries fast, and go about your day without smelling like a self-tan.  Worth the price, as a little goes a long way.
review_title: where have you been all my life?
product_name: Gradual Tan Watermelon Daily Firming Lotion

review_text: The new formula for this product is awful! It doesn’t blend well, has a super white tint, and looks super cake-y, I believe due to the higher SPF and additional titanium dioxide. I LOVED the old formula and bought this product in hopes it would be comparable, but it’s not even close. Will not purchase again, unfortunately. Please bring back the old formulas!
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: Not my favorite. Goes on sheer but leaves a sticky, tacky finish that lasts all day. Also balls up when applying so unsure how much protection I am actually getting. Wouldn’t buy again.
product_name: Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: Love it made my lips so smooth and it plumbed my lips after the second use I recommend using it at night in the morning you’ll have beautiful lips
product_name: Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E

review_text: I received this product as a free promotion in exchange for am honest review. Overall, I really do like this product and I do feel like it does what it says it does. I took off one start because the application method is a little messy. However, the product itself does leave my lips feeling smooth and hydrated. I would recommend this product if you are looking for a little extra hydration during these cold months!
review_title: I use it almost every day
product_name: Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E

review_text: My favorite self tanning product I’ve used so far. I love that it’s colorless, odorless, and does not transfer onto my sheets or clothing after using it. It’s very easy to apply with my tanning mitt and I end up with a nice, even golden glow. Personally, I’ve not had an issue with the pump. Highly recommend!
product_name: Glow Clear, Color Correcting Self-Tanning Mousse

review_text: The Tula night cream has visibly made my skin very hydrated and plump in the morning. I received this to test out complimentary from Influenster and Tula. I’m really excited to have received this as the cream seems very high quality and will definitely help me through the dry winter weather!
product_name: Mini 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream

review_text: This product paired with the moisturizer and cica repair AT NIGHT is the absolute bomb. My acne is completely gone
product_name: Teatreement Cleansing Foam

review_text: I’m really enjoying this vitamin C moisturizer. It’s non-irritating (but don’t get it in your eyes!) and provides ample hydration for my dry skin. It has a light gel texture so it could work for oilier skin, too. I’ve noticed that my face feels more hydrated and my skin tone looks more even. It also comes with a cute little applicator/massage wand. The cream has a very strong neroli/orange blossom scent, which I happen to love, and the fragrance appears to come naturally from neroli oil, but be aware in case you prefer your skincare unscented.
review_title: Super hydrating with a pretty neroli scent!
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: On my second jar of this product and like the results.  No irritation as I have experienced in the past.
review_title: Ole's Goodnight Glow - Better than Good
product_name: Goodnight Glow Bakuchiol Sleeping Crème

review_text: This really help clear small spots of acne that appear on my skin. I love this product.
product_name: KOSHIRICE Acne Calming Spot Treatment

review_text: Even though I have combination skin I can get really bad dry patches on my skin. This stuff creates such a beautiful glow in the morning after I use it. It feels like butter going on but is not heavy at all. It doesn’t accentuate my oily areas either. Must have
product_name: Moisture Surge Overnight Face Mask

review_text: It felt soothing and helped to reduce redness after an intense enzyme peel, but I don’t think the cucumber gel is really anything special. No miracle results here.
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: I love this product. My skin is definitlysmoother and more radiant. A big plus is, how gentle it is on my somewhatsensitive skin.
product_name: Retinol Fusion PM Night Serum

review_text: I’m 56 and find this cream has excellent firming properties as well as moisturizing. I have some oily.patches so tend to avoid them. The dry cheek and forehead areas have really benefitted visibly.
product_name: Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask

review_text: Hydrates. Really decreases puffy eyes. I use this when I look extra tired.
product_name: Cucumber De-Tox Hydra-Gel Eye Patches

review_text: Overall it is a pretty decent exfoliating cleanser. It doesn’t foam, which is fine, but sometimes I felt like the micro beads didn’t get spread around enough. I was worried that the beads would be too harsh for every day use but I didn’t have a problem. I’m not sure what a cloudberry smells like but I’d say the cleanser sort of reminded me of jelly beans. The jelly/gel consistency slightly clogged the dispenser hole if I didn’t use it every day.
product_name: goopglow Cloudberry Exfoliating Jelly Cleanser

review_text: I received this pads in exchange for my review and so far I’m loving them! The ingredients are so amazing. They work really good on my dry skin. I use them every other night after cleansing, and then follow with a hydrating serum. They really help to keep the pores cleaned and the skin with a beautiful glow! Before these pads I was using the ones from the Dr Deniss Gross but I like this ones better! I highly recommend them!
product_name: Resurface+ AHA/BHA Niacinamide Exfoliating Pads for Face and Targeted Body

review_text: I originally bought this as a part of the Bobbi Brown eye care scheme (eye cream, color corrector, and concealer). I used this day and night for 6 months and I can honestly say I saw no improvement in my eye area. The lines are still there and it did not help improve concealer application. The only thing I did like was that it didn’t irritate my eyes since I wear glasses and contacts.
product_name: Hydrating Eye Cream

review_text: I am a huge huge makeup oil or balm fan so I was so excited to learn about the newest porefessional addition. First of all it’s easy to apply. I massage onto my skin and then rinse with water. I wear a lot of waterproof makeup and found I was able to get all of it off and without residual makeup left. My skin didn’t feel oily or sticky afterwards. Huge plus!
product_name: The POREfessional Get Unblocked Makeup-Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: It didn’t dry out or irritate my face but I really like my face wash to help wash off any makeup left behind from my cleansing oil/balm and this one didn’t. Going to end up returning.
product_name: Clean Skin Gel Cleanser with Prebiotics

review_text: Really does fill in lines under my eyes and between my eyebrows
product_name: Needles No More Wrinkle Smoothing Cream

review_text: Highly recommend! Instantly plumps and has a slight cooling tingle.  Perfect amount of gloss that’s not sticky, and adds a beautiful natural flush to my lips.  Added bonus of SPF just in time for summer.  Absolutely worth it!
product_name: Platinum Lip Plump SPF 30

review_text: Love this. Wears great under make up and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin.
product_name: SUBLIME DEFENSE Ultra Lightweight UV Defense Fluid SPF 50

review_text: Really like this! I purchased this because even though I use my body self tanner on my face as well, my face color tends to fade faster due to using glycolic acid products and I wanted to stay even! I mix this with my Caudalie Vinoperfect Brightening Glycolic Overnight Cream and it turns out beautiful the next morning. I started gradually (adding 2 drops one night, then 3, then 4) and found that 4 drops gives me a really nice noticeable but not orange looking color! I am very light skinned but not fair so I can see how 4 drops might be a bit much for fairer skin. I did get the start of a pimple a few days after using it but it could be due to hormones and that TIME of the month coming so can’t necessarily attribute it to the product. All in all I am happy and will repurchase but it will be a long time until I have to!
product_name: THE FACE Illuminating Self-Tan Drops

review_text: I originally got this as a sample which worked great so I ordered the full size. The consistency is looser and seems to be less of the scrub in the full size wich is why I gave it 4 stars insead of 5.
product_name: Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub

review_text: This product is great. I have been using it for a couple of days. It moisturized my skin without making it oily. It has a nice smell to it.
product_name: Get Even Rose Face Oil

review_text: Very moisturizing. The formula is liquidy and slippery which makes it come off quickly. Because of that I had to reapply often. Despite that I found it very hydrating and it helped my dry lips. It is a very large tube and will last a long time.
product_name: Menthol And Eucalyptus Lip Balm

review_text: I was gifted by Dermalogica. Overall this is a really nice option for people with oily and combination skin. The texture is great but as someone with a strong sense of smell, I cannot get past the scent of this. It is very overwhelming.
product_name: Skin Smoothing Cream Moisturizer

review_text: the oil itself is awesome, and it being in a roller ball is even better. but the “organic“ “rose quartz roller“ is absolutely for people who are scared of science and will pay an inflated price tag all because a brand calls it “ real magic.“
product_name: Noni Radiant Brightening Eye Oil

review_text: I loved this Toner! It left my skin feeling very clean and I loved the smell of the tea tree oil! This was the perfect middle step between the cleanser and the moisturizer. It was very sensitive on my skin and my skin it not air brighter, more even, and acne free after using!
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: I washed my face because I couldn’t stand this smell. This sent is not for goodnight sleep. Please smell sample at store before you buy or ask to let you smell. I use other products from OR, but this is NG
product_name: Goodnight Glow Bakuchiol Sleeping Crème

review_text: Loved how gentle yet effective this was . I’ve been struggling trying to find a cleanser that doesn’t break me out and this one so far has been great. I use this after my oil cleanser and my skin has been looking amazing
product_name: Clean Skin Gel Cleanser with Prebiotics

review_text: This has been an instant favorite of mine from the first time I used it. I love the light scent of apricots and it is incredibly effective in removing makeup, dirt and impurities without clogging my pores with oil. Perfect for my evening cleanse!
product_name: Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: I ran out of my Origins night cream, and I was bummed I couldn’t order it in the UK. This stuff is just as good, if not better! Cured dry skin, non-oily, and left my skin smooth and soft.
product_name: Ultra Repair Hydra-Firm Night Cream

review_text: Mediocre eye cream. It does brighten, I noticed my under eye area has improved brightness. I think the tiny does assist for an immediate result. I personally don’t mind the tint. I have extremely dry under eyes and eyelids and found this provided no significant hydration. The biggest drawback to this, why i am rating 3 stars, is that it pills. Even on days I don’t wear makeup, it pills. Bad. It might be due to too much product that doesn’t absorb but I use less than a dime size for both eyes and it still pills. I would not repurchase or recommend for anyone with sensitive or dry eyes.
product_name: Light Aura Vitamin C + Peptide Eye Cream

review_text: This night cream is probably fine for those who don’t have rather dry skin. I was really hoping this stuff would work for me & I’d have to spend considerably less than I normally do, but no such luck! It’s a nice cream; feels good going on & doesn’t feel greasy. Unfortunately, my face felt tight and dry by morning. Disappointing.
product_name: Ultra Repair Hydra-Firm Night Cream

review_text: totally love these! reduce puffiness and moisturize making my eyes feel great. I dont really notice a difference in my dark circles though. But def worth the price
product_name: Cucumber De-Tox Hydra-Gel Eye Patches

review_text: Smalls horrible all day and even the next day after a shower. I absolutely love all of their other tanning products but this left me super orange. I was going to return this after reading the reviews, but one of the ladies at my store talked me into trying it and I’m really sad that I did.
review_title: It’s a big no for me
product_name: Even Skin Tone Self-Tanning Body Butter

review_text: Let me be the first to say that high-end skincare is usually full of potentially irritating ingredients, and is so often not worth the price tag. That is not the case for this product. It cleanses my skin without making it feel dry whatsoever, and the fact that it doesn’t contain fragrance or pseudo-scientifically acclaimed ingredients is a win for me.To save money I tried using a comparable drugstore version of this, but it dries me out.Verdict? If you’re okay with using a bar formulation for your daily cleanser, I definitely recommend. (Side note: If you don’t know how to travel with this kind of product, I grab some tin foil and wrap it up with that!)
product_name: Pekee Cleansing Bar

review_text: This has changed my skin. I went through ~2 week purge, but it made all of my extractions very easy. After that, my skin was clear! Within 3 days of using the product I could see it healing my skin. I will never go without it.
product_name: Ultra Repair Oat & Hemp Seed Dry Oil

review_text: I had received a sample of this product and was instantly amazed! The effects were unbelieveable!!!!! i have had acid peels, and my face lasered so when I say you got to have it, I know! You can do your whole face or just certain areas. It takes away lines and wrinkles and tightens skin. just watch putting too much on. I immedately bought a tube. A MUST have for the makeup case!! Takes 10 years off!!! At least!!
product_name: Instant FIRMx Temporary Face Tightener

review_text: Didnt make me break out, which is my top priority with sunscreen!
product_name: City Block Sheer Oil-Free Daily Face Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Primer

review_text: This is a trully amazing product that i got so lucky to try and experience! It was a perfect match for my skin type and concerns. The product contains 20% glycolic acid complex, 1.5 % time-released microencapsulated retinol, it promises to visibly help improve the look of texture clarity and uneven tone, fine lines and wrinkles. It works like a champ.At the begining my face was red and first two times i had to compromise pads to the serum at night. After couple days the skin got adjusted and used to both product. It started glowing!!! ✨The product has nice, smooth and light texture, that adsorbs quickly and does not leave stickiness. It also moisturizes my skin and in the morning it is not as thirsty like usually was before this product. It also improved my skin appearance by making it brighter, softer, less fine-lines and wrinkles. I highly recomment this product!!!
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Peel Pads

review_text: I received this product for free from influenster and belief in extange for my honest review. This sunscreen is the best because it not only protects the skin but also mostiures it. It doesn’t leave a white cast like others. I love the scent it’s very light and not a strong sunscreen smell. This is my new favorite. It has a high spf and protects my skin and makes it look so good. Highly recommend. My mom even started using it!
product_name: The True Cream - Aqua Bomb Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: (I received this product in exchange for review)I wanted to like it but I think it is just not for me. It feels and smells like a child’s lipgloss :/ It looks very pretty on my lips, but I don’t love the way it feels and don’t find it to be all that moisturizing or nourishing.
product_name: Cherry Treat Conditioning + Strengthening Lip Oil

review_text: I have sensitive, combination skin which can often dry out with most cleansers and masks. I’ve been using this Fresh mask for a week now after receiving a sample with another order. I have used it every other day after cleansing with Cetaphil’s gentle skin cleanser. I love how soft and hydrated it leaves my skin! A little can go a very long way.
product_name: Lotus Youth Preserve Rescue Mask

review_text: I did receive this complimentary from Farmacy Beauty, but was really excited about the clean ingredients! It’s very lightweight and absorbs easily. I’ve been meaning to incorporate a retinol into my routine and love this addition!
product_name: 1% Vitamin A Retinol Serum

review_text: I received this product as a sample from #buzzagent and it works really well it left my face smooth and soft, it also started to clear up some of the acne I had from wearing a mask, the steps are easy to do but I skin has never felt smoother and healthier. Great product.
product_name: Discover Healthy Skin Kit

review_text: I really wanted to LOVE this cleanser because no other product from this brand has let me down. My skin definitely felt really clean after using but it also felt really dry and tight . Other than that, its just ok.
product_name: Crème Radiance Gentle Cleansing Creamy-Foam Cleanser

review_text: I have used several mists, and this surprisingly has become my favorite. It’s moisturizing and penetrating, but still dries quickly without being sticky. I personally love the smell of this line and find it be to fresh and relaxing. The main con would be the price, given that I don’t find sprays to be a necessary step in my skin routine. I use it after washing my face before moisturizing. I received this product for complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Mist

review_text: This is a lovely serum for anyone who is looking for gentle yet effective hydration. Ever since being prescribed a retinoid, I have been battling dry, flaky skin (when I usually am very oily). This is one of the very few products that has worked to restore moisture and help repair my skin barrier (the only other product that has worked is Cerave, but it is a bit heavy for the face!). This product feels lightweight and has extremely minimal fragrance. It has not caused any breakouts on my acne prone skin. I highly recommend this for anyone looking to add moisture to their skincare routine.
product_name: Dream Oasis Deep Hydration Serum

review_text: Gifted by Farmacy Beauty in exchange for my honest opinion. I like how hydrating this is! It’s nourishing but not too thick. It’s also very slightly honey scented. I love the cute packaging and color of the cream. It definitely reduces dehydration lines and makes my under eyes appear less scaley. I think with long term use I will see plumped not puffy under eyes because this is very nourishing. There isn’t a heavy, greasy, or sticky feeling after use, which is an essential for me when picking out an eye cream. You can see in the picture the texture. A little goes a long way !
review_title: Nourishing and vitamin c is brightening!
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: I tried this product but i didn’t notice any results.Maybe this product isn’t for my particular skin type. i thought it would help the hyper pigmentation i have due to acne scars.
product_name: Tranexamic Acid Hyperpigmentation Treatment

review_text: I suffer from rosacea and stress acne often, and other skin products only seem to irritate my skin even more. Not with Moon Juice’s Exfoliating Acid Potion! I have been using this 2-3x a week, along with Moon Juice’s Beauty Shroom Plumping Serum and Vegan Collagen Protection for the past few weeks and my skin has CLEARED up! I have received many compliments how much healthier my face looks. Thank you, Moon Juice!
product_name: Acid Potion AHA + BHA Resurfacing Exfoliator

review_text: I have found that for these to work, the pimple has to already be at the surface and almost gone. My acne tends to be the under the surface zits and these do nothing for those. Unless things are already at the surface these don’t work.
product_name: Acne-Clear Invisible Dots

review_text: I bring these camping with me and love that my face doesn’t feel dried out after. they changed the cloth material and it’s jot as good but I still like the product
product_name: Clean Cleansing & Gentle Exfoliating Wipes

review_text: I brought this with me on vacation in Florida. It is lightweight and goes on smooth. Smelled good and provided me protection from the sun :)
product_name: Urban Environment Vita-Clear Sunscreen SPF 42

review_text: I purchased this product directly at a Sephora store, after the sales lady convinced me that was what I needed to help my skin with the breakouts and pigmentation. My skin was in such a bad condition and I had tried everything really. I literary had a new pimple on my skin on the same affected area everyday. I decided to give it try, but to no avail. I had to stop using the essence as at that time, it was clogging my pores and only worsened the breaking out. I was disheartened that I had to waste away whole bottle of essence, but decided to just keep it. After I was able to get my breakouts under control, I was left wit a lot of dark pigmented spots and my skin just looked frail and oily but dry at the same time. I decided to try the essence one day when I ran out of my moisturizer and boy am I grateful that I did that. its been 3 months using this product now and my skin is luminous, luscious, radiant, even and my spots are faded almost completely gone, which I’m quite positive I will achieve in a months time. Everywhere I go now people ask me about my skin care, and how dewy and moisturized my skin has become. I would advise though that if you have oily skin, you use it with a gel based moisturizer as a cream can tend to make it more heavy and could potentially clog your pores from my experience. I use this morning and evening as part of my ski care routine and to think that I almost gave it away in my hopeless situation, I would have missed out on the real benefits of using this essence. I completely recommend it based form my experiences. even when I wear make up now, it blends evenly, unlike before I couldn’t even wear make up anymore. I’m grateful that this essence gave me back my confidence. I will attach before and after pictures so that you ladies can understand how much this product helps for sin type like mine. The before picture is a bit graphic so take note! I hope this review helps someone!
product_name: Vinoperfect Brightening Glycolic Essence

review_text: Wow another incredible product gifted by Summer Fridays! I love anything and everything with squalane and this is no exception. I am so pleased that this has little to no scent and absorbs quickly with instant hydration. This will be in my skincare routine for a long time!
product_name: Dream Oasis Deep Hydration Serum

review_text: Love the Glow!  I was curious about this oil and it’s amazing. It absorbs quick and gives your skin a luminous glow.  I love the high SPF.  I can’t wait to try it when I wear shorts.
product_name: Mini Glow Oil SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This has become one of my new go to masks. I love the fact it’s a 2 in 1. I’ve found that the product has definitely lightened my acne marks and sun spots. Also, the exfoliating beads are course but fine and leaves your skin feeling so refreshed. Overall it’s an amazing product and I would highly recommend it to anyone.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I received this This Wake Up Honey Eye Cream complimentary from Farmacy Beauty. It comes in a beautiful glass jar. The cream is fragrance free. The texture is creamy and rich, but feels lightweight on my skin and absorbs quickly. After using my skin under eyes looks bright, and dark circles less visible. I am satisfied with the results, and would recommend this cream for others.
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: H’s good on my skin. Makes my face more brighter & refined in the morning.
product_name: GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Cream

review_text: This product really made a difference in my skin in a couple of days. It was noticeable for others after 2 weeks.
product_name: Goodbye Acne   Complete Acne Treatment Gel

review_text: Really loved this moisturizer! It’s not heavy and sinks into the skin quick. I love that it has sunscreen, yet doesn’t give you a white cast, it doesn’t feel like most spf products. Love it!
product_name: SHIKULIME Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30

review_text: I received Soft Clean Infusion for free from Influenster and Estée Lauder in exchange for my honest review. I tend to have dry, sensitive skin and was excited to try this sample sized product. I was pretty disappointed with how extremely tiny the sample size is and was unable to truly get an understanding if this product truly works. If I would have been given a slightly larger sample size, I would have been able to use it more than just a few times. With the limited use due to very small amount of product (0.24fl oz), I enjoyed the sweet and gentle scent. From what I could tell, I believe this product would be very beneficial to dry skin with consistent use (and with more product to try). This did not irritate my skin and felt refreshing to my skin. Overall I was very thankful for this opportunity to try this hydrating essence lotion but would have liked to have a slightly larger sample size to get the full experience.On a side note, I was disappointed with how massive the box was it came in and how tiny the sample was. It almost felt like a cruel joke as I expected the size to be somewhat in proportion to the packaging size. I feel like the packaging could have been significantly reduced in size and result in less waste.
review_title: Sample too tiny to fully evaluate product
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: I used this product as a toner and it worked very well. It smelled good and didn’t irritate my skin at all. I used it with a cotton pad on wet skin and it absorbed very really nicely. Would highly recommend!
product_name: Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Soothing Treatment Lotion

review_text: So far I loveeeee this sunscreen! It doesn’t leave a white cast on me. I have medium deep skin and at times sunscreen can make me look gray but this one doesn’t! And it’s really hydrating. I can’t wait to use it under makeup next !
product_name: The Sunscreen - 100% Mineral, Broad Spectrum SPF 30 with 20% Non-Nano Zinc, Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: I am loving this kit. My skin feels  refreshed and clean after the double cleanse. The moisturizer is not to heavy or oil but hydrating enough for winter weather. I have combo skin and this kit is helping clear up blemishes. Complimentary from dermalogical.
product_name: Discover Healthy Skin Kit

review_text: I love that the packaging for the product is made from 72% recycled plastic and still looks great. This eye cream is simple and works great, without unnecessary additives and scents, it plumps and hydrates safely. It also comes in at a good price for the amount of product inside. I also appreciate that the consistency is light and gentle to put on as our eye area is so delicate!
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Excellent lightweight formula. Absorbs quickly into the skin. This made my skin look hydrated, radiant, and smoother. This felt very nourishing on the skin and I love how it doesn’t sit on top of the skin. Love this for a lightweight daytime moisturizer and would def recommend.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Lotion Moisturizer

review_text: I love the product but I find it very thick, I’d recommend a small makeup spatula to remove the cream as it’s hard to do with your fingers, other than that it’s wonderful, it makes my skin so soft and moisturized and it feels good going on. It also gives a very nice glow. I received this product complimentary from Influenster for testing and review purposes!
product_name: That Blockbuster Cream with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This feels really nice on the skin BUT if you have acne prone skin it might make you break out like it did for me. After a few uses I got a lot of small whiteheads and this could be due to the fact it has fragrance AND dye in its ingredients.
review_title: not good for acne prone skin
product_name: Fat Water Niacinamide Pore-Refining Toner Serum with Barbados Cherry

review_text: Horrible packaging! Leaks everywhere. I wish I could return it.
product_name: The Silk Sunscreen Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: Holy grail product for sensitive/oily/acne prone skin. Every time I try to buy something similar at a cheaper price point, I come back to this produce because it is the best of the best. Please give it a try if you have skin like mine because it’s a staple in my routine now.
product_name: Triple Peptide Hydrating + Firming Oasis Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This item was gifted by Farmacy Beauty for my review.  I love this eye cream.  The texture is nearly perfect.  It’s rich but not greasy in any way.  I feel like my eye makeup is going on more smoothly and my morning puffiness is reduced.  It’s a great product.
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: I have sensitive skin so I have to be careful with the products I use on my face. I would love to use same products forever but our skin goes through cycles so you have to constantly change your routine depending on what your skin needs during that season. I know that I needed to start using a retinol because of my age but it’s not recommended when you’re pregnant so I wasn’t using anything for a while. Until I discovered Bakuchiol! What a game changer! My skin loves this product and I love that’s it’s a moisturizer and serum in one! I have been using it for 3 weeks so far and no reaction yet! I love how it feels on my skin. This is definitely worth trying if you are looking for an alternative to retinol.
product_name: Slushy Serum Moisturizer Crush Infused with Bakuchiol

review_text: I use SPF daily whether I am inside or outside. I have a combination skin type and I do not need to use a moisturizer with this product. It rubs in and absorbs smoothly while drying clear and not leaving a white cast like some mineral sunscreens do. It felt amazing on my skin and really nourishing. It rubbed so nicely into my skin and did not make my skin feel or look greasy. There is no fragrance in the product which I prefer because sometimes scents can be overbearing. I have worn makeup over this and it does not pill. This SPF shields from UV rays AND blue light! I am a teacher so I have been on the computer everyday. I am happy to add this to the last step of my morning skincare routine! I genuinely recommend this if you are looking for a sheer, smooth finish while preventing signs of aging.
product_name: The Silk Sunscreen Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: It doesn’t irritate my face, a bit drying but the smell is what gives the rating for me. I understand it’s natural but it’s not what I enjoy first thing in the morning.
product_name: Mini The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: I hardly ever write reviews, but these little guys deserve it!I have always suffered with troublesome skin however over the last year my skin has been improving, though I still experience hormonal break outs once a month. Typically, the deep cystic hormonal break outs I have take 5-7 days to fully heal and flatten...so with the holiday I decided to give these ago (even though while buying them I felt that they were gimmicky...)These little guys ACTUALLY WORK. I used two stickers on two LARGE cystic bumps and went to sleep. When I woke up the following morning of the gunk has been pulled to the surface (which was satisfying for a fellow popiholic) and the bumps were just flattened, hyperpigmentated marks...which are much easier to disguise with makeup than the bumps.I would have given this product 5 stars however, my one dislike is when pulling the sticker off, it does leave a raw skin patch underneath, which makes disguising with makeup a little more difficult...this however did only happen with 1 or the 2 pimples I treated.Overall, I think these little guys are worth the money, especially if you have problematic skin!
product_name: Acne-Clear Invisible Dots

review_text: Love it!! Its been a while since i found a mask that gives me some result!!
product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: Was gifted this Kora Organics Berry Bright Vitamin C Eye Cream to try for my honest opinion. It’s great for all skin types. It’s great for dark circles. It’s fragrance free and it’s also vegan. It also has refill pods available. The packaging was beautiful and the jar itself is gorgeous! Feels great under my eyes and has helped to keep them hydrated. Has helped to brighten around my eyes and dark baggy area has improved.
product_name: Berry Bright Firming Vitamin C Eye Cream

review_text: I have combination skin and this absorbs nicely to my skin, it makes my skin looks plumper and  it layers very nicely underneath my makeup and foundation. It didn’t break it me out so that’s another plus. Will definitely continue to use this.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Lotion Moisturizer

review_text: Love this eye cream! I am always looking for a good eye cream and this one delivers. It’s brightening but doesn’t burn my sensitive acne prone skin. It absorbs quickly with no residue. I also like that the first ingredient isn’t water (it’s aloe).
product_name: Berry Bright Firming Vitamin C Eye Cream

review_text: I like how it absorbs into the skin and feels like water. It’s definitely hydrating and doesn’t have an overpowering smell which I like. I’ve incorporated this into my daily routine so hoping to see actual results as far as wrinkle reduction etc
product_name: Confidence in a Gel Lotion

review_text: Literally feels like I’ve plastered sugar syrup on my skin. It has a sticky consistency which I hated. Made my skin break out and became itch. I have used other products from the ordinary which works wonderfully. Unfortunately this one did not.
product_name: Ascorbic Acid 8% + Alpha Arbutin 2%

review_text: Cannot say enough great things about this brand!! This bottle lasts forever and is so hydrating and i love that it’s definitely multipurpose in its use!
product_name: 100% Sugarcane Squalane Oil

review_text: For the price- this is not worth it. I didn’t notice any difference in my skin whatsoever. Would not recommend…there are cheaper masks out there that have given better results. I wouldn’t waste your money! Very disappointed as there are so many dermLogica products I’ve used for years and absolutely loved unfortunately this isn’t one of them!
product_name: MultiVitamin Power Recovery Mask

review_text: It’s honestly one of my current favorite moisturizers for dry and dull skin! It’s very lightweight yet hydrating. I love how it instantly plumps and brightens my skin! I haven’t experienced any breakouts or acne from this.
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: Love this pillowcase, feels like a very luxurious way to end the day. Got one for my husband, too. Took off one star because I still occasionally have pillow marks in the morning.
product_name: Silk Pillowcase - Standard/Queen

review_text: Wow, this product is phenomenal. I’ve been using this product religiously day and night for the past 3 weeks and have seen such an improvement in my skin; I’m speechless. I have congested and acne prone skin and am in my mid-20s. I use salicylic pads and adapalene(prescribed by derm) in combination to help this all the congestion on my face. This combo makes my skin very sensitive, so finding products that work with my night routine is hard. This oil has made a massive difference in the moisture, redness, dry patches, acne, and keeps my skin calm (no breakouts) during stressful times. My skin is super acne prone so stressing broke it out until I found this oil. I love this oil and the moisture it leaves so much that I use it all over my neck, chest, and shoulders (I should stop though so it lasts longer.. but I’ll repurchase this in a heartbeat once it’s almost done). BTW I always add the ordinary moisture HA after to seal all the moisture in and they just work wonderfully together. I hope this review helps someone because I truly love this product. If you’re on the fence about it, just go for it.
review_title: Best oil you'll use and helps with acne
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: I’ve always been a huge innisfree supporter and was excited to try the hyaluronic acid cream! It’s such a clean and refreshing scent and leaves my skin feeling extra hydrated and plump. I use it in the morning after a toner and before an additional moisturizer because it’s winter, but I could easily see myself using just this HA cream in the summer because it’s so lightweight and absorbs so well!
product_name: Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This product is very moisturizing and I like the added SPF. But, I wasn’t really aware it was a tinted moisturizer. It says color control so I thought maybe it’d be tinted green to neutralize redness but I’m pale so it gave me almost a tan coloring. It’s not bad but definitely needed to be blended into my neck/ears or else it would be very apparent I was wearing some sort of product. I’m not sure how this would work on darker complexions. It also rubbed off onto my mask while I was working.
product_name: SHIKULIME Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30

review_text: love this bar! not typically drawn to bar soaps but this one cleanses so thoroughly and gently.
product_name: JuJu Exfoliating Bar

review_text: Moon Juice gifted me their Super You supplements for review, however all thoughts are my own. These supplements definitely make you feel relaxed. I compare it to before having a surgery and getting medication for your nerves, minus the needles lol! It’s totally insane how relaxed these supplements make you feel! I did notice that I slept better and overall performed better throughout the day.
product_name: Mini SuperYou Daily Stress Management

review_text: This was my first time trying a facial essence. Overall, I’d say I’m satisfied with its performance. After using this product my skin felt softer, appeared brighter and more even, and I also felt that my skin looked smoother. I would definitely purchase this product to use again.
review_title: Happy with my first time trying a essence.
product_name: Ferulic Brew Facial Treatment Essence with Lactic Acid

review_text: I am new to this product line and received a small sample as one of my samples to choose from after a Sephora purchase. Loved it and ordered it once my then face wash ran out.
product_name: Confidence in a Cleanser Hydrating Facial Cleanser Serum
