review_text: I have used the product only for a few days, I really haven’t seen a change. I did for get to take a before and after pictures. I did like the texture,  soft and smooth.
product_name: Bright Start Retinol Alternative Brightening Eye Cream

review_text: It gives a tingling sensation when applied to skin, but unfortunately that’s the only effect I’ve experienced. It didn’t seem to help with forehead wrinkles and made me break out.
product_name: Needles No More Wrinkle Smoothing Cream

review_text: This eye cream is so good! I have hereditary dark circles and this is the only thing that makes a difference. I also love that it has a slight tint to correct my darkness, and a shimmer to brighten up my under eye! It also lasts forever so it is definitely worth the price!!
product_name: Eye Duty Niacinamide Brightening Eye Cream

review_text: This product is amazing. My skin felt soft and smooth It’s not drying at all. Love the feel of this mask
product_name: Cookies N Clean Whipped Clay Pore Detox Face Mask with Salicylic Acid + Charcoal

review_text: I love this green tea moisturizer that I was gifted by innisfree. I have very dry skin, especially in the winter. After using this cream it felt instantly hydrated. I noticed that my skin stayed moisturized all day. It uses green tea, hyaluronic acid, and squalane.
product_name: Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Very basic moisturizer. Doesn’t leave a film or a white cast. It’s not aggressive enough for winter, but as a general moisturizer it’s great. Docking one star for the price.
product_name: Active Moist Moisturizer

review_text: I have really enjoyed these. I don’t have bad acne, but this is great for the occasional pimple. I could tell one was coming on my chin, so I slept with one of these on the spot and woke up the next morning to nothing. Very pleased!!
product_name: Acne-Clear Invisible Dots

review_text: After using this for a few weeks my skin has really started to clear up. I love how when you put it on its white at first but when you start blending it on your face it turns into a light foundation almost.
product_name: SHIKULIME Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30

review_text: This product is comparable with other top notch eye creams that I used in the past, I would definitely consider switching to it as a staple in my routine. It’s a light and absorbent formula. It’s scentless and I imagine it would be great for sensitive skin. Over time, I noticed a more youthful under eye appearance. I would definitely recommend this product!
product_name: That Fresh Take Eye Cream with Peptides

review_text: Its okay. Nothing special. Smells good. Has a very mild burn. But in all fairness, i just microdermed my face.
product_name: Clean Face Mask

review_text: This product is amazing, the best cleanser I’ve used. I’ve been using this since it came out and it has never failed to remove all makeup while cleansing.
product_name: Total Cleans'r Makeup-Removing Cleanser with Barbados Cherry

review_text: The gel texture is really lightweight and not drying at all for my skin, felt like a gel moisturizer. With other Salicylic acid treatments I’ve found them to be super drying the instant I put it on. I think this is quite gentle. I’ve dealt with my fair share of acne, but currently my acne comes and goes typically around my period. Before this product my skin was smooth and doing fine with my usual retinol. Switched to PTR and now I’m getting a slight purge on my nose/cheek area with little white heads. Not sure if this is a salad of strong actives for a disaster since it mixes SA with retinol and vitamin C. I didn’t notice anything instant other than the purging, so I’m hoping my skin will clear soon with this since I’m getting a quick reaction that isn’t irritating. If you’re looking for something instant, maybe try pimple patches or a strong spot treatment. This seems for gradual use if you are experiencing cystic acne like on packaging. I received these products for free from Influenster and Peter Thomas Roth in exchange for my honest review. #PTRGoodbyeAcne #complimentary @Influenster @peterthomasrothofiicial
review_title: Slight Purge, Seems Like for Gradual Use
product_name: Goodbye Acne   Complete Acne Treatment Gel

review_text: I was so pleasantly surprised by this product! You get tons of product for what you would pay for, too. The formula is rich and creamy and feels hydrating and nourishing when applying. My under eyes feel very refreshed and soothed.
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I love shiseido skincare, I’ve been using it for numerous years. This product was a joy to receive and use. I felt like I saw a visible difference in my skin. My only dislike was the thickness of the the cream

review_text: This is like the microfoliant but less scrubby. But in a good way. I don’t feel like I could use the other exfoliate every day. This one is so smooth. You can smell the oats in it. And it’s super creamy. I really like this. Definitely recommend.
product_name: Daily Milkfoliant Exfoliator

review_text: First off, the design of this collection is so adorable and different! Secondly, the ingredients too are above and beyond many other skin care lines. And lastly, thank y’all! For the opportunity. So, I actually applied this overnight mask on both my husband and I (thankfully he let’s me try anything out on him). He says he’s been feeling a bit dry lately so after using this for about a week, he does not feel dry anymore. I am lucky to have combo skin, never really too oily or dry on my face but I certainly love the feeling of being hydrated on my face and this mask did just that. Although I was confused on how much to apply at first, I just put what I feel is good enough. Another thing I was confused is it’s a mask so typically it’s just apply and let set but with these tiny vitamin c capsules I felt I’d get more use of those if I help dissolve them into my skin better if I massage this jelly like mask. Either way worked. We both wake up around 5 AM and sleep at 10 pm so that gives this mask 7 hours to do its magic, and it does!  We both feel cleaner and brighter in the mornings. I intend on using this every single night on both of us until we run out, lol. Oh, also there is a smell but it isn’t over powering, it is citrus like which of course with brightening and vitamin c I sort of figured.

review_text: I love this product!  My skin felt soft for hours after applying, and even after washing.  I also liked that there was very little smell.  I will definitely be keeping this as part of my skin care routine!!!

Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: I’ve been wanting to try this product for a while now, so I was super excited to get sent this product to review! I have heard really great things about this eye cream, and couldn’t wait to start using. It is stated that it takes about 8 weeks to start seeing results , so this review is coming in a little premature, but I have been using jt religiously for the past 2 weeks and thought I’d give an update. Although I haven’t noticed much of a huge difference, I do feel like my under eyes look more “alive”. Since t his area is very sensitive (for me) I noticed it gave me small pimples the first time I started using it - but that doesn’t happen anymore. The texture is creamy, light, and blends into the skin well. It’s a little oily after but nothing too bad. I cant wait to continue to use this product and start seeing more results!

review_text: The product is so amazing I noticed a difference from the first wash. It minimized my pores and made my skin more radiant and glowing. review_text: This face wash was recommended by my esthetician claiming that it goes into deeper layers of your skin. Blah blah blah. Didn’t believe it because it’s just a face wash, right? Bought it once my other wash ran out because I wanted to tell her I tried it... THREE months later, I look in the mirror, and I couldn’t believe it. My skin isn’t textured.... My little forehead bumps that I always just FaceTune we’re just gone! I couldn’t believe it. I didn’t notice the daily changes, but after consistent use, my skin is brand new. I didn’t know this was even possible by a change of one product alone. I have been using it for over 6 months and have found a new love for skincare because I didn’t even know my skin could look like it does today! Please please buy and use patiently.

review_text: This serum is amazing on my 46 year old skin. I love how it gives me a smooth youthful glow. This will be my new holy grail.

review_text: This winter has been especially cold and harsh, so I had a sudden eczema flare up all around my lips and nose. This stuff has been an absolute life saver. I put on a layer overnight and the difference in the morning is unbelievable. I do wish it came in a bigger package considering the cost, but still—very grateful for this balm.

review_text: I started using this serum for a couple of days and the truth is that I really liked the results, my face has many acne marks that I have seen clearing up little by little I will not stop using it and tell you about the results within a month I love its smell and its packaging is a beauty, in addition to leaving your skin hydrated and bright, I received this product thanks to influensters so I am grateful to take you into account to try this new serum of @koraorganics #noniglow

review_text: I love them! I like to take them before my meals, I have some food sensitivities and whenever I’m stressed or not eating the best my stomach gets all over the place. I appreciate that they don’t have an after taste. It’s helping me with my bloating
product_name: Mini Flatter Me Digestive Enzyme Supplement

review_text: A little about me: I have combination skin, oily t-zone and dry cheeks. Blemish prone skin. Tan very easily thanks to my olive skin.I got a sample of this and liked it so much I decided to buy the full size. I’ve used all different brands of cleansers from low end to very high end ($75 and up) but I like this particular one for several reasons.One, it’s hard to squeeze out. I’m sure your wondering why I appreciate the fact that it’s hard to get out and that’s because I always squeeze out more than the pea sized amount that I need and thereby waste a bunch of product. This dosent break your hand when you try to squeeze it out, rather it just comes out more slowly.Two, it’s very thick. I don’t need to use alot because it’s very concentrated meaning I get more bang for my buck. Some of the cleansers I have used have seemed watered down but not this baby. It spreads all over your face.Three, I like the fact that it clears off all my thick makeup. I like to pack on the pancake and usually have to use a bunch of toner and cotton pads to wipe off residual makeup left behind by my cleansers but this clears it all off. It does have a nice soft scent and I haven’t broken out since using this product.The only negative thing I have to say about this cleanser is that it can be slightly too good at cleaning, not only stripping away makeup but the oils in my skin as well. My face sometimes literally squeaks when I rub it much like when you wash dishes and the detergent makes the dishes squeaky clean. That’s not necessarily a bad thing but I would not recommend this for those with sensitive/dry skin.
product_name: Crème Radiance Gentle Cleansing Creamy-Foam Cleanser

review_text: it’s not that bad but not great either. average product. it does seem heavy, so better for colder weather.I ve used better moisturisers for the same price.

review_text: I was happy for them and all that, but was frustrated I couldn’t find -that- product that made me glow as others raved. The packaging is nice and doesn’t feel cheap at all. This serum has a light scent and it’s so refreshing.It goes on smooth and feels silky. A word of advice though is that this cleanser is extremely drying so you really need to make sure you use the moisturizer. But overall I like this cleanser. I kind of wish the cleanser was exfoliating though. I feel like I could get an even deeper clean if it was. I received this cleanser for testing purposes from influenster.

review_text: Before getting this, my skin was so dry. I was excited when it came and I couldn’t wait for it to be nighttime so I can try it out before bed. When I first applied it, I did feel weird because I never used any type of oil on my face (I break out quickly) and when I spread it around my face it felt rough. But clearly that was just my super dry skin because when I woke up my skin was GLOWWING and moisturized. I wore it all day and my skin has literally not been dry since. It’s super lightweight and does better than any other moisturizer I was using before. Will be purchasing again when I run out!
review_title: Weed for my face?!? Heck yesss!

review_text: Put this on and my skin immediately started burning and turned bright red! I wouldn’t call my skin sensitive as I use the dr Dennis gross extra strength peel pads regularly and never have had issues with vitamin c before!

review_text: This is definitely the best vitamin c serum I’ve ever used. Vitamin C was always something I tried to incorporate into my routine because I know I’m supposed to but I had never really seen enough of a difference in my skin to keep it in rotation. Until this one! First of all, it is a perfectly watery formula that soaks right in and isn’t sticky. It also has a pleasant smell. My skin only after a few uses looked noticeably smoother, brighter, and the few red acne marks I have are fading much quicker than they normally do. This will definitely stay a part of my morning routine.
product_name: C15 Vitamin C Super Booster

review_text: This is so lightweight and my skin just soaks it up. It leaves my combo acne prone skin so smooth and silky!! Definitely a new staple in my skincare. It’s perfect for my skin. The price and size are great for the results!! It keeps me from going through my moisturizer so fast; I put it around my eyes and doesn’t burn.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: First I want to comment on the bottle itself, it’s not cheap, it’s made of glass and this help maintain the ingredients to preserve their purity and not lose their effectiveness. It has some great call out ingredients, it’s soothing, and leaves my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated from inside out. I love this hyaluronic acid serum more than any other I have ever tried and I want to mention that If you want the full benefit of this product you should apply it to a damp face. After cleansing, don’t dry your face, simply pat down the excess water, then apply 2-3 drops in one hand, warm it up in both hands, pat gently spread across parts of face. Other alternative could be to apply after toner or essence and then use your moisturizer. You will notice a difference almost immediately in how plump and hydrated your skin is going to look. I absolutely recommended this product.
product_name: Thirst Trap Juice Hyaluronic Acid & Peptide Hydrating Facial Serum

review_text: I have tried many self tanners, but this has been my favorite for 3 years now. I actually never use the foam application pad like most people, although it works great. I put on medical gloves that fit snug, and mix it with a little lotion and rub it on one leg at a time until it is perfectly blended. I never have streaks as long as I mix it with a little lotion and blend blend blend until it is all absorbed. If I were to try this method without the lotion I would definitely have streaks. The drying time is a little bit longer just to be sure the product is absorbed, but I’ve never had any issues and the product lasts me much longer than if I use the pad. This gives a brown tan, never orange. I normally tan fairly easily, so this looks just like my own natural tan.
review_title: Dependable to give a brown tan
product_name: Self Tan Classic Bronzing Mousse

review_text: Such a fabulous cleanser! I have normal/combo skin and this left my skin feeling Cleansed but not stripped or dry! I would definitely recommend it to anyone with similar skin! No fragrance at all either. Gifted by dermalogica
product_name: Acne Clearing Skin Wash Cleanser

review_text: I’ve brought this to Vegas for 4th of July pool parties twice and it prevented sunburns while I was in the 110 degree hot sunny weather in a pool all day. I love that it’s an oil so it feels kind of luxurious. Highly recommend!!
product_name: Mini Glow Oil SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I continue to be impressed by Fenty Skin’s newest products. I didn’t think it was possible to love RiRi even more than I already do?!— but here we are. The queen has blessed us with this lip oil and it is in fact a treat. If you have dry and dehydrated lips like mine that are on the rough side and have pronounced lips lines no matter how much u exfoliate n hydrate but are still somehow always dry, get this this lip oil! It conditions, moisturizes, softens and absorbs VERY well and long lasting! I’m talking even after light eating/drinking— Super impressed that I didn’t have to reapply right after. Performance & overall quality alone makes it worth buying. It’s comparable to some higher end lip oils I’ve tried as well.
review_title: Get if you want long lasting soft lips
product_name: Cherry Treat Conditioning + Strengthening Lip Oil

review_text: I have bright red acne scars on my cheek. I tried many products to fade my scars, but they instead would LOOK like they’re faded in the morning but turn bright red again throughout the day. Pretty much, nothing really faded them, just calmed them down momentarily. I bought this product a while back & shied away from it because I wanted something instant and drastic (I didn’t find that), while this said that it would take up to 3 weeks to show results. After a ton of trial and error with other products, I  started including this in my morning and nighttime routine without thinking much of it. I remember walking down stairs after probably my 3rd day using this and my mom freaking out because my scars lightened drastically!! I have only been using this for a week and I am EXTREMELY impressed! This product is seemingly healing my scars from the inside-out! They don’t get aggravated and red throughout the day and the smaller ones look like they have disappeared completely! They also have become so much easier to cover with makeup! I truly believe that I will be comfortable wearing no makeup by the end of next week! If you are like me and cannot find a solution for your acne scars, please give this a try! Obviously there’s no guarantee but it is definitely worth trying!! :)
product_name: D-Scar Scar Diminishing Serum

review_text: I received this product for free to review. I am very impressed from packaging to quality. A great product at a great price. Leaves skin feeling moisturized and looking healthy!
product_name: 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream

review_text: Wow! I don’t really notice a difference with certain facial moisturizers but this one far exceeds any one I have tried. It is moisturizing by lightweight and provides a nice base for my makeup.

review_text: I was actually about to buy the cream version after trying it as a sample before I saw the serum. I decided to go with this instead after trying on my hand and I can say I made the right choice! My skin is very oily and this was a better option for me for this reason. I feel like it’s lighter yet still does a good job at correcting redness and evening the skin tone. It’s great for a fresh, natural look! If I use this and mix my foundation with my moisturizer on top you can’t tell I’m wearing any makeup and my skin looks even and luminous. I like that I get the redness correction AND spf and other skin benefits. I was using Makeup Forever green tinted primer for ages but I like that this is a skincare product and absorbs into my skin easier.

review_text: I really like this however I don’t really notice a HUGE difference but my teeth have gotten whiter.

review_text: This Product is beyond amazing!!! It not only cleaned up my face from my pores but it also smoothing out my skin. Every time I us this product it does justice! My face is nice and smooth and it smells so good. I love it...don’t only thing I do not like is the price of this product...its just so expensive.

review_text: This mask was very surprising to me, in a good way. At first I was a little afraid to try it because I have sensitive skin, but it actually worked very well with my skin. It left my skin feeling refreshed, smooth, and clean. I even noticed a difference of my skin not being as oily, which was a big plus for me.This mask has 4 main ingredients in it: Kaolin Clay, which helps with impurities and extracting dirt and oil. Charcoal, which are the black balls that look like cookie crumbs, helps detoxify and absorbs oils. Rhubarb and Ginger Extract, helps soothe, calm, and condition irritated skin. Last, is salicylic acid (BHA) which helps clarify the skin.The price is $32.00 and has 2.5 oz of product, which is very affordable and a great price with how much product comes in it. I will definitely be purchasing this mask when I run out.
review_title: Great mask for all skin types + sensitive skin.
product_name: Cookies N Clean Whipped Clay Pore Detox Face Mask with Salicylic Acid + Charcoal

review_text: the product causes so much pilling if i use it after a hyaluronic acid serum which is super disappointing because i wanted to love it
product_name: Ascorbic Acid 8% + Alpha Arbutin 2%

review_text: Before using this product, I used to break out a lot around my chin, on my nose and occasionally on my cheeks or nose but especially my chin. Since using the product for just about a month, I’ve noticed great improvement in the clarity of my skin. I haven’t had any breakouts since using this cleanser. However, I am giving it 4 stars because it claims to deep clean and I really wish I seen more improvement with the blackheads on my nose. Other than that, it’s a great product and I recommend it if you want to reduce or eliminate breakouts.
product_name: 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Cleanser

review_text: Amazing product. I though that it has soft smell and it’s hydrated my face really deeply. Recommend for those who has dry or normal skin. Received this product as sampler from Influenster.
product_name: Ceramidin  Eye Cream with Niacinamide

review_text: Absolutely wonderful moisturizer! I have combination skin where it’s usually normal but have an oily t-zone and in the winter I have dry patches. I can really feel the difference and look forward to using up the entire product!
product_name: Ceramidin Skin Barrier Moisturizing Cream

review_text: After doing research on essences, I tried this one. I tend to bounce around different brands often and after I finished the bottle, I tried Tatcha’s The Essence. I noticed a huge difference between the two and I immediately regretted the change. After I switched back to Caudalie, my acne has lessened, my skin feels more smooth, and I can see that some acne scars have lightened. Unfortunately, it took me switching products to realize just how effective the vinoperfect essence is. I also use the lines vinopure face wash along with the vinoperfect serum and night cream. The more clean ingredients make this one an easy choice!
product_name: Vinoperfect Brightening Glycolic Essence

review_text: So worth the money, don’t buy the one off Amazon! it’s not the real product! the white product is the real confidence gel moisturizer, the clear watery stuff is what i got from Amazon. Do yourself a favor & just spend the extra 15$ on the real thing!!
product_name: Confidence in a Gel Lotion

review_text: I have seen that some people prefer to melt away their makeup with this product, which I have tried. I personally prefer to remove as much as I can with micellar water and baby wipes and then wash my face with this to remove anything still in my pores/ any residue. I find it works great for this purpose and leaves you feeling fresh!
product_name: Take The Day Off  Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: This is the only anti aging product I need.  It isn’t too heavy like some of the other stuff out there, and doesn’t clog my pores in my super active oily skin. It decreases my fine lines, tightens my pores, and when I use it regularly only at night I get so many compliments.  I ran out about a month ago and decided to try another product that touts being all natural.  I’m right back on the Algenist Genius train, I could tell my skin didn’t look as good and I stopped getting comments on it.  Even my husband noticed the difference.
product_name: GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Cream

review_text: Pros: this DOES work, and if used exactly as specified in the accompanying instructions, can literally cause skin to grow back in deep, flattened box car scars, which are notoriously difficult to fix. I was actually shocked. The skin that grows back to fill your scar may be less pigmented than the surrounding skin, but considering how much easier it is to camouflage simple discoloration than it is to conceal skin texture, I wasn’t really bothered.Cons: This made me break out so badly that after fixing the one scar, I didn’t continue using it. The ingredients seem innocuous but something in it definitely caused my perioral dermatitis to flare. Because of the container’s design (there’s a rollerball applicator that needs to be used to work the product into your skin) the tube itself can also collect bacteria; this left the area I treated with clogged pores every time. I couldn’t see any way of removing the ball but I guess that might be a solution. The product needs to be pressed firmly into the skin in order to work properly so I don’t know how well it would work if the cream was moved to a different container.So, you can absolutely fix a scar with this, but you’re facing a double-edged sword. If you’re good at healing your own acne while using other products at the same time, I suppose it could be worth a try. But if you’re prone to multiple whiteheads, cysts that stick around, blackheads that never come out, or bad dermatitis, continuing to use the product while being broken out will only make the situation worse and you’ll end up with even more scars to deal with.
product_name: D-Scar Scar Diminishing Serum

review_text: I purchased this to this is try it out as I have some roughness and cystic acne/scars. I’ve just used it once last night and woke up and my scars we blurred, skin was smooth and there were no bumps! I applied this essence after washing and toning followed by my Lapis oil :)
product_name: Vinoperfect Brightening Glycolic Essence

review_text: The bottle is leaking. It’s the third one I ordered and two were leaking. Leaks every time when turned upside down. I recommend the toner itself but leaking is annoying
product_name: Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) Gentle Exfoliating Toner

review_text: I received this for free in a voxbox from Influenster and I absolutely love it. I have relatively normal skin with the occasional dry patches. I’d been using this product for almost a week. I use this at night with the afterglow moisturizer. I’ve been telling everyone about how much I’ve fallen in love with the night magic
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: I got this for my brother who has acne prone skin and a lot of blackheads. He is just starting his skincare journey so we decided to go light. This is a great product - it did clear the blackheads considerably and dried out the acne while not overly stripping his face and making it crazy dry. Overall happy with the result!
product_name: Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) Gentle Exfoliating Toner

review_text: I received a free sample of this new item from Estée Lauder and Influenster. I have rosacea that flares on top of having combination skin. This product has a floral smell and it’s heavily scented - I’m not a fan of heavy scents in skincare, I am particularly not a fan of florals. I assume the floral extracts and the additional fragrance added in are why my skin was irritated by this particular item. It may be perfect for folks without fragrance sensitivities etc.
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: Love the consistency and finish, my eye area feels very smooth and comfortable
product_name: Ceramidin  Eye Cream with Niacinamide

review_text: Love love. I’ve tried multiple Cbd products and this is by far my fave. I love the texture and it doesn’t have an overly pungent smell like a lot of Cbd products.  A bit on the pricy side though.
product_name: The Afterglow Deep Moisturizing Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Vegan Collagen

review_text: The best gentle non drying cleanser smells herbal and fresh!!! It reminds me of the Youth to the people but without the overdrying of the skin I find that one drying. This is just super deeply cleansing and gentle at the same time. You need it!!!!
product_name: Squalane + Amino Aloe Gentle Pore-Minimizing Cleanser

review_text: Are you looking for the most glowing skin ever? Look no further! My skin has never looked so hydrating and glowing before! It actually is also evening out my skin tone as well. I have dry and sensitive skin and it hasn’t caused any irritation. *gifted by Sunday Riley
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I have tried numerous Skinfix products and I love how these pads can be used for both face and body! I love how it has AHA and BHA that helps my skin with exfoliation. I really enjoy using these pads as it is so convenient for me when I’m on the good or for at home use whenever I feel my skin needs exfoliation.
product_name: Resurface+ AHA/BHA Niacinamide Exfoliating Pads for Face and Targeted Body

review_text: Worth it!  I used my first mask from a sample and immediately purchased a box of 10. Very hydrating and nourishes the skin.  I was surprised that this mask has given me better skin than after some facials.  Does not ’pill’ for those of you who want to use before a special night but I would recommend to let it settle in for a couple of hours to absorb all the goodness before putting make up on.  My skin can be temperamental to new products and prone to redness and breakouts and I can honestly say my skin loves this and hasn’t not been happier.  I use once a week with daily skin essence use.
product_name: Pitera Facial Treatment Mask

review_text: I have acne-prone, combination skin, and it’s really hard to find moisturizers for my skin type. Anti-acne stuff dries me out, gel moisturizers don’t hydrate enough, or it’s TOO hydrating and makes me break out. This stuff doesn’t break me out and has actually noticeably improved my skin tone. It’s the perfect amount of hydration, it doesn’t dry me out but doesn’t make me greasy either. If you’re someone who has combo skin but are prone to breakouts, I’d give this a shot.
product_name: Vitamin C Glow Moisturizer

review_text: This really burns, and i have seen zero change in skin other than clogged pores from the silicone.
product_name: Vitamin C Suspension 30% in Silicone

review_text: Won’t buy again.Product was not easy to apply, the “clear” product means that you can’t see where you’ve applied and thus you forget spots.In addition, it makes you very orange/fake looking tan with a terribly strong fragrance odour.
product_name: Glow Clear, Color Correcting Self-Tanning Mousse

review_text: Excellent product. It left my skin feeling plump and refreshed after each use. It does not have a sticky or tacky feeling after application like many other products I have recently tried do. I love the packaging. It is simple yet functional and makes for a great addition to your beauty / skincare shelf space. Amazing price point for what it is worth.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Hyaluronate Serum

review_text: This stuff is a dream! I have combo skin (leaning towards dry).  This is the perfect consistency and my skin drinks it up.  There also is a ton of product in here for an eye cream so it will last a long time.  Definitely worth the investment!
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: Do not be worried by the rating of this product - truly I do not know how this product isn’t 5 stars across the board. I have acne-prone skin and have deep acne scars that would not lighten. This product helped tremendously with dealing with breakouts, lightening the dark spots and acne scars, evening my skin tone, and COMPLETELY brightening my entire complexion. Truly an underrated product. I’m currently waiting for the product to be restocked because I love it so much!
product_name: Ascorbic Acid 8% + Alpha Arbutin 2%

review_text: I have never dealt with acne before, and after I started using this moisturizer, I got a lot of acne in my skin. I stopped using it after a couple of months and I am now dealing with the pigmentation marks 😭
review_title: I got acne after using it
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I enjoy this product. I feel that I need more time to try it out before forming a solid opinion on the product but so far so good. The products make my skin feel and appear smooth and soft. I would recommend.
product_name: Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This is one of my staple items! It may feel silly buying canned water, but I use it really often. I spray it on my face before I apply moisturizer, so my cream applies really easily and this spray adds that much extra moisture to my skin (which my dry skin loves)! I also spray a spritz on my face whenever I have that 2 pm slump after working at a desk all morning. It helps lift me up! Once I purchased the large size of this product, and the aerosol ran out about half way through. Now I will always purchase the smaller size so I never have that problem again!
product_name: Brumisateur Natural Mineral Water Facial Spray

review_text: Still only on the first small bottle, but I bought this to help with my daughter’s eczema. She’s 10, and has been dealing with eczema almost her whole life. It occasionally flares up over her whole body, but is consistently on her feet, knees, elbows and neck. We have spend more money than I can count, both on OTC and prescription strength steroids from multiple dermatologists. I am shocked that not one dermatologist has ever recommended the use of an oil, all they recommend from the OTC department is emollients. THIS product, has made a difference. We slather this on her after showers or even just on skin that’s not been recently showered, and then we cover it with lotion on top of the oil. It brings her such relief and softens her skin. I am back to buy a second, and larger, bottle :) Thank you biossance and Sephora!
review_title: Such a big help for eczema!
product_name: 100% Sugarcane Squalane Oil

review_text: Great physical exfoliator but too rough for my skin now that I’ve been using chemical exfoliants for a while. It’s still a good product for what it is, but I’ll have to use it for body instead of face I guess.
product_name: JuJu Exfoliating Bar

review_text: Love it!!! Moisturising, the texture is improved, what not to like? Highly recommend!
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: Love this product even though the price tag is hefty. This is a liquid and I use this before I put on serums and moisturizers and I feel like this product did such a nice job prepping my skin and helps make the rest of my skincare feel more effective. My skin does feel plumper and softer after about a week of use.
product_name: Mini The Treatment Lotion

review_text: This is a great liquid exfoliator for a quick and easy routine. It has a natural scent and I love the sleek packaging. It’s easy to use and you don’t have to worry about dispensing too much. Definitely follow up with a moisturizer after because it is effective at resurfacing. Gifted by Moon Juice
product_name: Acid Potion AHA + BHA Resurfacing Exfoliator

review_text: I loved using clinique blackhead 7 day solution for my skin.I received this product complimentary for testing purposes​.I most say the product worked really well for my skin was very hydrated and smooth. This product is good especially during your night time face wash routine.
product_name: Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub

review_text: I’ve just bought my second one! I love these pillow cases I wish I could afford a whole sheet set like these. I had to buy a second one because my 7 year old son is also obsessed and steals my pillow every night.  They are so silky smooth and they stay colder then the average pillow case.  They just feel so good on your face.  I can’t say I’ve noticed a difference in my hair or skin but I can imagine over the long run how this would benefit both.  There’s no grab to them just a “slip”.  I’m a big fan! I know they are expensive but for me totally worth it!
product_name: Silk Pillowcase - Standard/Queen

review_text: I use the entire DE line only, and I just bought this soap because I love the Beste jelly so much that I decided to give it a try thinking that it was another DE product. WRONG!! This thing is awful, it stripped my skin, it make it so dry and I got patches everywhere from it hurting my skin. It feels like a cheap hotel soap bar. It’s really bad, don’t waste your time and money buying this!
product_name: Pekee Cleansing Bar

review_text: I like the eye cream because it’s smooth, creamy, and I really love that it’s unscented. Hyaluronic acid is one of my favorite skin care ingredients so this is all in one and great for the dark circles.
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Shade was way too white and I’m pretty fair but anything else looked too pink or dark.  I also didn’t like the way it felt on my skin...felt thick and heavy all day.  Returned.
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This works! Like legit! Doesn’t break me out instead helped in clearing my skin. This is a gentle toner but even then I don’t use it every night. I started off by using it twice a week to see how it reacts to my skin. It neither broke me out nor made my skin dry. So now I use either every other night or every two nights. Helps me get rid off mini bumps which are not acne or pimple. Just tiny bumps.
product_name: PRO Strength 10% PHA Exfoliating Clarifying Liquid

review_text: I didn’t really notice a difference when using this product. Of course we aren’t into the the super sunny months either but we’ve still had good sun exposure. You have to shake it really well or the product isn’t what it should be. I thought it felt a little heavy on but the smell wasn’t very strong which I thought was nice. I do have oily skin and I felt the need to use a matte primer to counteract this sunscreen. Overall, I don’t think it’s for me but that doesn’t mean it’s not for everyone.
product_name: Urban Environment Vita-Clear Sunscreen SPF 42

review_text: I received this product complimentary and am actually STUNNED at how amazing it is. I’ve already repurchased this product and can’t wait to see how it continues to help keep my acne prone skin without causing further breakouts!
product_name: Teatreement Toner

review_text: Loved using this. Made my skin look fresh. Very cute as well.
product_name: SATOCANE Pore Purifying Scrub Mask

review_text: For any oily/combo folks - be advised, this is a MILKY toner. Caused serious breakouts for me... had to return.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner
